details.name: 仙缘：红尘一笑
details.detailed_description:
修仙游戏，可在游戏中体验一段悠闲愉快的修仙历程。游戏不限制玩法，玩家可以跟随主线完成任务，拜师学艺，或者独闯江湖，探索世界，获取秘籍，修炼神功，一切由你自己选择。

一、丰富的剧情任务

游戏提供6-8小时的线性游戏体验，在主线之外还有各种支线、隐藏剧情任务等你探索。你穿越到异世界，附赠初始器灵，以一个初出茅庐的修仙者视角，体验一段轻松愉快而又波澜壮阔的传奇故事。

二、自由互动的世界

所有NPC均可互动战斗，在世界中与各路经典人物发生故事，只要你肯探索，就能发现各种剧情。

支持自动战斗和手动战斗切换，选择你喜欢的方式来挑战四方英雄吧！

三、多样的游戏系统

给玩家多重选择，不仅可满足传统RPG玩家的需求，更对多个游戏系统做了现代化设计，拒绝无事可做和重复劳动。通过悬赏系统完成随机悬赏并获取丰富奖励，钓鱼、采药获得多种稀有材料，豪赌一场体验一本万利，使用挂机卡加快资源获取，赚取积分兑换高级装备……

四、养成系统获取极品装备

剧情任务暂时做腻了？来体验刷宝乐趣，装备随机属性，想要变强就来锻造极品装备；丹药自由炼制，战斗消耗无所畏惧。更有装备强化，功法兑换，更多惊喜等你来体验。

details.name: Rougineer
details.detailed_description:
Overview:
Dive into a world of Rougineer, a rouge lite physics-based combat and sandbox game! In Rougineer, you’ll craft, customize, and battle with unique creations in an environment where every move needs energy and causes you to overheat. Test your engineering skills and tactical thinking as you face dynamic challenges to unlock powerful upgrades, to become an unstoppable killing Machine!

Key Features:

  • Physics-Based Combat: Every action is grounded in realistic mechanics, making each battle strategic and satisfying.

  • Roguelite Progression: Face randomized challenges and unlock new abilities, components, and upgrades with every run.

  • Intuitive Building System: Craft and customize unique spaceships to suit your playstyle, using an easy-to-learn but deep construction interface.

  • Heat and Energy Simulation: Manage your ships wisely to maintain efficiency and outlast your enemies.

  • Dynamic Challenges: Encounter procedural levels and opponents that keep every playthrough fresh and engaging.

Story Objectives:

Defeat the AI overlords, by creating the ultimate weapon, do not get caught tying to do so! Sneakily destroy the Mega structure Pice by Pice that is running the swarm intelligence.

details.name: Timer
details.detailed_description:
A game where you are trapped in a spatial loop, teleporting back to a checkpoint every 10 seconds. You must solve puzzles quickly to escape the loop. And you can create your own levels!

Features:

  • Time Limit: Reach the next checkpoint within 10 seconds.

  • Dynamic World: Obstacles change with every loop.

  • Mechanics: Light parkour, lever switches, and key searching.

details.name: Roots Devour Demo
details.detailed_description:
JOIN US!!

  • QQ：904220203

  • X：Rewinding Games

  • Discord：GCORES PUBLISHING


About the Demo

This store page is for the Roots Devour demo. The demo includes content from the first level of the full game, offering about 60 minutes of gameplay. If you enjoy the demo, feel free to add it to your wishlist and leave valuable feedback on this page. You can also join our Discord to communicate with us directly. The full version is in active development and will be available in 2025. Every wishlist from our investigators guides us forward, bringing us closer to meeting you at the house of the Ancients!

Witness the might of the gods! Link the cards and weave blood passages with the roots.

To maintain your existence, you must constantly consume fresh blood.

Make those creatures our sacrifices.

Find them! Devour them! Kill them!

Concealed in mystery, the offerings of the Gods ignite an insatiable thirst within us for the blood and power they contain.

Choose the location to open the card pack with caution,

As the "surprises" within remain unpredictable.

Maximize your returns by tactically placing the organs.

Strategically plan the use of each card to forge a path towards godhood.

They sever the roots, they proliferate without end, they… summon forth the Great Old Ones!

The existence of the hidden tribes of other intelligent creatures reminds us that we are not alone in this forest.

Someone among them might have chanced upon the mystery of the world…

Do you wish to be the mastermind behind the scenes?

Or the revered faith of ignorant human beings?

  • Play an Elder God in this eerie and Lovecraftian forest.

  • Revise your tactics and manage your blood production line while gathering vast amounts of fresh blood.

  • Fulfill your ambition within the finite lifespan of 30 days.

  • Unlock diverse talents and mutations, construct your network of roots, and embrace new challenges.

  • Ascend as the God in the faith of humans, delve into their stories, and decide whether to intervene.

  • Embark on a forest exploration with roguelike experiences upon each new start.

Drink blood to sustain your existence and seize dominion over the mysterious forest for greater power.

details.name: Echoes of Forgotten Dreams
details.detailed_description:
미래의 잊히어진 꿈(Echoes of Forgotten Dreams)은 꿈을 주제로 한 보스 전투로 이루어진 보스 러시 액션 로그라이트 게임입니다. 시작은 간단하지만 매번 다양하게 변화해가는 악몽에서 다양하게 조합하고 성장하면서 꿈에서 깨어나 보세요!

시놉시스

매번 다양하게 변화해가는 악몽에 갇힌 미래는 꿈에서 깨어나기 위해 다양한 꿈을 거쳐가며 꿈의 출구를 향해 나아갑니다. 미래가 이런 꿈을 꾸게 되는 이유는 무엇일까요?

주요 특징

  • 간단하면서도 빠르게
    달려가서 부딪치는 보스 러시라는 간단하고도 빠른 구성으로 즐길 수 있습니다.

  • 다양한 성장 및 조합
    총 200개에 가까운 스킬, 패시브, 펫들을 다양하게 조합해 때로는 특정 아이템끼리 만나면 특별한 시너지를 발동 시키고 다양한 40개에 가까운 음식들을 통해 성장하며 시작은 간단하지만 점차 다채로워지는 플레이를 즐겨보세요!

  • 수많은 만남과 변화
    꿈을 꾸면서 꿈의 주민들을 익숙한 장소에서, 혹은 의외의 만남을 가지며 때로는 예상치 못한 다양한 일들을 겪을 수 있습니다. 또한 스테이지에따라 다채롭게 변화하는 매력있는 아트 스타일을 느껴보세요!

  • 캐주얼부터 어려운 도전까지!
    스토리 위주로 가볍게 게임을 즐기고 싶은 분들부터 본격적으로 게임을 깊게 즐기고 싶은 분들을 위해 다양한 난이도를 준비하였습니다.
details.about_the_game:
미래의 잊히어진 꿈(Echoes of Forgotten Dreams)은 꿈을 주제로 한 보스 전투로 이루어진 보스 러시 액션 로그라이트 게임입니다. 시작은 간단하지만 매번 다양하게 변화해가는 악몽에서 다양하게 조합하고 성장하면서 꿈에서 깨어나 보세요!

시놉시스

매번 다양하게 변화해가는 악몽에 갇힌 미래는 꿈에서 깨어나기 위해 다양한 꿈을 거쳐가며 꿈의 출구를 향해 나아갑니다. 미래가 이런 꿈을 꾸게 되는 이유는 무엇일까요?

주요 특징

  • 간단하면서도 빠르게
    달려가서 부딪치는 보스 러시라는 간단하고도 빠른 구성으로 즐길 수 있습니다.

  • 다양한 성장 및 조합
    총 200개에 가까운 스킬, 패시브, 펫들을 다양하게 조합해 때로는 특정 아이템끼리 만나면 특별한 시너지를 발동 시키고 다양한 40개에 가까운 음식들을 통해 성장하며 시작은 간단하지만 점차 다채로워지는 플레이를 즐겨보세요!

  • 수많은 만남과 변화
    꿈을 꾸면서 꿈의 주민들을 익숙한 장소에서, 혹은 의외의 만남을 가지며 때로는 예상치 못한 다양한 일들을 겪을 수 있습니다. 또한 스테이지에따라 다채롭게 변화하는 매력있는 아트 스타일을 느껴보세요!

  • 캐주얼부터 어려운 도전까지!
    스토리 위주로 가볍게 게임을 즐기고 싶은 분들부터 본격적으로 게임을 깊게 즐기고 싶은 분들을 위해 다양한 난이도를 준비하였습니다.

details.about_the_game:
미래의 잊히어진 꿈(Echoes of Forgotten Dreams)은 꿈을 주제로 한 보스 전투로 이루어진 보스 러시 액션 로그라이트 게임입니다. 시작은 간단하지만 매번 다양하게 변화해가는 악몽에서 다양하게 조합하고 성장하면서 꿈에서 깨어나 보세요!

시놉시스

매번 다양하게 변화해가는 악몽에 갇힌 미래는 꿈에서 깨어나기 위해 다양한 꿈을 거쳐가며 꿈의 출구를 향해 나아갑니다. 미래가 이런 꿈을 꾸게 되는 이유는 무엇일까요?

주요 특징

  • 간단하면서도 빠르게
    달려가서 부딪치는 보스 러시라는 간단하고도 빠른 구성으로 즐길 수 있습니다.

  • 다양한 성장 및 조합
    총 200개에 가까운 스킬, 패시브, 펫들을 다양하게 조합해 때로는 특정 아이템끼리 만나면 특별한 시너지를 발동 시키고 다양한 40개에 가까운 음식들을 통해 성장하며 시작은 간단하지만 점차 다채로워지는 플레이를 즐겨보세요!

  • 수많은 만남과 변화
    꿈을 꾸면서 꿈의 주민들을 익숙한 장소에서, 혹은 의외의 만남을 가지며 때로는 예상치 못한 다양한 일들을 겪을 수 있습니다. 또한 스테이지에따라 다채롭게 변화하는 매력있는 아트 스타일을 느껴보세요!

  • 캐주얼부터 어려운 도전까지!
    스토리 위주로 가볍게 게임을 즐기고 싶은 분들부터 본격적으로 게임을 깊게 즐기고 싶은 분들을 위해 다양한 난이도를 준비하였습니다.
details.short_description: 미래의 잊히어진 꿈(Echoes of Forgotten Dreams)은 꿈을 주제로 한 보스 전투로 이루어진 보스 러시 액션 로그라이트 게임입니다. 시작은 간단하지만 매번 다양하게 변화해가는 악몽에서 다양하게 조합하고 성장하면서 꿈에서 깨어나 보세요!

details.name: Dead Cat Bounce
details.detailed_description:
데드 캣 바운스(Dead Cat Bounce)는 현대 도시를 배경으로 하는 짧고 잔잔한 내러티브 게임입니다. 주인공 캐릭터를 조작해 주변 환경과 사물을 조사하면서, 꼬리를 물고 이어지는 이야기를 따라나가 보세요.

시놉시스

어느 날 갑자기 말하는 삼색 고양이가 주인공을 찾아옵니다. 평범한 학생인 '세라'는 고양이를 데리고 도시 외곽으로, 그리고 과거로의 여행을 떠나게 됩니다. 어떤 잊힌 이야기와 추억들이 세라를 기다리고 있을까요?

details.name: A Fugu's Dive
details.detailed_description:
A glimpse into the daily life of a Fugu.

"A Fugu's Dive" is a 2D physics-based action game where you use mouse controls to make a Fugu jump and climb higher. Skillfully jump from one body of water to another without falling, and aim for the goal.

  • Hold the left mouse button and pull back to charge up power.

  • Release the button to launch the Fugu in the opposite direction with the stored power.

  • You can cancel the charge by right-clicking while holding down the left mouse button.

  • Once the Fugu is in the air, it cannot be controlled.

  • Press the Esc key to open the pause menu.

reviews.review:
Having finished my 3rd run now, I'm happy to say I really enjoyed A Fugu's Dive.
If you're a fan of other rage climbing platformers ("Foddians") like Getting Over It, Jump King, A Difficult Game About Climbing, Slimper, etc., you'll certainly appreciate this one too. As usual in the genre, there is a mystery waiting for you at the top of the map, and after being introduced to the controls, you'll need to decide if you have enough curiosity and determination to find out exactly what it is.

The simple mouse-only movement mechanic is fun to master, and the difficulty certainly lives up to the genre. The physics are extremely consistent and I encountered no gameplay bugs to speak of. However, the real standout qualities are the polished art style and environmental design, with the cheery cartoon world provoking a feeling of calm contentment in contrast to the punishing gameplay. It's just so lovely to look at that you can't stay mad for too long, even after failing the same jump for the 20th time in a row or launching at the perfectly wrong angle to send you tumbling down to the bottom of the zone.

details.name: LootMage Demo
details.detailed_description:
LootMage Demo is a bullet-hell action roguelite game set in a medieval fantasy world.

As an adventurer in this realm, you must brave ever-changing dungeons, battle fierce enemies, collect treasures, and fight to survive.

  • Dodge relentless waves of enemy attacks and experience thrilling combat with powerful magic.

  • If you're defeated, you'll lose all your items,but the skills and knowledge you've gained will carry over to your next challenge.

    Will you be able to reach the end of the dungeon?

  • This world is brimming with magic staves, heavy swords, magic orbs, and all sorts of other weapons and items.

  • What you find in the dungeon and how you combine them to continue your journey depends on your luck and choices.

  • Passive items come with two unique engravings.

  • Collect items with the same engravings to activate powerful synergies.

  • Some engravings provide overwhelming power but demand a heavy price in return.

  • Explore procedurally generated dungeons that present new challenges each time.

  • Observe enemy patterns and adapt to shifting terrain as you grow stronger with every attempt.

    When will you finally master the art of surviving these treacherous depths?

"The dungeons of LootMage always hold new treasures and challenges awaiting your discovery."

details.name: Gas Giant Voyage
details.detailed_description:
In the 798th parallel universe, there exists a gaseous planet known as "Gas Giant Voyage". It is entirely gaseous with no land, composed of various elemental gases, including metal elements and dust left by meteorites tearing through the atmosphere, all floating in the air.

In its atmosphere, there are numerous remnants of floating islands left by other civilizations. As a brave astronaut, you wake up alone on one of these floating islands, struggling against the forces of nature to survive and uncover the veil of other civilizations.

【Game Features】

- Ultimate Survival Challenge

Manage your resources, including oxygen, food, water, and energy. Your health system will test every decision you make.Life, thirst, and oxygen levels all determine your life and death.

Facing atmospheric pressure and storm cyclones, you need to ensure sustainable supply while searching for the remnants of civilizations that hide themselves in the cloud mist within the storm cyclones and fog of the planet's atmosphere.

- In-depth Exploration Mechanism

Pilot your aerospace spaceship, traversing the layers of mist in the atmosphere of "Gas Giant Voyage", establishing and maintaining floating bases. Upgrade equipment, explore the unknown, analyze resources, life signs, and ancient relics. Each discovery will reveal more secrets about this gaseous planet.

You can grow crops inside your spaceship and build a water recycling system to ensure continuous navigation.

You can also equip your spaceship with turrets to defend against unknown creatures.

At the same time, your spaceship also supports Hyper-speed leap migration flight, helping you find resources in this huge gaseous planet.

- Diverse Resource Collection

Collect special gases from different atmospheric layers, use the energy flow of "Gas Giant Voyage" magnetic field for power supply, explore atmospheric particle samples, delve into high-pressure areas, search for rare elements, and aggregate resource minefield particles as resources, adding infinite possibilities to your adventure journey.

-Mysterious and Colorful Enemies

On this planet, various forms of energy life float everywhere. They are a peculiar form of life that poses a threat to you. You need to use special energy weapons to inflict damage on them.

- Creative Civilization Relic Habitats

Suspended platforms, mobile bases, cloud refuges... Each resting point provides various resources and props for exploration and collection, allowing you to rest and plan the next step while exploring.

There are also civilizations that like to build castle-style and valley-style retro floating bases.

All kinds of civilization relics await your exploration in this parallel time and space.

- Ultimate BOSS Challenge

Face superstorms, guardians of different civilizations, and mysterious energy entities. Each BOSS is an ultimate test of courage and wisdom. Defeat them to dominate the entire gaseous planet.

- Super Open Exploration Space

The game offers an immersive survival adventure experience larger than 10,000,000,000 m³, allowing you to feel the grandeur and mystery of "Gas Giant Voyage" in every heart-thumping exploration.

Join us, conquer the abyss of "Gas Giant Voyage" and write your own interstellar legend.

reviews.review: The process of gathering resources, constructing, and planting to survive is engrossing.
Some of the scene settings are quite good. Recommended!
The design of the gas giant is ingenious; you find that you can fall infinitely without any harm coming to you.
Using the hyperspace jump function, you can rapidly travel to different locations, which greatly improves exploration efficiency. The sensation of jumping through space is exhilarating
The game's building system allows for creative expression. Constructing buildings in mid-air offers a great experience.
Exploring different main cities reveals unique surprises at each turn; it’s recommended and really enjoyable!
Highly Recommended. The game's setting is incredibly novel, offering an open-world experience that includes resource gathering, farming, and construction, providing a diverse range of experiences.
Being able to pilot a small spacecraft to soar through the skies is a fantastic experience, and the ability to perform hyperspace jumps adds an exhilarating element.
The BOSS battles are well-balanced, challenging players' skills while offering sufficient challenges, making the game highly replayable. Strongly recommended.
Managing and repairing a large spaceship while being able to construct your own buildings on it is also very impressive; highly recommended!

name: Don't Freeze: A Winter Card Survival

details.name: Don't Freeze: A Winter Card Survival
details.detailed_description:
Stranded in the aftermath of a passenger jet crash, you are the sole survivor in a merciless winter wilderness. Your mission: stay alive long enough to make it back to civilization — all while navigating this deadly environment in a unique card-based survival experience.

Journey through over 10 diverse environments, from the wreckage of the crash site to frigid rivers, abandoned towns, and vast, unrelenting winter terrain that will test every ounce of your survival instinct.

Hunt, fish, trap, and scavenge to find vital food and supplies — anything you can use to stay alive.

Craft campfires and wear the right gear to shield yourself from the biting cold.

Manage your Hunger, Thirst, Fatigue, and Cold, constantly balancing your resources and energy to stay alive. Every decision you make can be the difference between survival and death. When you die, your save file is wiped — no second chances.

details.short_description: Don't Freeze is a winter card survival game set in a winter wasteland. Explore, gather resources, craft, build, hunt, die, repeat. Something sinister lurks in the cold darkness. Will you make it out in time?

details.name: [K]night City
details.detailed_description:
Overview

In a distant land, the retired valiant knight, Sir William, renowned for his unwavering bravery and loyalty, embarks on an unexpected adventure when he stumbles upon a mysterious portal after a night at the pub. Accidentally falling through, he lands in the bewildering modern city of Old York, completely unaware that he's intruded into the perilous territory of a ruthless street gang led by the enigmatic Big B.O.B. Armed with his trusty sword and an unyielding spirit, Sir William doesn't back down from a challenge.

Instead of a duel, he challenges the gang members in a quest for more alcohol, setting off a chain of events that leads him to parry his way through the gritty streets of Old York. Join Sir William as he navigates the city, uncovering the depths of the Killer Serpents' crimes and the mystery behind his unexpected transportation, all while satisfying his unique quest for spirits and swords. It's a thrilling journey that combines chivalry, chaos, and a dash of liquid courage in a mesmerizing urban landscape.

Features

  • Dynamic Combat System: Utilize precise attacks, blocking, and parrying to masterfully fend off enemies. Add a bit of flair to your fights by engaging in the exclusive Drunk Dash ability when Sir William gets, shall we say, fortified.

  • Urban Adventure: Explore the sprawling streets of Old York, each filled with dangers, and hidden coin.

  • Mysterious Storyline: Uncover the secrets behind the Killer Serpents’ criminal empire and the mystical portal that brought you here in Old York.

  • Knightly Platforming: Leap, climb, and dash your way through challenging environments, with simple but engaging controls.

Controls

  • Move Right: D

  • Move Left: A

  • Jump: W / Space Bar

  • Climb: W

  • Attack: Left Mouse Button

  • Block: C

  • Parry: While Holding C, Press Left Mouse Button

  • Dash: While Drunk, Shift

Special Codes (In Clues)

  • Unlock Rampage Mode = Sir William's favourite drink

  • Unlock All Levels = The leader of the Killer Serpents

  • Unlock Everything = One Word of The Killer Serpents' Dialogue

  • Reset Everything = Its just "Reset"

details.name: Looters Inc.
details.detailed_description:
Looters Inc is a 4 player physics-based co-op heist game, where you and your friends break into houses, clinics, banks and more to steal valuable items. Nothing is safe, even the people.

Key Features:

  • Procedurally Generated Maps: Each burglary attempt is a new experience, as rooms and furniture are randomized. Maybe the next house you target will only have bathrooms!

  • Agressive NPCs: The home owners will not take your thuggery lying down. They are violent and they work together. You might lose some of your fellow robbers in action, but sometimes, sacrifices must be done.

  • Multiple Escape Vehicle Upgrades: You will start with a rusty old truck, with a small flat bed. But do not worry, using the money you steal, you can upgrade to better machinery. Better vehicle = More space for stolen goods.

  • Don't Forget Your Tools: Choose between a variety of tools to help your robbery go smoothly. From a "Silent Window Breaker" to make sure you don't wake up the residents, to a "Baseball Bat" to put them back to sleep if they do wake up, you will find tools for every play style.

  • Bonus Items: Experience the satisfying rush of opening a safe and finding a $1000 box of jewelery! Or the grief of finding a 1$ trash bag. Maybe the odds will be in your favour next time around.

  • Local and Online Co-op: Team up with up to 3 more looters in local or online multiplayer. And remember, robbery is more fun when done with friends!

details.name: 与衾  With Quilt
details.detailed_description:
The Milky Way is like practice, the moon is bright.

Four gods meet you here.

Across thousands of years, they've made countless choices to meet you.

And now the choice is in your hands.

It's the first time we've met, but I seem to have seen you before.

"With Quilt" is a AVG game for female, you will play a home textile designer, and in charge of different materials of quilt gods to start the story. The character of the protagonist is selectable, I/E branch line, whether it is waiting for a good edge or bold pursuit of love, weave your love.

银河如练，月光皎皎。

四位神祇与你在此邂逅。

跨越千年时光，为了遇见你，他们曾做出无数抉择。

而如今，选择的权利交到了你的手上。

初次见面，但念卿已久。

《与衾》是一款乙女向AVG游戏，你将扮演一位家纺设计师，和掌管不同材质的被子神灵展开故事。主人公性格可选，I/E分线，无论是静候佳缘还是大胆追爱，编织属于你的爱恋吧。

details.name: Frog Brain
details.detailed_description:
Welcome to Frog Brain, a challenging neural network simulation game. In this world, you’ll take on the role of a neural network designer, using your creativity and logical thinking to build neural networks and solve a series of complex scenario challenges.

The core gameplay revolves around a powerful neural network editor, where players can use the following types of nodes to build their network:

  • Input Nodes: Read activation signals from the scene, providing the raw data needed by the network.

  • Neuron Nodes: Simulate the function of neurons, transmitting and processing signals.

  • Output Nodes: Output the processed signals back into the scene to control the task.

  • Universal Nodes: Provide various input signals, including network, file, and keyboard inputs, to help you tackle different challenges.

In each level, you’ll need to cleverly connect these nodes and design the optimal neural network to achieve the task goals. Each scenario is filled with unknowns and challenges, testing your understanding of neural network structures and your ability to fine-tune them.

Frog Brain is not only a challenge to your thinking and creativity but also a hands-on exploration of neural network principles. Can you find the best solution in each challenging scenario and become a master of neural network design? The challenge awaits you!

details.name: Dice With Death
details.detailed_description:
A Dice Poker based strategic game of risk and reward!

             I am afraid you have passed into the world beyond our own. Before you get there however, Death has offered to give you time to process your demise through means of some friendly competition.

                           

Engage in a game of Dice with the mysterious entity - collect new dice and their paired relics to warp your rolls into ever increasing layers of power and complexity. Bank your points to deal damage to your opponent, and pass before you push your luck too far or you'll lose it all!

Unlock new classes and experiment with their core mechanics, unlock new relics and even dialogue paths with your mythical foe to influence the outcome!

details.name: しかくの勿忘草
details.detailed_description:
Before Playing

  • This game is a horror game.  

If you have a weak heart or similar conditions, please refrain from playing.  

  • There are certain scenes where the game may forcibly close as part of the experience.  

If you are streaming, please take care to avoid showing your desktop screen or similar content.  

Have you ever lost your memories?  

Do you have precious memories?  

Can you take the first step to regain them?  

Even if it means involving everyone around you...

Controls

Z Button or Enter: Confirm  

X Button: Cancel or Open Menu Screen  

Arrow Keys: Move Character  

Shift Key: Dash  

Hold Z Button: Fast-forward

Lastly

This work is fiction.

details.name: Trailblader Demo
details.detailed_description:
The trial version of Trailblader is largely the same as the full version in terms of content. However, hero level-ups are capped in the trial version.

Loop Battles

Heroes will lead their troops in battles on a looping map, resupplying, gathering resources, and exploring treasures.

Card Assistance

Heroes acquire cards through battles, which can be used to construct various functional buildings. These provide valuable combat rewards but also increase battle difficulty.

City Building & 4X Exploration

Resources obtained by heroes can be used to build cities, explore the world, expand territories, forge alliances with city-states, and gain more power.

details.name: Sign White
details.detailed_description:
In a time of war, you are left alone in the pigeon coop 'Sign White' after the death of your benefactor.

Exhausted from the long days of war and death, you write one last letter and send it flying,

The pigeons, flying free, miraculously reach the people who were lost too...

From that day, you continue to write letters.

To someone you know neither face nor name.

“Sign White” is a visual novel based on the system of sending and receiving letters via pigeons, and the protagonist interacts with three characters.

The protagonist grows by interacting with the characters in the letters, and also has the option to change their lives by giving them direction or sharing advice.

Keep connecting with people. Make a difference on the battlefield, touch someone's life, change the fate of a province.

Where will “Sign White” and its three characters end up in the end?

details.name: Bullet Coven 枪弹女巫
details.detailed_description:
《Bullet Coven》
Pixel-style × side-scrolling shooter × Roguelike × vertical adventure

Conquer the randomly generated abyss with guns and magic!
Play as the last bullet witch and fall through a dynamically generated underground world as you take on increasingly frantic enemies and bosses. Each adventure is a new experience: combine hundreds of bullets, magic, and skills to survive fast-paced battles and escape the abyss with loot – but greed will cost you everything.

Core gameplay

🎯 Free combat system

  • Magic × Bullets: Enchanting guns and bullets, or creating a missile or turret with creative magic, the possibilities for magic and technology are endless. Times have changed!

  • Vertical Battlefield：

    • Jump and fall through the levels, stomp on enemies to replenish ammo and jump times

    • Smash platforms to create shortcuts, or use environmental traps (lava, falling rocks) to attack enemies

  • Ancient Relics：Explore the underground and acquire ancient relics to make yourself stronger. They will give you powerful buffs, additional abilities and skills, and even change the way you play.  

  • Hallowed Altars: Each map will randomly hide 9 different styles of sacred altars, find and activate them, complete trials to obtain valuable rewards, and the difficulty of the game will become more uncontrollable as the altars are activated. High risk, high return.

🌀 Roguelike Challenge

  • Time difficulty: The longer you stay underground, the more dangerous monsters and bosses will become

  • Teleporter Deathmatch: Each final battle requires you to activate the teleporter and fend off enemy sieges, and then enter a deeper area after victory

  • Permanent Growth: Even if you die, you can unlock out-of-game permanent growth and progressively opening content

💎 High-risk evacuation mechanisms

  • Evacuate with loot: Abilities, spellbooks, and more collected during battle can be permanently preserved through hidden extraction points

  • Life and Death Choice：

    • When you evacuate with loot, you will be hunted down by enemies all over the map

    • Dying midway through will result in the loss of all unevacuated items in the game

A unique highlight

✅ Multiple random terrains: Misty Forest, Crystal Caves, Lava Lands...... Each floor has its own traps and enemies
✅ Refreshing operation: double jump, free fire, aerial combo, simple operation brings a variety of gameplay
✅ Deep Strategy: 400+ item combinations to create your own unique fighting style

Why is it worth playing?

  • Crafted by a single developer, it pays homage to classic side-scrolling shooters and roguelike gameplay

  • Each adventure lasts 20-40 minutes, which is suitable for fragmented time

  • Continuous updates: new items, hidden bosses, and special events are added every month

Warning: This is not an easy sightseeing game –

There are no save points, no safe zones, just ever-changing battlefields.

Are you ready to take on the abyss?

details.name: The End of Infinity Return
details.detailed_description:
The End of Infinite Return is a 2D dot game where you progress through the story, use firearms to defeat enemies, solve puzzles, and make choices at each branching point to see the corresponding ending. It is played in a top-down view.

As a Rookie Agent going on missions in a simulated world, Lexy performs her duties faithfully.

However, suspicious occurrences in her missions cause her to question her own existence and the purpose of the simulation. The moment she meets Olivia, her fate begins to change dramatically.

Players control Lexy to defeat enemies, quickly escape dangerous areas, and carry out missions while discovering the secrets of the simulation and confronting their own destiny.

Lexy can acquire various firearms and ammunition through missions. 

Upgrade your abilities with points earned by completing missions.

Solve various puzzles while completing missions.

Lexy must choose her own fate through branching points during gameplay.

Ultimately, the choices made in determining her destiny result in varying outcomes, creating multiple endings.

details.detailed_description:
This free demo offers an exclusive look at the prologue of the story. Dive into the opening chapter, where you'll explore the atmosphere, mechanics, and core features that set the stage for the full game.

This prologue serves as a standalone introduction, while the complete game will continue the journey with more chapters, expanding on the story, characters, and gameplay.

If you like this demo, make sure you wishlist the full game!

CHOREOGRAPHED EVENTS

Experience a world where the story unfolds around you in real-time through scripted events. No cutscenes, no interruptions—just you in control. Dive into conversations, eavesdrop, or walk away—it's your call.

PHYSICAL INTERACTIONS

Interact with the world naturally, pulling, pushing, and grabbing. Every action feels tactile, opening the door to immersive and quirky gameplay moments.

IMMERSIVE ENVIRONMENTS

Lose yourself in a meticulously crafted environment. PSX-ish style visuals, rich soundscapes and sound effects bring every moment to life. Hear sounds change as you move, get muffled behind walls, or echo in certain spaces.

Features:

  • Contextual dialogues

  • Realtime choreographed cutscenes and events

  • Physical interactions

  • Immersive volumetric audio

Wishlist now to get updates and be the first to experience the haunting mystery when it releases!

details.name: Undead Exile
details.detailed_description:
After the outbreak of the plague in a post-apocalyptic world, survivors roam the wilderness, searching for shelter and fighting against zombies and monsters.

Upgrade Weapons and Characters with Points

This is a first-person action RPG. By repeatedly playing stages, challenging your speed of completion and kill efficiency, you can earn points to upgrade character attributes and modify weapons, creating your own unique combat style. You can:

  • Increase the firing rate of an automatic rifle or submachine gun to an insane level, unleashing a rain of bullets on zombies.

  • Modify a sniper rifle to stack extremely high critical and headshot damage multipliers, allowing you to kill even the strongest enemies with a single shot.

  • Expand the fragmentation damage range and throw a super grenade to kill hundreds or thousands of zombies.

  • Boost the attack range of a machete, allowing you to stab zombies from a great distance like a swordmaster.

  • Enhance the range of a shotgun, enabling it to sweep through hordes of zombies from hundreds of meters away.

  • More free-play styles await your discovery...

You can also modify yourself:

  • Stack stamina and speed, allowing you to sprint at superhuman speeds.

  • Increase health defense and regeneration, becoming an indestructible melee warrior.

  • Amplify your luck, making it seem like divine intervention is helping you on the battlefield.

Rich Stage Content and Boss Battles

The game offers a variety of carefully designed stages for you to challenge:

  • Hunt wandering zombie hordes in a vast desert.

  • Snipe thousands of zombies in narrow streets.

  • Sweep through a mansion, kicking down doors room by room and shooting everything in sight.

  • Fight and battle intensely while navigating a dense forest.

  • Check out the game demo videos and screenshots for more scenarios...

The game features unique challenges in each stage:

  • Zombie hunting.

  • Area protection.

  • Base defense.

  • Rescue and search missions.

  • Patrol and investigation.

Most stages contain hidden bosses. Finding and defeating them will reward you with a large amount of points. However, bosses are usually hidden challenges, and it may be difficult to defeat them unless you have enough strength, strategy, and skill.

All game stages and missions include multilingual voice communications and mission instructions.

Unlocking Passive Skills

During battles in the stages, by continuously dealing damage and killing enemies, you can activate up to seven passive skills, bringing variety and new combinations to combat:

  • Chain Passive: Hitting one enemy causes chain damage to nearby enemies.

  • Multi-Hit Passive: Hitting one enemy inflicts damage multiple times.

  • Shadow Passive: Attacked enemies will not detect you until their death.

  • Cover Passive: Injured zombies cannot summon hordes to surround you.

  • Headshot Killer: Hitting an enemy's head results in an instant kill.

  • Check the game for more passive skills and their activation instructions...

Skill and Configuration Combinations

By selectively unlocking skills in stages and strategically enhancing weapon attributes, you can experience completely different gameplay combinations. Here are some examples:

  • Use a weapon with an extremely high firing rate to quickly activate passive skills in the stage.

  • Hunt individual zombies on the outskirts to accumulate passive skills before attacking the gathered hordes.

  • Lure zombies into groups and use a weapon with high divine punishment probability to trigger lightning strikes.

  • Combine a high-rate-of-fire or long-range primary weapon with a high-damage melee weapon to enter the stage.

  • Intentionally suppress weapon damage and enter a stage with a large number of zombies to farm points.

  • More combinations await your discovery...

Collect points to upgrade your character, modify weapons, and stack stats like damage, crits, and accuracy. Intense combat with diverse gameplay and rich combinations.

reviews.review:
In this game's current state, I cannot recommend it to others.

Premise:
There are 9 levels in this game, each with a small objective to complete. These levels occur in small worlds, some with empty buildings or paths, others are completely empty wastelands. Either way, there is nothing to do or see in these worlds except shoot zombies.

Mechanics:
There are very few mechanics in this game. When shooting zombies, you have a small chance of unlocking a modifier for your damage that lasts until the end of the round. These usually pop pretty quickly once starting a new level, typically within the first 15 or so zombies you kill. These modifiers range from double damage to bullet chaining.

During gameplay, zombies also have a very small chance to drop a purple or green box on death. The green is a health kit, purple gives you some extra points.

As you complete the levels, you'll be given points to use for upgrades at the main menu. Each gun has a large amount of upgrades, as well as the character yourself. These include damage, stamina, speed, reload time, etc.
Some of these upgrades seem buggy, such as attack speed, which goes down when upgrading.

Basics:
Movement is very icy, just standing still you'll slide down even the smallest of slopes.

The gun play is good, but the optics on the guns need some work. Currently, all guns shoot down and to the right of the sights. However, the damage done by the guns is pretty inconsistent, especially with the 'headshot' modifier. Also, once you run out of ammo, if the objective isn't complete, you are no longer able to do anything. The only way around this is to use the knife as your secondary weapon instead of the pistol or grenades.

Animations are all fairly basic, however, they are not timed with the actions they represent. This is a big issue for reloading, as the animation finishes 1-2 seconds before the action is completed depending on the gun and upgrades. This causes the player to think they are ready to shoot again before they are, and leads to unnecessary damage being taken.

Overall:
With some more work, I can see this being a fun arcade-style shooter. Currently though, I do not consider it worth the $10 price tag.

details.name: I'm Caught in a Time Loop: I Need to Find a Girl as Soon as Possible
details.detailed_description:
The strangest things happen when you don't expect them...

  • More than 120 anime-style images of girls

  • 5 Different Girls with Their Own Stories

  • 17 endings options, depending on the election

Another evening at the bar, which should have been the same as the previous ones... But this time it's different. Loneliness, boredom, and perhaps a mystical force force you to live the same day over and over again.

There is a story ahead filled with unusual events and moments that will bring you closer. Is it possible to find a reasonable way out of this situation?..

...Or is it better to keep repeating this day?

      [/tr]
      [tr]
      [td]↩ Replay Value[/td]
      [td][i][b]I doubt it.[/b][/i][/td]
      [/tr]

Yeah, this one is crude simply because it's mostly AI and it's also so poorly written. Something like this could really have used someone well-versed in English to re-write it so it at least made more sense. Some lines are grammatically correct but lack any context for the scene and feel incredibly out of place. Not even hilariously so. I'd pass unless it goes on a deep sale. Kinda regret getting it, myself.

details.name: Anthony the Monk
details.detailed_description:
Story

In Egypt many years ago, Saint Anthony the Monk is visited by an Angel and told to go into the wilderness to find the Righteous Hermit.

Gameplay

  • The player attacks using his staff with limited stamina, so time your attacks wisely.

  • The player has the ability to climb platforms that are too high to jump on.

  • Avoid the traps & any demonic surprise attacks at every corner.

  • Ravens will sometimes randomly drop bread from the sky to increase your health. 

  • Complete the level before time runs out.

  • Learn about the backstory of the Monk as you complete levels.

    Hint: Levels will automatically save if you close the game, however your score will be reset.

(This is Alpha 1, it will have unfinished parts & certain features will change in the future)

details.name: Bangalore Daze
details.detailed_description:
Welcome to Bangalore!

Step into the driver’s seat of your auto rickshaw and explore the open-world city of Bangalore. 

What to look for?

  • Explore Bangalore - Drive through the streets of Bangalore, visit iconic neighborhoods and experience a living, breathing city brought to life.

  • Ride and Relax - Complete trips at your own pace while listening to the radio with an extensive library of songs or add your own favorites to create the perfect vibe for your rides.

  • Conquer the City: Want more than trips? Take on 7 rival auto drivers, each dominating a part of Bangalore. Defeat them one-by-one to prove your skill and claim the title of the number 1 auto driver in Bangalore.

And hey, isn’t it better to conquer Bangalore’s traffic from the comfort of your chair than being stuck in it for real?

Whether you’re here for adrenaline-filled races or peaceful exploration, the choice is yours.

reviews.review: Demolished Highway Hari, can't wait to wreck the rest of the syndicate

Enjoyed the Game, 

Love the physhics. One comment - Driving between buildings ans on foot paths should be allowed. The mobile apps are a fun addition and the choas is very realistic xD. 

Amazing game! Recommend it to everyone!

Bangalore Daze is a love letter to a city that's been home to people from all walks of life: famous for its traffic, infamous for its transport system. The game offers players a refreshing set of eyes as an auto driver; navigating the hustle and bustle of city life. You may have lived in the city for all of your life, but you're bound to find something new with every turn and wrong turn xD

The gameplay is straightforward and honestly very comfy. Accompanied by a great soundtrack, pick your vibe as you cancel rides and just drive around for vibes. Or get competitive and take on area bosses for glory.

Unassuming at first glance, the game is rich with tongue-in-cheek humor and Easter eggs. I see myself coming back to this title often as a comfort play.

Nice to see representation for Namma Bengaluru <3
Amazing game, nice to kill time and drive around Bangalore. Really enjoy reading the funny sign boards spread across the city.
A wonderful game with good mechanics. The phone apps are novel, and there’s great attention to detail, such as keeping the Bangalore map close to reality. Overall, a nice game to play casually.

Chaotic fun! It's a simple racing / driving game from a solo developer, with a lot of references to Bangalore culture embedded within the game world. It was fun driving through major areas in Bangalore. It has a custom soundtrack, with music written specifically for the game. You get a birds eye view of Bangalore in the end! Promote more south Indian game developers by supporting them, its rare to see games from south India.

ultra realistic, GOTY contender

please add phone in first person and allow unlimited honking!

Horn goes beep.

Has distracted driving.

I wish there were more other horns around going beep. 

It's a pretty fun game, but also pretty slow — it really is just driving slowly between destinations, and every hour or so being able to get a new upgrade or do a new race. I wish it was paced a little quicker with cheaper upgrades to keep it a bit more exciting. 

But for the price, it's an enjoyable little game and it's fun to weave your way through the traffic! 

Would love for:
- The horn and the headlights buttons switched (or customizable controls)
- See the distance to the pickup before you accept (this is often longer than the ride)
- Be able to cancel a ride while it's going (I don't think this is possible?) 
- See which upgrades are at which place, from the map
driving on the wrong side , ignoring red lights and cutting lanes everywhere , 10/10 for realism , also traffic is on point

details.name: Scary Ferry
details.detailed_description:
Scary Ferry is a multiplayer game set in a post-apocalyptic world where you and your friends must face the unknown while completing mysterious missions given by ISM, a corporation with hidden agendas. Each mission takes you across treacherous waters and into dungeons filled with monsters and traps, testing your survival and teamwork skills.

With innovative gameplay and a narrative full of secrets, Scary Ferry blends horror, mystery, and unexpected moments, where every decision can alter the course of your journey. Can you trust ISM? Or is there more behind the missions? Embark on this adventure and find out.

content_descriptors.notes:
Scary Ferry contains elements and themes that may be sensitive for some players. The game includes depictions of violence, with combat against creatures, deadly traps, and violent deaths in a dark, post-apocalyptic environment. There is also a strong emphasis on psychological horror, with unsettling scenarios and imminent danger that create emotional tension. The game explores themes of death and despair, with environments that reinforce this atmosphere of inevitability.

While the game does not contain explicit sexual content, substance abuse, or non-consensual sex, it does address themes of suffering, pursuit, and the struggle for survival, which can be disturbing for players sensitive to these topics. Caution is advised for those who prefer to avoid graphic representations of violence or heavy themes.

details.name: Dead Don't Die Demo
details.detailed_description:
UNDOCUMENTED BETA CONTROLS

  • Press ESC during gameplay to see the controls

  • When a zombie grabs you on the front press MMB to kick it off 

  • When a zombie grabs you from behind you will have to ram it into walls to get it to release

  • Put the cursor over a close-by gun on the ground and press U to take the ammo

DEAD DON'T DIE

In the Dead Don't Die demo, take control of marine Andrew "Drew" Harrington as he begins his hunt for Elliot Slade - a traitor, a murderer, and maybe even a serial killer. In your way are corrupt gangs and hordes of the undead. This is the beginning of a much larger quest for revenge.

Game features:

  • Intense gun and melee combat, with high-stakes. Enemies are smart, use cover, and deal high damage

  • Emergent gameplay mechanics mean each combat encounter is unique and no playthrough is quite the same

  • Everybody is infected, and everybody comes back

  • AI controlled teammates bring chaos to the battlefield

  • Physics-based world with high interactivity

  • Innovative mechanics for a top-down shooter, like latching zombies you need to shake off, physics doors, and swimming

  • Line of sight and hearing particles - see only what your character can see and see what your character can hear

details.name: Mechanized Corps: Rebirth
details.detailed_description:
Mechanized warfare is reborn! Welcome to Mechanized Corps: Rebirth. Set in the critically acclaimed Dark Horizons Universe, this reimagining of Max Gaming's 2016 action shooter,  Dark Horizons Mechanized Corps, follows the success of 2024's tabletop wargame.

THE SETTING

The year is 2361. Three hundred years have passed since Cold War rivalries culminated in nuclear war. Humankind has expanded beyond the Earth, colonized the SOL system, colossal space stations hang in orbit, and Mars has claimed independence. Governments and corporations now struggle to control the system's natural resources and giant walking war machines, collectively known as Mechanized Corps (MCs).

The SOL system is in relative peace, with Factions (Nations, Corporations, Mercenaries, and Trade guilds) settling differences in minor skirmishes or arena-style battles.  How long will this peace last and degrade back to massive battles?

GAMEPLAY

Players take control of these Mechanized Corp units, armed to the teeth with Gatling guns, missiles, lasers, and more. Fight offline or online and earn credits to improve your machine with more powerful weapons, flight systems, shields, cloaking devices, and orbital bombardments.

Fighting for their faction or taking up arms as corporate mercenaries, MCs currently fight in large combat zones in the squad-on-squad challenges to head off all-out war.

Mechanized Corps (MCs)

Select from four classes: Scout, Infantry, Heavy, and Assault, with three different chassis.

Each MC is fully customizable, with engines, jump jets, and dozens of weapons and equipment choices. You can also apply custom paint jobs to stand out from the crowd or blend in with your squadmates.

Tailor your MC to fit your play style, choose your battlefield role, and build the most lethal machine. Destroy the opposing team before the clock runs out!

CURRENT FEATURES

  • Instant Action (play offline with AI-driven squad mates versus AI enemies)

  • Multi-player (fight online with friends against AI opponents or take on other players head to head in online arenas.

  • Manage your pilot (review stats and change faction allegiances)

  • Squad Management (Create or Join a Squad for online gameplay)

  • MC Hanger (Select your chassis, edit it, buy a new chassis, and create your ultimate machine of war!)

  • Campaign missions are not currently available.

Do your duty. Serve your people. Pull the trigger!

Future releases may include additional units, weapons, maps, and game types.

reviews.review:
Lets begin with the obivious (which is also stated in the store page) the game currently lacks any form of campaign and story. The game has been released as early access for people to try out the combat system and mech loadouts and I have no complaints about either of these things but neither of these things are feature complete. 

For what it currently is, the AI Is better than what it is in mechwarrior 5 - it can kill enemies on it's own. MCR has great The combat is basic but decent the game potential to be something truly unique in the future. 

TLDR: solid framework for a game that has potential.

It's a good start game. Waiting for campaing and mission to get out but the bases is good. Skirmish is ok. You can be 8 players at a time. And server is easy to make. I enjoy it. There is 12 chassis of mech to choose from. Make the mech you want with the weapon you want. Just watch overheating.
please make a game based on exos! more of a relalistic approach like the Exos from Avatar movie or the Power loader from aliens something like that!

The game isn't too bad, customization is interesting, you can setup your weapon groups, a good place to build upon.

However, there is currently no Campaign so you can either fight Bots or do Multiplayer. However, there are no players unfortunately, at least when I tried to search for a match so I couldn't join one. I played a few skirmish matches against bots, the bots were pretty simple and would run into each other if they got too close. Other than that, they just seem to focus on your cockpit.

I might pickup the game in the future if it gets a larger playerbase, but right now I don't see myself playing it.

This game is one of the best I've ever played. I am a huge Mechwarrior fan and got into Mechwarrior at a very young age and always found it to be quite cool. This game popped up for sale as early access and I decided to check it out because it seemed very similar. The spirit of Mechwarrior does, in fact, live in this game. I have had contact with the developers who are very nice people and care very much about putting out a quality indie game. As far as game play, it's very fun. We have a lot weapons and a good amount of mechs to play with. If you can find multiplayer games, it's a real joy to get to play and the devs are even involved more often then not. They take feedback from the community (as long as it's reasonable feedback) and are working hard in their spare time to make a truly glowing product. So for I am really enjoying this and do not regret having this title at all. It has a long way to go but I am proud to own this. I suggest it to anyone who likes this type of game. Easy 10/10 for me.

details.name: Polyfocus
details.detailed_description:
Have you ever thought pomodoro timers were too boring or limited in features to keep you from using them and staying consistent? 

Polyfocus is a gamified productivity app to help you stay focused and get stuff done! 

Customizable timers, reward/progression systems, task lists, journaling, analytics, and lots more features to come in further developments. 

Just need a pomodoro timer to use right now? I've got you covered! Polyfocus Demo is just that with some additional but limited features you can customize and use to your own preferences.

*Polyfocus will support both game and non-game versions for users to choose in the public beta options.

details.name: Spectrum Siege
details.detailed_description:
A Strategic Battle for Grid Domination

Dive into the vibrant world of Spectrum Siege, a turn-based strategy game where every move reshapes the battlefield.  Starting from an 11x11 grid, three colors clash in a tactical struggle to conquer the most territory. Easy to learn, but deeply strategic, Spectrum Siege offers endless possibilities for clever moves and bold strategies.

Core Gameplay

  • Jump and Conquer: Leap over adjacent opponent cells to claim them and expand your control.

  • Dynamic Grid: Watch the board transform as every jump changes the color landscape.

  • Outthink Your Opponent: Plan your moves carefully to capture the most cells while blocking your rivals.

Key Features

  • Singleplayer & Multiplayer Modes: Test your skills against NPC opponents or challenge friends in local.

  • Simple Yet Deep Mechanics: Perfect for casual players and hardcore strategists alike.

  • Vibrant Visuals: A sleek, colorful design that brings the game board to life.

  • Endless Replayability: With different starting setups and player strategies, no two games are ever the same.

Who Will Control the Grid?

Will you dominate the board with cunning tactics, or will your opponents outmaneuver you? Whether you’re a fan of strategy games, puzzles, or intense competition, Spectrum Siege is your next addiction. Jump in and show your true colors!

details.name: No More Deep
details.detailed_description:
No More Deep is a first-person shooter and puzzle-solving survival horror game that tells a bizarre yet captivating story.

Wenster Town was once a flourishing settlement renowned far and wide, but after a meteorite incident, it faded into oblivion. When the protagonist, Jack, returns to the town that raised him, he discovers everything has changed. The village haunted by creatures known as “Worm-Men”. He meets a beautiful woman named Asalia, who claims to be the “goddess” of the town—yet she seems deeply intertwined with the “Worm-Men”. What force turned this prosperous hometown into a desolate ruin? What secrets lie behind Asalia? And what is the“Worm-Men”? Players will guide Jack through the abandoned streets and the hidden world within, facing horrifying creatures and mysterious powers to unveil the secrets buried for so many years.

Key Features:

  • An immersive bodycam system that delivers an exceptionally realistic horror experience

  • A distinctively designed Victorian Gothic town created with Unreal Engine 5

  • The latest UE5 MetaHuman technology, bringing the protagonist to life with realistic facial expressions and animations

  • Intense, adrenaline-pumping combat against a variety of monsters and formidable bosses

  • Comprehensive clue-inspection, item-inspection, and assembly systems, plus robust resource gathering and allocation mechanics

  • An immersive dialogue system offering an RPG-like experience, where different choices lead to various quest outcomes

details.name: Indoor Baseball
details.detailed_description:
The highly anticipated follow up to Indoor Kickball!

Indoor Baseball is BIGGER, better, and even more destructive!

Indoor Baseball is a 1v1 baseball game played in the rooms of your house! Play in a goofy story mode to work your way up to make the school baseball team. Play a 14 game randomly generated season mode, or quick play 1v1 in a local multiplayer match against a friend or CPU.

Each field has their own unique ways to hit home runs:

  • Smash through the window in the living room

  • Hit the ball into the mini hoop in the bedroom

  • Ding the ball into the toilet in the bathroom

  • Dozens of other insane ways to hit home run

  • Break through windows for home runs

  • Avoid physics obstacles to field the ball and run the bases

  • Destroy too much and you may run in to an angry parent during your game

  • Play in a randomly generated season mode

  • Make it to playoffs for a chance to win the Championship

  • See if you can lead the league in home runs!

  • After getting cut from the school's baseball team, you are determined to prove you belong on the team

  • Play enough games to work your way up the ladder to get another try out for the team

  • Destroy too many things and your parents might make you do some chore mini games through out your journey

All Features:

  • Dozens of unique ways to hit home runs, unique to each field.

  • Throw from a selection of 10 different pitch types, depending on your character selection.

  • Choose from a 12+ different characters, each with their own strengths and weaknesses.

  • Unlock home run celebrations, home run explosions, and strike out celebrations/taunts

  • Play through a ridiculous story mode to see if you can improve enough to make your school's baseball team.

  • Play through a randomly generated 14 game season to with the championship.

  • Challenge a friend and play 1v1 local multiplayer (*requires controller for 2nd player)

  • Will Angry Mom or Angry Dad make an appearance to ruin your destructive fun?!

details.name: Black Pieces Move First
details.detailed_description:
A humble black pawn decided to challenge the first rule of chess. The white pieces were not happy about this at all. The result? War.

A PAWN WITH A GOAL

Control the black pawn across various chessboards, following the rules of movement, defense, and attack from classical chess but with a twist: the black pawn has the movement capabilities of a king and can push black pieces, commanding them to attack on your orders.

A SHOP TO GEAR UP

The pawn is not alone!

YOUR BRAIN WILL MELT!

The puzzles will require logical thinking, agility, and creativity to find solutions and achieve the objective of each level (there are 60 levels with progressively increasing difficulty).

There is also a story mode with a world map, collectibles, and an item shop, where you can gather money to purchase upgrades as you progress through the game.

Innovative chess-based game with a captivating story of rebellion.

details.name: My Virtual Friend
details.detailed_description:
My Virtual Friend is a desktop pet/Tamagotchi-like, where you can go through your day accompanied by your favorite character(s). Play with them, or just have them follow what you're doing throughout the day, your friend is always there for you.

Always with you

Treat your friend like a pet in a box, or disable the window entirely for a truly immersive experience.

Integrations

My Virtual Friend is compatible with other programs on your computer (can run alongside other virtual pet/wallpaper tools, as well as on top of games). It also knows what you're doing and can change its behavior if you're watching movies, listening to music, and more!

Shopping

Take care of your characters to unlock new clothes, backgrounds, music, characters, and more.

Features

  • Adorable companions: 4 different, quirky characters to accompany you

  • Customizable characters: Personalize your characters' look and interact with them in meaningful ways.

  • Focus & Relax: multiple unique instrumental music playlists designed to help you focus or relax while you work.

  • Dynamic integrations: Your friend reacts to what you're doing on your computer

  • Multi-language support

reviews.review: nice

I once had a girlfriend. Then I didn't. Darkness had come to my soul.

Now the Sun, that Bombastic Sun of Romance has broken through the grey clouds of blackberry jam in the old shoe of my skibidi soul.

She has Come and has lifted by Soul to Ascension Heaven. We are One, We are Bonded. We. Are. Married.

8==) *** {{}}
While this isn’t my usual type of game, I can see the passion and effort that went into it. Fans of the genre may have a great time!
Cute pomodoro tracker.
I like it. Cute.
Nice idler, very customizable! The better version of a pet rock :)
This game is simple but great. Sometimes it's fun to watch youtube with someone and now I can, with my pet Rock, Sticky.
"I've been waiting, for a girl like you, to come into my life. I've been waiting, for a girl like you, to make me feel alive." - Foreigner
Cured my depression
Finally I have a friend

Very nice idler game version of a desktop pet. The music is nice enough, I like the work feature as well, and it's nice to have her bring out popcorn while youtube runs. The option to customize is nice, but it looks great already so it's not too needed.

Bought this game out of curiosity and it has been quite fun! I love how it sits there without being intrusive, occasionally interacting in a way that feels natural and entertaining. It’s the perfect mix of engaging yet unobtrusive, making it ideal for keeping open while working, browsing, or gaming

Bought this game on a whim this morning and kept it open while working from home. A fun addition you place somewhere on your screen that is not disrupting anything and even interacts from time to time. I love that you can make the background transparent which allows you to click-through it so it doesn't block some buttons (like top right browser buttons). There are customisation options you can unlock as well to change the avatar. 10/10

It's exactly what it says it is: a customizable character that looks at the direction of your mouse and does some animations from time to time.
What makes this game good to me are the animations. They make the character feel alive and are satisfying to watch. The clothing options also look good.

Can recommend if you want to have something cute on your screen that you can look at from time to time.

This is dope—it's like having a personal sidekick who watches movies with you, reminds you to drink like an overprotective mom, and just hangs out while you pretend to be productive. Best part? You can make the background disappear, so it doesn't block your actual distractions. 10/10, my new best (and only) friend.

details.name: Radioactivity - Onboarding
details.detailed_description:
Overview:

You and your friends are hired as Liquidators—a crew meant to transform a wasteland back into its pristine state. Before you are allowed to enter the radioactive wilderness, you’ll need to complete the onboarding process and prove your grit.

What's in it:

- Participate in an onboarding process that includes training for new Liquidators and show your skills in an exclusion area control point #001.

- See what it's like being a WEA Liquidator with most of the major mechanics from the full game available.

- Take a glance at the radioactive wilderness on top of the wall — your future work site.

- Stay alert: something dangerous happened at WEA-001 Control Point, and you might be asked to help…

details.short_description: You are a Liquidator! Together or alone, complete your training in this free co-op survival horror FPS demo and master core mechanics. Learn to work along radiation, handle weapons and essential tools, and discover what the future cleanup of a dangerous, radioactive wilderness looks like.

details.name: Kraken's Canvas
details.detailed_description:
Experience the ocean through a child's eyes to confront the legendary Kraken in this amazing hand-drawn adventure.

Embark on a wonderful underwater journey unlike any other! Guide a tiny fish through the mesmerizing depths of the ocean, from sun-drenched reefs to the eerie midnight zone.

Dive into a breathtaking underwater world brought to life by the vibrant, imaginative drawings of a 6-year-old artist. This isn't just a game, it's a journey of wonder and discovery.

Survive the Depths

Explore diverse ocean regions: Sunlit Zone, Coral Reef, Twilight Zone, Midnight Zone, and the Mariana Trench. Feast on krill to grow bigger and stronger, then battle fantastical fish from a child's imagination, each more bizarre than the last.

On each level, confront colossal bosses guarding the depths, including the legendary Kraken!

A Unique and Heartwarming Experience

Hand-drawn Art: Immerse yourself in a visually unique world created by a child's boundless imagination. Easy-to-learn controls with challenging encounters.

Discover the secrets of the deep and unravel the mysteries of the ocean.

Download now and embark on an unforgettable underwater adventure!

details.name: Perpession
details.detailed_description:
* This game's visuals and content are subject to change as it is currently under development.

From Ruin to Revival: Forge Your Destiny in Perpession

In the desolate remains of what was once a thriving metropolis, you awaken to the world's harsh reality after the fall. Welcome to Perpession, where civilization has crumbled, and survival hinges on your ability to manage resources wisely. Amidst the ruins, you start with nothing but the clothes on your back and a handful of scavenged tools.

The land is a patchwork of dangerous territories, a mystery of potential threats or untapped resources. You'll need to navigate through abandoned places, negotiate with or combat the remnants of humanity, and uncover hidden caches left by those who came before.

Your mission? Rebuild from the ashes. Establish your settlement, fortify defenses against unidentified creatures and mutated beasts, and cultivate the scarce fertile lands into productive farms. Each decision in Perpession shapes your future, demanding strategic thinking to balance exploration, combat, and the meticulous management of your resources.

The echoes of the past whisper through the ruins, hinting at knowledge lost to time. Can you unravel these secrets to power up your civilization, or will you succumb to the perils of this post-apocalyptic world? In Perpession, every step you take, every alliance you forge, and every battle you fight could be the difference between resurgence and ruin. The land is yours to reclaim - if you dare.

Game Features

  • Turn the desolate wasteland into a beacon of hope! Manage your survivor's needs - food, water, shelter, and safety. Gather building resources. Your survival depends on your ability to adapt to the harsh environment.

  • From makeshift tools to advanced tech, craft everything you need to survive. Start with basic recipes like crafting a spear or an axe. As you explore, find recipes to create more complex items like advanced weaponry or watchtowers.

  • Efficiently manage your limited resources - food, water, scrap, and energy. Decide whether to invest in immediate survival tools or long-term projects like expanding your base or upgrading your gear.

  • Engage in strategic, turn-based combat where every decision counts. On your turn, choose your action - attack, defend, use an item, or retreat. Plan your moves carefully, considering enemy weaknesses, your position on the tactical map, and the environment. Employ special abilities to outmaneuver your foes, whether they're bandits, mutated creatures, or remnants of the alien invasion. Each turn is an opportunity to use strategy over brute force, making every battle a chess game where the stakes are survival.

  • Explore different biomes, from caves to overgrown urban jungles, each with unique resources and dangers. Delve into "dungeons" like old military bunkers, abandoned skyscrapers, or alien crash sites to uncover lore, fight unique enemies, and find rare resources.

  • Uncover the story of humanity's fall through artifacts and encounters with the remnants of the alien invasion. As you progress, you'll learn about different alien species, their technology and perhaps even communicate with or fight against surviving alien forces.

  • Rebuild from the ruins by establishing your own settlement. Choose where to rebuild, what to prioritize - farms, defenses, or workshops. Defend your burgeoning city from mutated beasts or alien threats with walls, automated defenses, or trained fighters.

details.name: Mythic Mire
details.detailed_description:
Mythic Mire is an RPG with a horror aesthetic and dark surreal vibes. Turn-based battles and light environmental puzzling await. Experience the liminal locations and and quirky NPC’s within!

Faeya is a courageous canid who is driven to find out why her fellow villagers were murdered and to bring them back to life, if she can. Along her way she finds 3 digital “Pixies” who become her companions, each with a unique power.

  • JRPG structure, with turn-based battles and 4 party members to control.

  • Retro CGI FMV sequences like those from the PS1-era, used in cutscenes and spell animations.

  • Survival horror-style puzzles where you find clues and answers in the environment.

  • Creative abilities for each party member that add strategy and minigames.

  • Eclectic soundtrack featuring dark, moody atmospheres and head-banging metal.

  • Hand-drawn pixel art to tickle your fancy.

  • Cute animal-people!

  • Surreal worlds with dream-like and nightmarish creatures... and eccentric NPC’s!

details.name: SAGE
details.detailed_description:
Leap into SAGE, a cozy social game about frogs, friendship, and magic fantasy.

Join other fledgling mages in your adventure guild on a mission to become a SAGE. Help build mushroom villages, collect unique resources, complete bounties, learn spells, and customize your frog in this cartoony fantasy world.

Features

  • Relaxing social guild with daily magic classes and bounties!

  • Collaborative village building with up to 20 players!

  • Day night cycle with regular global events!

  • Collect creatures of different elemental type and rarity!

  • Tons of cosmetic items to make your frog stand out!

  • Plenty of unique NPCs who need your help!

  • Lots of objects with faces (even if they shouldn’t)!

details.name: Insanity locked
details.detailed_description:
Can you survive the night?

Trapped in a relentless cycle of fear, you must survive against a deadly enemy using only your wits, tools, and a phone. Each night brings new challenges, requiring you to manage resources, monitor security cameras, complete objectives, and earn money through side jobs to upgrade your defenses. As the nights progress, the danger increases—adapt, strategize, and endure, or fall victim to the terror.

Key Features:

  • Survive the Night: Outsmart and evade the lurking danger before it gets to you.

  • Phone-Based Mechanics: Use your phone to access security cameras, call for help, and activate defensive tools.

  • Jobs & Economy: Earn money by taking on side jobs, then use your earnings to buy vital upgrades and equipment.

  • Progressive Difficulty: Each night becomes more challenging, pushing your survival instincts to the limit.

  • Custom Difficulty Mode: Adjust various settings to create your own terrifying experience.

  • Immersive Horror Atmosphere: Experience intense fear with dynamic lighting, eerie sound design, and unexpected scares.

Do you have what it takes to last until morning?

details.short_description: After a violent accident, you wake up in intense pain and take pills for relief. But they cause disturbing hallucinations. Trapped in a cycle of pain and visions, you search for answers, buy upgrades, lock doors, and monitor cameras, hoping to find a way out of this nightmare.

details.name: Ninja Skills
details.detailed_description:
In this point and shoot adventure, you will learn how to throw shuriken and arrows to destroy targets. Dodge obstacles and swing your sword to cut your target in half. With a progressive increase in difficulty, the challenge becomes interesting. Learn to be a ninja and all the skills that this deserves.

90 levels with challenges typical of a ninja.

6 skills to perfect.

4 game modes according to your skills.

1 night mode to make the most of your ninja vision.

You will test your skills, response time, coordination and aim.

name: Chinese Mythology: Journey to the West

details.name: Chinese Mythology: Journey to the West
details.detailed_description:
Break away from the existing mainstream commercial engine model, meticulously sculpting every detail from scratch, with the hope of providing you with a unique gaming experience.

At the lowest price, we aim to deliver the most complete Journey to the West experience.

In the game, players will play the role of Tang Seng, Wukong, Bajie, and Sha Seng Master and Apprentice, each with its own characteristics. Play the role of Tang Seng, Wukong, Bajie, and Sha Seng, each with its own characteristics.

Experience a total of 45 levels including Shuangcha Ridge, Liangjie Mountain, Shepan Mountain, Guanyin Zen Temple, Heifeng Mountain, Fuling Mountain, Futushan, Huangfeng Ridge, Liushahua River, Wuzhuang Temple, Baihu Ridge, Wanzi Mountain, Baoxiang Country, Pingding Mountain, Yalong Mountain, Wujiguo, Zuantou Mountain, Hengyang Valley, Chechi Country, Tongtian River, Jindou Mountain, Jieyang Mountain, Xiliang Female Country, Dudi Mountain, Huaguo Mountain, Huoyan Mountain, Cuiyun Mountain, Jilei Mountain, Luanshi Mountain, Jingzhi Ridge, Xiaoleiyin Temple, Qijue Mountain, Qilin Mountain, Pansi Ridge, Huanghua Temple, Shituo Ridge, Shituo Country, Biqiu Country, Xiankong Mountain, Wuyin Mountain, Baotou Mountain, Zhujie Mountain, Qinglong Mountain, Shewei Country, and Daleiyin Temple.

Each level corresponds to the route of Journey to the West, where monsters will come at the player like a tidal wave, and after defeating the level boss or meeting special conditions, the player will pass the level, unlock rewards and unlock the next level. Players can gain experience to upgrade after defeating monsters, and each upgrade will have several upgrade options for players to choose one of them, increase the character value, get magic weapons, upgrade magic weapons, as they continue to upgrade, players may become more and more like a fish in water, but the monsters will not sit still, and over time the monsters will also use more powerful means, including strength increases, increased numbers, etc.

Collect a total of 7 treasures: the Purple Gold Bowl, the Brocade Robe, the Completion Document, the Tightening Hoop, the Forbidden Hoop, the Honey Heart Sutra, and the Wind Stabilizing Pearl, with the possibility of adding more in future updates.

From design, development, art, music to distribution, we insist on using the same personnel throughout the entire process to ensure the overall unity of the work without a sense of disconnection. We aim to provide everyone with a pure gaming experience.
details.about_the_game:
Break away from the existing mainstream commercial engine model, meticulously sculpting every detail from scratch, with the hope of providing you with a unique gaming experience.

At the lowest price, we aim to deliver the most complete Journey to the West experience.

In the game, players will play the role of Tang Seng, Wukong, Bajie, and Sha Seng Master and Apprentice, each with its own characteristics. Play the role of Tang Seng, Wukong, Bajie, and Sha Seng, each with its own characteristics.

Experience a total of 45 levels including Shuangcha Ridge, Liangjie Mountain, Shepan Mountain, Guanyin Zen Temple, Heifeng Mountain, Fuling Mountain, Futushan, Huangfeng Ridge, Liushahua River, Wuzhuang Temple, Baihu Ridge, Wanzi Mountain, Baoxiang Country, Pingding Mountain, Yalong Mountain, Wujiguo, Zuantou Mountain, Hengyang Valley, Chechi Country, Tongtian River, Jindou Mountain, Jieyang Mountain, Xiliang Female Country, Dudi Mountain, Huaguo Mountain, Huoyan Mountain, Cuiyun Mountain, Jilei Mountain, Luanshi Mountain, Jingzhi Ridge, Xiaoleiyin Temple, Qijue Mountain, Qilin Mountain, Pansi Ridge, Huanghua Temple, Shituo Ridge, Shituo Country, Biqiu Country, Xiankong Mountain, Wuyin Mountain, Baotou Mountain, Zhujie Mountain, Qinglong Mountain, Shewei Country, and Daleiyin Temple.

Each level corresponds to the route of Journey to the West, where monsters will come at the player like a tidal wave, and after defeating the level boss or meeting special conditions, the player will pass the level, unlock rewards and unlock the next level. Players can gain experience to upgrade after defeating monsters, and each upgrade will have several upgrade options for players to choose one of them, increase the character value, get magic weapons, upgrade magic weapons, as they continue to upgrade, players may become more and more like a fish in water, but the monsters will not sit still, and over time the monsters will also use more powerful means, including strength increases, increased numbers, etc.

Collect a total of 7 treasures: the Purple Gold Bowl, the Brocade Robe, the Completion Document, the Tightening Hoop, the Forbidden Hoop, the Honey Heart Sutra, and the Wind Stabilizing Pearl, with the possibility of adding more in future updates.

From design, development, art, music to distribution, we insist on using the same personnel throughout the entire process to ensure the overall unity of the work without a sense of disconnection. We aim to provide everyone with a pure gaming experience.
details.short_description: This is a casual lawn mowing game with Journey to the West as the backstory and rogue elements. Grow by killing monsters, gaining upgrade options, challenging bosses, fighting your way out, and unlocking more levels, characters, and magic weapons!

details.name: Bally Fears : The Paradox
details.detailed_description:
Bally Fears: The Paradox – Exploration, Survival, and Mysteries

In Bally Fears: The Paradox, you play as Reyes, a young child around ten years old. His mother has recently passed away, but he doesn't know it yet. His father brought him to his office to protect him. The game begins when he calls you… to warn you about something.

An intense psychological survival horror

Bally Fears: The Paradox is a narrative-driven survival horror game combining exploration, puzzles, and stealth. Your goal is to navigate an oppressive environment while escaping the creatures that hunt you. As you progress, you must gather clues to uncover the truth behind this nightmare and the strange events surrounding you.

Key Features

  • Immersive exploration – Interact with your environment, find essential items like keys, access cards… and that strange eye. Curiosity is your best ally.

  • Survival-based gameplay – You are vulnerable. Hide, run, and find ways to escape the lurking monsters.

  • A dark and heavy atmosphere – They are watching you. They are waiting for the right moment to strike.

  • Between reality and paradox – Your memories blend, your perception deceives you… What is real, and what is not?
