details.name: Forsaker:DingDing&Blade
details.detailed_description:
"Forsaker:DingDing&Blade" - The prologue of Ian's storyline, up to Chapter 1, Section 3, tells the beginning of the fateful encounter between two young boys and the person destined to change their lives...

This demo version offers approximately 2 hours of gameplay, featuring simple yet engaging card battles, giving players an early glimpse into this unexpected adventure. For more exciting content, stay tuned for the official release of "Forsaker:DingDing&Blade"!

Game Introduction

A Combat-Integrated Visual Novel

Set in a tripartite world of Humans, the Divine Corpus Church, and Forsakers.

Two rustic youths’ seemingly routine mission spirals into a crimson odyssey, unveiling a cannibalistic game rife with conspiracies and moral crossroads.

Narrative：

200,000+ words interweave three narrative threads – can you assemble the shattered truth?

Combat：

Narrative-driven combat balances challenge with accessibility. Still difficult? Activate Lazy Mode to bypass battles instantly.

Cast:

【The Red-Haired Demon of Siguo Village】【Forsaken Mint】【The Legend of Pass Canyon】

Ian, chosen as the male lead for his affordable fee, initially became discouraged when he learned his character would be a disabled yet determined man. By human standards, Ian is a formidable fighter, but unfortunately, his enemies are all far from human. As the indispensable lead, your task is to ensure he makes it to the end!

【The Relentless Survivor】The Big Sister Leader】【The Lost King of Pass Canyon】

Flame is a runaway lady both inside and outside the story. Don’t be fooled by her panda-like appearance into thinking she’s an easy target. She may seem tough, but beneath it all, she has a softer side. As your strongest ally in this journey, try to understand her heart and help her solve her dilemmas!

【I’m more than just a pretty face】【The Silent Bride】【The Wilderness Survival Girl】

Pupeti is a rising influencer brought into the project for her popularity, though her acting is subpar, so she’s been written as a “blank-slate” character. Her on-screen presence is striking, and she looks stunning in photos. Yet, deep down, she holds intense hatred and a desire for revenge. You’ll need to help her achieve it!

【The Early Bird King】【Polite and Refined】【Best Suited for Working in a Control Room】

Guy is a naturally talented actor who ended up with the wrong script but still works relentlessly, constantly pushing his physical limits. His dreams are lofty, but he's already found the key. Now, it’s up to you to help him fulfill his aspirations at any cost.

Game Features

[Epic Narrative: A Multilinear Mystery]

1. Expansive Storytelling: 250,000+ words of meticulously crafted prose unveil the merciless survival laws of the continent of Hel.

2. Interwoven Perspectives: Employing a multi-POV narrative structure, each chapter advances through distinct protagonists' viewpoints. Initially fragmented storylines gradually converge into a mosaic of revelations.

3. Mystery of Blood and Threads: Truth lies scattered across perspectives like puzzle shards. Only by traversing every character's fate can players reconstruct the ultimate narrative closure.

[Sensory Pilgrimage]

1. Meticulously crafted stages breathe life into a hauntingly beautiful world.

2. Multiple CGs and Gothic-styled character portraits amplify the unique art style.

3. Melancholic melodies intertwine with storytelling for therapeutic immersion.

[Barrier-Free Narrative]

1.Exclusive Lazy Mode delivers seamless narrative consumption.

2.Prioritized emotional design – witness every plot twist without interruption.

[A Combat-Integrated Visual Novel]

1. Card duels evolve organically with plot developments, forging a symbiotic story-mechanics relationship that deepens narrative immersion.

2. With narrative progression, players will encounter various characters and can recruit some of them as allies during combat.

3. Classic roguelike setup demands tactical adaptation against escalating chapter Bosses

You'll struggle as a fragile human, blood-soaked knight, or flesh-devouring Forsaker. Devour or be devoured—yet your fate dangles by unseen strings. Choose: cling to this broken world... or forsake it.

details.name: 皇帝麻将 Demo
details.detailed_description:
关于Demo版本的内容说明：

在Demo版本中，玩家可以体验到游戏的核心玩法。我们开放了游戏的基础模式——帝业模式，并投入了3位皇帝、约半数的大臣和伟业，以及全部计策。完成一局完整流程的游戏大约需要20-30分钟，完全通关Demo则至少需要3次左右的游戏循环。如果想要完全探索Demo中的全部游戏内容，则需要大约3-5小时。

注：此Demo版本中的部分角色技能及美术资源为临时版本，由于角色限制，部分羁绊效果也无法达成。

以下是完整版游戏的介绍：

皇帝麻将是一款中国历史题材的牌组构筑游戏，以传统麻将为基础，展现帝王之路的博弈与权谋。在游戏中，你将扮演有名的君王，搭配各具才能的大臣、伟业，提高文治与武功，抵御天灾人祸，创造属于你的太平盛世！

打破时间的束缚，文臣武将皆为你所用，灵活搭配伟业、计策、锻造，触发意想不到的联动狂潮，每次抉择都将走向不同的结局！

  •  皇帝：30位皇帝，适配不同的战术。

  • 牌库：每位皇帝拥有特色牌库，带来多种玩法和胡牌体验。

  • 大臣：200名文臣武将，各自拥有独特的能力。

  • 兵法：36种计策，在不同时机使用，操控战场局势。

  • 伟业：50种伟业奇观，提供长期增益。

  • 锻造：6种锻造材质，提升拥有的麻将牌。

  • 称号：100种称号与结局等你探索。

五虎上将？五龙同朝？四大美女？集齐有关联的大臣即可激活羁绊，带来超强效果，哪一组是让你心动的梦幻联动呢？

帝业模式

  • 基础游戏模式，以坚持25个回合为目标，期间应对种种挑战。

  • 全随机的大臣、伟业、计策、手牌，每次都是全新体验。

  • 通过每轮游戏不断完善收藏，解锁新的皇帝和大臣。

无尽模式

  • 帝业模式的延续，继承全部搭配。

  • 挑战更高分数，探索阵容极限。

剧情模式

  • 模拟指定皇帝的故事，迎战预设好的关卡与挑战。

  • 体验来自更多朝代的游戏内容。

details.short_description: 《皇帝麻将》是一款以中国历史为背景，将传统麻将与策略构建结合的游戏。玩家能够使用几乎所有的中国历代皇帝，招募大臣与策略决断，在对局中利用多种手段应对挑战。通过游戏来重现甚至改变历史故事，编写你的帝王之路。

details.name: You Die Today
details.detailed_description:
YOU DIE TODAY

Step into a dungeon-crawling adventure that combines the strategic depth of deck-building with the thrill of rolling dice. Inspired by the magic of tabletop RPGs, this game brings you a unique rogue-like experience where every roll counts.

Key Features:

  • Deck-Building with a Twist: Collect powerful cards with unique abilities and build your ultimate deck.

  • Dice of All Kinds: Use D4s, D6s, D8s, D12s, and even D20s to unleash devastating effects. The dice you roll can trigger card effects, grant extra bonuses, or turn the tide in encounters.

  • Tabletop-Inspired Gameplay: Feel the excitement of rolling dice and making critical decisions, just like in classic tabletop fantasy games.

  • Dynamic Encounters: Face off against fantastical foes, tackle challenges, and discover secrets hidden in the dungeon.

  • Replayability: Each run offers a new combination of cards, dice, and choices, ensuring no two adventures are alike.

Can you forge your path to victory or will the dungeon claim you? Test your strategy and luck in this fresh take on the rogue-like genre!

Why This Game?

If you love the strategic depth of card games, the thrill of rolling dice, and the immersive storytelling of games like Dungeons & Dragons or Baldur’s Gate 3, this game is designed for you. We've crafted a unique experience that captures the spirit of tabletop fantasy and brings it to life in a rogue-like format.

Will "YOU DIE TODAY"?

Can you forge your path to victory or will the dungeon claim you? Test your strategy and luck in this fresh take on the rogue-like genre!

Why This Game?

If you love the strategic depth of card games, the thrill of rolling dice, and the immersive storytelling of games like Dungeons & Dragons or Baldur’s Gate 3, this game is designed for you. We've crafted a unique experience that captures the spirit of tabletop fantasy and brings it to life in a rogue-like format.

Will "YOU DIE TODAY"?
details.short_description: Combine deck-building and dice-rolling in this tabletop-inspired roguelike dungeon crawler! Roll D4s, D6s, D20s, and more to activate powerful card abilities and conquer dynamic encounters.

details.name: Queen Naeja's Desires
details.detailed_description:
《Queen Naeja's Desires》—Interactive Novel Game

Overview
Queen Naeja's Desires is a historical romance role-playing game blending time travel, political intrigue, and emotional choices. Players take on the role of Feng Yufei, a modern-day agent reincarnated as the Sixth Princess Consort of the Lingxiong Empire. Trapped in a treacherous royal court, you must wield wisdom and supernatural abilities granted by a mysterious system to unravel conspiracies, rewrite fate, and carve your legend amidst the whirlwind of power and passion.

Core Features


▌Masterpiece Music, Immersive Soundscapes

  • 17 original symphonic tracks: Professionally recorded to mirror the story’s tension, from eerie dungeons to opulent palaces, crafting an epic auditory experience.

  • Theme song "Phoenix Consort: Rebirth": Ignites emotional resonance during pivotal moments, embodying the princess’s struggle and awakening.

▌Dynamic Cinematics, Emotional Intensity

  • 32 cinematic dynamic videos: Exquisite micro-expressions, political clashes, and combat highlights rendered like ancient scrolls, immersing players in conspiracies and romance.

  • Living scenes: Flickering candlelight in dungeons, drifting plum petals in courtyards, dynamic weather, and shifting light breathe life into the world.

▌Reborn in Time, Defy Destiny

  • Transition from a modern agent to a disgraced princess consort, fighting for survival in a hostile world.

  • Use the "Medical System" to neutralize poisons, employ "Political Scheme Deduction" to outwit enemies, and reclaim control over your fate.

▌Courtly Intrigue, Deadly Gambits

  • Navigate complex relationships with the cold-hearted Prince Murong Yichen, enigmatic mentor Jiang Hanfeng, and devoted Emperor Murong Yunyi.

  • Switch roles between consort, healer, and strategist while balancing alliances with the Empress, concubines, and the Dowager.

▌Supernatural Systems, Rewrite Reality

  • Medical Mastery: Diagnose toxins, craft antidotes, and even reverse death with acupuncture.

  • Charisma Arts: Influence emotions through dialogue, turning foes into allies or puppets.

  • Resource Domination: Rebuild power from a derelict theater, amass wealth, and reclaim your throne.

▌Branching Paths, Entangled Destinies

  • Forge an alliance with the icy prince Murong Yichen, uncovering shocking truths behind the "poisoning conspiracy."

  • Choose to flee with mentor Jiang Hanfeng or rekindle a forbidden romance with the Emperor.

  • Every decision shapes your fate, unlocking dozens of endings, including "Reign Supreme," "Secluded Freedom," and "Crimson Vengeance."

Why Choose Queen Naeja's Desires?

  • Ruthless Politics: Intricate schemes with layered twists rivaling palace drama novels.

  • Emotional Depth: Nuanced characters, from a tyrant prince’s hidden tenderness to a rival concubine’s lethal facade—no stereotypes here.

  • Freedom to Define Your Path: Become a benevolent healer, a cunning strategist, or a seductive femme fatale—the throne is yours to claim.

details.name: Seeker
details.detailed_description:
Find answers in a futuristic dystopian city

You wake up in an abandoned district armed with nothing but a sword and basic body augments. A man draped in dark clothing waits nearby. Your journey begins anew, Seeker.

Seeker is a 2D action-exploration game in a charming pixel style. You play as a bounty hunter tasked by a mysterious benefactor to hunt down and harvest the various robots lurking in the area.

Explore a vast city

Seize control over your own fate and truly conquer each and every corner of this broken world. Meet new friends, foes, and uncover hidden gems!

Segmented Bosses

Attack specific parts of giant robots to disable their attacks or impede their movement! Cut off legs or destroy turrets, fight to kill and happy hunting!

Hunt and collect

Take bounty requests from NPCs around the world and hunt down dangerous robots! Most targets have specific parts that bounty givers would love to get their hands on, be careful to not destroy them!

Fight with style

Your moveset encourages quick thinking in the heat of combat. Dash, slide, and grapple your way to victory!

Continuous enhancements

You may receive unique equipment throughout the game that grants game-changing effects to your kit! Some can only be obtained if specific parts of bosses are preserved, pay attention to the vital components listed by the bounty.

Features

  • Side-scrolling action adventure game

  • Fast and snappy player movement

  • Dash, slide, and grapple around the battlefield

  • Interactive bounty system to track your targets

  • Upgrade yourself through the item and augment systems

  • Dialogue system with multiple choices

  • Meet new characters along your journey

  • Segmented bosses

  • Rewarding precise gameplay

Planned Features

As this game is still in early development, there are many features yet to be implemented in the Playtesting version.

  • Style Points: Gain style points when performing certain actions and consume your style points to regain health or use special moves!

  • Base Building: Repair abandoned areas in each zone and customize them to suit your liking! Bases serve as fast travel points as well as containing special stations only found there!

  • Rougelike Game mode: Dive into the simulation and experiment with different augments, builds, and face enhanced versions of fallen foes! There may even be new encounters found exclusively in the simulation.

  • Community inspired boss fights: I would love to add fellow content creators as optional boss fights into the game! These will not impact the main game and be purely side content for players and creators to enjoy!

details.name: Food Wagon
details.detailed_description:
Embark on an Epic Culinary Adventure with Lanya, the Legendary Hero's Daughter!

One peaceful day, while running a restaurant with her retired parents, Lanya finds herself whisked away to a mysterious new world by an inexplicable light. This new world is cursed by the gods, a place where cooking is forbidden. However, immune to the gods' curse, Lanya becomes the one and only chef in this strange land. Join Lanya on her journey to showcase the wonders of flavors and reclaim the freedom of cooking, all while finding a way back to her original world.

Hunt, Eat, and Survive

To live, you must eat. Scour the surroundings for sustenance. Sometimes, survival means a good tussle. Before you faint from hunger, hunt down monsters, gather ingredients, and cook up meals. Cooking is your trusty companion. Perhaps, mystical flora and fauna may grant you new strengths.

Impress the Locals with Your Culinary Masterpieces

As the sole chef in this world, tantalize the taste buds of its inhabitants with mouth-watering dishes. Break free from traditional recipes, choose your ingredients freely, and create your unique cuisine. Imagine grilling chunky cuts of meat with roughly chopped vegetables over a fierce flame and finishing with a spicy kick. Or, concoct a nutritious meal with powerful ingredients and rare herbs. You might even throw in a playful secret flavor now and then. Someone might just fancy your mint-seasoned chicken skewers! As people savor your valuable dishes, they'll reward you with appropriate treasures. Fill the bellies of the world while lining Lanya's pockets.

Venture into Rugged Lands

This world is brimming with unknown threats. Feast on power-boosting meals, serve delicious food to others, and grow stronger with the earnings. When you're ready, journey to new lands filled with rare delicacies and treasures. Explore procedurally generated forests, swamps, and snowy mountains.

Challenge the Gods of Taste

For some reason, the flavors are returning to the mortal realm. Surely, the gods have taken notice of you. Hunt down the powerful boss monsters created by the gods to stop you and earn your rewards. Ultimately, challenge the gods themselves. Your fight for the freedom of cooking may lead you to discover a way back to your original world at the end of your adventure.

name: 自动战斗：银河将军 Automatic Battle:Galaxy General

details.name: Automatic Battle:Galaxy General
details.detailed_description:
Overview:

This is a sci-fi space strategy, puzzle-solving, adventure, and combat game featuring an innovative combat system. Players can devise combat strategies, assign specific ships, and customize ship modules according to their preferences. The game boasts multiple endings and optional side quests. After completing the main storyline, players can engage in endless battles against special AI enemies that adjust their combat deployments based on the situation, albeit somewhat rudimentary at the outset.

Features:

The unique combat system employs a hands-off design. Will it be boring? Not at all. Before combat, players must strategize their deployments to outwit enemies. Victory hinges not just on ships and equipment but crucially on skills and commands. During combat, players must closely observe ship behavior and make adjustments accordingly. The main storyline provides intelligence information (only once), while side quests offer hints or allow for independent reconnaissance (the flagship in the first position can be infinitely repaired but at the cost of one side quest opportunity).

Like playing cards, you have a rough idea of your opponent's hand and their potential moves (each pirate general has several fixed configurations). Based on intelligence and victory conditions, players must devise their tactics (e.g., lure enemies into a trap, capture the ringleader first, focus on breaking through, etc.).

Instructions:

I have already uploaded some strategy guides and explanatory videos to Bilibili. Currently, the game has integrated tutorials. There are 4 difficulty levels in the game now; the first two levels are available for exploration and trial play, allowing players to get familiar with the game's weapons and mechanics, while the latter two levels are designed for challenges.

  • The early game may feel somewhat tedious (the initial chapter), mainly focusing on teaching basic functions such as installing weapons, selecting suitable weapons and armor, configuring unassailable tank ships, understanding skill effects, command effects, and the impact of different terrains. (Note that some side quests are challenging.) The game improves significantly with the introduction of later elements and the main storyline, and the maximum number of ships per battle will also be reached.

  • Overlapping displacement commands and skill triggers in the game can lead to unexpected outcomes (like commanding a soldier to move forward for 60 seconds and then backward within the same 60 seconds, resulting in an unpredictable result).

  • Formation is optional for fast-moving ships; slower ships may be defeated before they can even form up. (So choose wisely.)

Future Plans:

The game will be updated or receive DLCs based on its popularity in the future, with content roughly including the following:

  • Level System: Adding more levels.

  • Character System: Introducing a character interface for roles. This includes illustrations, detailed background stories, special skills, or abilities.

  • Weapon System: Adding more weapons and equipment.

  • Ship System: Introducing more ships.

Long-term Vision:

  • City System: This may require a significant amount of time and effort.

  • Sovereignty System

  • Economic and Trade System

  • Others: Random items, blueprint crafting, spaceship production, alien creatures, among other things.

details.name: 灵童 Demo
details.detailed_description:
Lingtong Demo "is a demo version of the game" Lingtong ", with a trial experience of about 50-60 minutes.

At present, this version only has automatic save function and does not provide manual save function temporarily!

This version allows you to experience all the content of the first chapter of the game!

The female protagonist Anxi and her four companions arrived at a famous tourist village - Tianfu Village. When they checked into a homestay, a series of strange things happened. The companions died, disappeared, and the eerie cries of children were everywhere. What secrets were hidden behind this? 

Ling Tong "is a new Chinese style horror suspense puzzle game. 

The game elements include Chinese horror, bizarre and strange talk, suspense and puzzle solving, combined with rich puzzle gameplay~

A movie, a strange dream 

Originating from a homestay?

Can Lingtong help you achieve your long cherished wish and make your wishes come true?

 

There is a scenic spot called Tianfu Mountain in Tianyin Town,

 

Originally, there was no road on this mountain, but later everyone discovered it was' Ling Mountain '

Not only did it repair the road, but it even had an elevator leading straight to the mountaintop

You see, this is already very convenient

 

I always keep repeating the same dream

In my dreams, I always wanted to go to a place where they kept repeating the same sentence

Worship the spirit child and achieving their dreams

 

I still remember someone killed me in my dream, were they? Or He?

details.name: So Far Up
details.detailed_description:
Traverse your way to the top of the world in this physics-based climbing game—now available in both VR and non-VR modes!

In VR, use a single motion controller to push yourself off surfaces and climb higher.

Prefer to play without a headset? The new non-VR mode lets you experience the same physics-based adventure using just your mouse. Whether in VR or on a screen, the challenge remains the same—how far up can you go?

   

    

Don't rush to finish the game or set new records! Take your time in enjoying and completing the game by utilizing the SAVE GAME and CHECKPOINT system. Take many breaks and continue with a fresh mind to complete the game more easily.

When obstacles feel overwhelming, pause, take in the scenery, and let the calm wind remind you to breathe.

Gain patience, build perseverance—this game is not meant to hurt you . . . .

                                                                                                          . . . . but to heal you*

*not a medical advice

details.name: Farmer’s Market Simulator
details.detailed_description:
Embark on a journey of transformation in Farmer’s Market Simulator! After leaving your high-stress corporate job, you decide to follow your dream of building a peaceful life in the countryside. Take over your own farm, grow fresh produce, and manage every aspect of your business. But the story doesn’t end at the fields—run your very own market and sell your goods directly to your customers.

In this immersive farming and business management game, you’ll plant crops, tend to animals, and carefully plan your production to maximize profits. Use your hard-earned skills to expand your market, upgrade your farm, and create the ultimate agricultural empire. Every decision counts—what will you grow, and how will you thrive?

reviews.review:
Still recommended, but I enjoyed this less than the free level. Many parts just feel somewhat sloppily drawn and the cat proportions are a bit all over the place. It just comes across a bit lazy compared to the gorgeous art of the other two levels.

After about half hour of play I'm only missing 3 cats, so this difficulty level feels about right, certainly easier than the extra level.

The first extra level was difficult.
This one is a real relaxing level. I could find all cats without problems.

it was actually really relaxing.  150 items to find, some were really hard, others weren't as hard - but weren't easy either.

it was worth it!

This really is relaxing, and for cat owners and lovers, you can just meander through and pick the kitties, or the bits of kitties you can see. The music is great, I'd forgotten how much I liked it, and I was delighted to see the sections colour in as I went. Its not as frantic as the other two levels even though there are 150 cats to find. Tune in to the shape of a cat and get going and reveal the completed coloured map!
Good game. Recommended.

details.name: 《'点'到为止》
details.detailed_description:
《点到为止》 is a light 2D shooting game centered around clicks! The game lasts about 2 hours and includes over 15 levels!

Players will play as an elite team of 5 firepower fighters in the game - Tian WeiMing, by clicking to eliminate enemies and bullets, protecting partners to complete the level.

Core gameplay - easy to pick up points!

Eliminate enemies and bullets by moving the mouse and clicking! Protect your allies from harm in the enemy's wave of attacks!

(No matter what you encounter, just click it!)

Game features

Youth story: In addition to battles, it also includes a small amount of text stories and simple animations; You will be able to witness a youth drama on the battlefield: stories about the team members! This will also be your first step in uncovering the mystery of the world of superpowers.

Partner Assistance: Unleash powerful partner skills in battle! Even if you are not good at action games, you can still experience the fun of intense battles!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Do you want to know the latest development progress of 《点到为止》? Please follow Bilibili account: Kuaiyou Games;

Join the official QQ group: 1015092142, and give direct feedback on your ideas to the producer!

details.name: SCP: Autophobia
details.detailed_description:
For her entire life, the girl known only as SCP-053 dreamed of the outside of her cell. But when 99% of humanity is erased, she gets a twisted version of what she had once desired.

Take on this adventure, visit and revisit dangerous locations, collect items and materials, and build the last shelter against the end of the world!

  • Engage in missions or expeditions to dreadful locations where the terrifying SCPs roam the shadows!

  • Collect items, food, medical supplies and resources for yourself and your Base!

  • Build tools and equipment in your Base in order to increase your chances of survival and to progress in the journey!

  • Cooperate with unique characters and prepare your shelter to welcome as many fellow survivors as you can!

  • AVOID PROXIMITY TO OTHER PEOPLE!

SCP-053's anomalous effect makes it so anyone who makes physical or eye contact, or is near her for extended periods, becomes irracional and aggressive - they will then display an illogical but unstoppable determination to kill SCP-053. For this reason, she is kept confined in the Site-70 Containment Facility.

However, when a cult summons the infamous Broken God, his judgement falls upon humanity and the world is left to abandonment. The few who remain - less than 1% of the population - are at the hands of misfortune, the apocalyptic desolation, and the countless terrifying creatures that have now escaped the cages of the SCP Foundation.

Will you be able to survive the end of humanity, and, moreover, will you join the remaining few in search of answers and a way out?

SCP: Autophobia is an indie game by a solo developer. The game is in early access, and will receive frequent content updates - still, the game is designed to have sufficient replayability as it is. Feel welcome to join our community to support the project, as well as SCP Gaming in general. Together we can make beautiful things.

details.name: Project:13.42㎡
details.detailed_description:
Project: 13.42㎡ is a uniquely designed VR wallpaper game that integrates rich building and interactive elements. In this virtual world, you have complete freedom to design and construct your own personalized space. Whether it’s a cozy and warm little house, a futuristic tech-filled room, or a fantastical otherworldly scene, you can create it all just the way you like. The game supports the use of VR controllers to interact with various objects in the environment, allowing you to touch and adjust every detail yourself to craft a truly one-of-a-kind space.

You can temporarily escape the constraints of reality and immerse yourself in a world that is entirely your own. Whether you’re looking to relax, explore your creativity, or simply experience a way of life completely different from the one you know, this game is designed to meet your expectations. You’re not just building a scene; you’re creating a spiritual haven where your dreams and emotions can take root. We hope this game brings you an immersive experience like no other, offering you a fresh perspective to rediscover the beauty of life.

details.name: 1000 Missiles: Defense of Tornwa
details.detailed_description:
Missile Defense Game: Protect Your Country, the coastal country of Tornwa.

Goal: Defend your nation from 1000 enemy missile attacks using Anti-Aircraft (AA) systems.

Instructions:

  • Placing AA Systems:

    • Left-click on an empty land square to place a basic AA system (Cost: 1 Resource).

  • Upgrading AA Systems:

    • Left-click on an AA system to upgrade it to a fast-shooting AA system (Cost: 2 Resources).

    • Right-click on an AA system to upgrade it to a fast-shooting AA system (Cost: 2 Resources).

  • Game Controls:

    • Press P to pause and unpause the game.

    • Press R to restart the game.

    • Press E to restart in Endless mode.

Key Mechanics:

  • AA System Replacement: The resources used to build your AA systems are gradually replaced by the undestroyed factories, marked in orange. This means the more factories you lose, the fewer resources you will have to build and maintain your defenses over time.  

  • Willpower: Losing factories, houses, and apartments reduces your willpower.

  • Adaptability: The enemy will employ various strategies to breach your defenses. Stay adaptable to survive.

Defend Your Nation: Use strategic placement and upgrades of your AA systems to fend off relentless missile attacks and protect your country's infrastructure. Are you ready to face the challenge?

details.name: Ghost Shock
details.detailed_description:
"Ghost Shock" is an asymmetric single-player action game.

At the beginning of the battle, the player controls a hero with extraordinary power. After being defeated, he will randomly turn into a monster, and the monster that gets the last blow will turn into a hero and continue to fight.

In the end, the player will challenge the boss controlled by three ghosts, or control the boss with two ghosts to meet the challenge of the hero.

[Death is not the end]

The death of the hero does not mean the end of the game. The ghost who defeats the hero will be reborn and transformed into a new hero. The defeated hero will become a soul servant controlled by the demon until he defeats the hero and resurrects again.

[Equipment Matching]

The hero can collect teeth as trophies to buy more powerful equipment and skills. Match a variety of weapons, equipment and skills to build different combat styles. You can choose to use long-range skills for continuous consumption, or use sharp melee attacks to defeat the enemy. The strategy and style of the battle depends entirely on your choice.

[Monster Evolution]

Loyal servants can receive the gift of the demon. Monsters can consume psychic energy and choose to evolve into one of two new forms, using more powerful dark forces to easily defeat the hero.

【Boss Battle】

As a victory condition for the game, the hero will challenge the boss controlled by three ghosts. If the hero can successfully defeat the boss in three challenge opportunities, he will win the game. On the contrary, if the hero unfortunately loses in the third challenge, the three ghosts will win together.

name: The Little Pixel That Could Demo

details.name: The Little Pixel That Could Demo
details.detailed_description:
The Little Pixel That Could

Step into the pixelated shoes of The Little Pixel That Could, a brave little pixel on a mission like no other. You must traverse a labyrinth of hard drives, firewalls, and glitch-filled data streams to complete your ultimate goal: deleting the browser history of your owner. As you dive deeper into this cybernetic odyssey, you’ll uncover fragments of his life—memories of joy, regret, and secrets best left forgotten.

Each level brings unique puzzles, platforming challenges, and a slowly unfolding story. Unlock new abilities as you decode the story, and piece together the true meaning behind this peculiar request.

Will you succeed in wiping away the past, or will the memories you uncover change your perspective forever?

The demo contains 5 out of 21 available story levels, no advanced levels, and no achievable hats. 

Challenging Platforming Levels

Story Rich

Retro-Inspired Visuals

In Short...

Dive into a bittersweet journey of memory, identity, and redemption. The Little Pixel That Could is more than just a game—it's a reflection on the things we leave behind.

As you dive deeper into this cybernetic odyssey, you’ll uncover fragments of his life—memories of joy, regret, and secrets best left forgotten.

Each level brings unique puzzles, platforming challenges, and a slowly unfolding story. Unlock new abilities as you decode the story, and piece together the true meaning behind this peculiar request.

Will you succeed in wiping away the past, or will the memories you uncover change your perspective forever?

The demo contains 5 out of 21 available story levels, no advanced levels, and no achievable hats. 

Challenging Platforming Levels

Story Rich

Retro-Inspired Visuals

In Short...

Dive into a bittersweet journey of memory, identity, and redemption. The Little Pixel That Could is more than just a game—it's a reflection on the things we leave behind.
details.short_description: The Little Pixel That Could is puzzle-platformer about a daring pixel on a mission to delete the browser history of its enigmatic owner. Traverse hard drives and firewalls to piece together the fragmented memories of the owner's life.

details.name: Oblitus mortis
details.detailed_description:
Oblitus mortis

Face mythological creatures and legends from Venezuelan folklore, explore this entire interconnected world and enjoy a game in the purest style of the Metroidvanias classics, with a cute little twist.

 

Find new and different weapons, unlock secrets with each enemy you defeat, wear different hats and masks to improve your skills.

You will face legendary creatures such as La Llorona, whose lament torments the forests, Dr. Knoche and his Galipán mummies, the Hachero.  Every enemy, every area, every Object is filled with folklore and mythology.

Immerse yourself in a dark world inspired by the legends and myths of Venezuela. With pixel art graphics, this game will take you to explore the most mysterious and dangerous corners of this land.

reviews.review: Not perfect but funny and full of folklore
Excelente Juego, divertido, con la dificultad adecuada, ambientación original e interesante, 10/10.

Maybe i'm bias due to my nationality, regardless... this is an OUTSTANDING game, filled with passion and soul, my ovation to the responsible.. Sir you are one creative mind, please carry on with you passionate development, i sure hope this is not the end of this game, and that we'll see, either future installments or DLC. My best Regards.
Solid 8/10!
game-play may need polish and tune, but ideas and premise are great.
JUEGAZOOOO, el mejor juego que he jugado hecho en Venezuela, es hermoso ❤️

Indie metroidvania filled up with Venezuelan culture and references, definitely worth the price, great game-play, fair difficulty, it's amazing it was develop by one person, and the 8 bits art it's so colorful and vibrant and full of personality, can't wait for any new updates, it's a fun game that you can submerse yourself in and explore the lore of the land.

viva Venezuela en esa mierda caballero!

A little indie metroidvania developed by one person.  The overall game can be ended in around 6 hours, which is a good price / time play ratio.

[b]Game[/b]
The game in itself is nothing fancy, but if you give it a chance you will probably like it. Saving and life restoring requires (in game) money. At first this prospect might seems terrifying, but once you understand the game mechanics, you will have more money that you actually need. Indeed, when looking at all the object to buy, the first impression is: there is lots of money grinding to do. Take my advise don't bother buying the steeper object first.

[b]Boss battles[/b]
The battle aren't really hard and can be a bit repetitive, but for a one person game they still worth the detour.

[b]suggestions[/b]
The developer is open to suggestion to improve the game, so don't be afraid to drop by the discussion board to give them.

This Indie game really surprised me, it is surprisingly deep and the progression feels really nice, it has a lot of focus on story and world building as well, and the puzzles where fun, it has a ton of potential, hope to see more from them

details.name: Remembrance
details.detailed_description:
Unravel a Mind in Crisis. Save a World in Peril.

Remembrance invites you to dive deep into the fractured memories of Professor Isaac Nemeth, a brilliant but broken scientist whose revolutionary work holds the key to humanity’s survival. Guiding Dr. Bell, a renowned psychologist, you’ll navigate surreal landscapes, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover the haunting truths buried in his subconscious.

A World of Mystery and Emotion

Explore a series of richly detailed, dreamlike environments that represent the professor’s most pivotal and painful moments. From a star-filled childhood bedroom holding the promise of a bright future to the chaos of his shattered laboratory and a broken life, every memory offers a glimpse into the choices that shaped the man and the secrets he’s desperate to hide.

Key Features:

• Immersive VR Gameplay: Experience the game’s intricate world and emotionally charged story from a fully immersive, first-person perspective.

• Thought-Provoking Puzzles: Solve mind-bending challenges that mirror the professor’s fragmented psyche.

• Emotional Narrative: Dive into a deeply human story of ambition, loss, and redemption.

• Richly Crafted Worlds: Traverse environments that blend memory, emotion, and a lifetime of regret.

Will You Be the Key to Humanity’s Salvation?

Remembrance is more than a game, it’s a journey through the depths of memory, morality, and hope. Step into the professor’s mind and discover what remains when everything else is stripped away. The fate of the world and the legacy of a lifetime are in your hands.

details.name: FORGIVE FOR EVER
details.detailed_description:
Born as a Divine Messenger, Carrying the Will of the Gods

                                Only when past desires are fulfilled, can one ascend.

                                         Listen to the Beings, Unveil Their Wishes

                         Weigh good and evil, and bestow blessings and punishments.

                              The Flower Will Eventually Wither, Tears Will Run Dry

                                        Until the Ether, where reunion will come.

———————————————————————————————————————————————
                                                          *The Road of Legends*

                       Legend has it that if a person has an extraordinarily strong wish,
                               and this wish is so intense that it can move the gods,
                   the gods will guide them to the place where the wish can be fulfilled.

                                                     *The Messenger of the Gods*

                                        The crows can help people fulfill any wish.

                                                      *Equivalent Exchange*

                 Those who have their wishes fulfilled must pay the corresponding price.
————————————————————————————————————————————————

In this war-torn era, people are powerless to resist the torrent of fate and can only place their hopes in the gods.
As a divine messenger, you must complete your mission—help those pitiful believers fulfill their wishes!
In the game, you will meet three important visitors with distinct personalities. They will tell you their sorrowful pasts.
When their wishes are fulfilled, the price will come as promised.
Is this truly a blessing from the gods, or a trick of fate?

How far can human willpower go, for important people, for freedom, for belief?

In this game of wishes and punishment,
you, how will you decide?
————————————————————————————————————————————————
Gameplay includes cards, platform, click-based interactions, and chase sequences.
As a divine messenger, the player will use card mechanics in the Prayer Room to help NPCs fulfill their wishes.
Players must judge the correct option based on the shapes on the cards and the text prompts
choosing the true desire of the wishers and the price they must pay, in order to successfully complete the transaction.

In the chase levels, you will navigate through the Ether Land, filled with bizarre buildings that reflect the wishes of the characters.
Be careful not to be caught by other divine messengers, and protect yourself from their attacks while countering them!

When all the deals are perfectly concluded, the truth will slowly come to light.
————————————————————————————————————————————————

    When the falling flowers vanish, and the spring snow melts, all hope will meet its end.

     No matter how the wheel of fate condemns me, I will wait for you in the same place.

                    So please remember my voice, until the moonlight fades away.

details.name: In Ashes
details.detailed_description:
Answer the call...


About the Game

You were a hero once, but could you be again?

The sleepy town of Hwen promised peace, but it was not meant to last. Your fragile peace is shattered when a familiar face arrives with a plea that pulls you back into the life—and the wounds—you left behind. It’s time to step into the boots of a weary, former hero.

Do you rise above the ashes of the past, or will they shape your future?

Features

📜 Your Story, Your Legacy: Customise your hero’s name, pronouns, and personality to shape the world’s perception of your hero.

⚔ Fulfilling Skill System: Choose between 9 different skills to craft your ideal play style. Each skill comes with unique dialogues, combat options, and challenges.

🎭 Dynamic Personality System: Combine traits to create a layered protagonist. Your choices shape how the world responds to you. There is no right hero, only the one you choose to be.

☠️Tactical Combat, Real Consequences: Quick, impactful decisions determine your survival. Use the skills, items, and relationships available to you to win battles.

👑 The Valour System: Earn Valour by making choices that best align with your hero's strengths and values. Use it to turn the tide in battles where every decision matters. Being true to who you are could save your life.

💕Complex, Evolving Companions: Lead your party through the Everwood. Learn their pasts, secrets, and ambitions. 

🌀 Multiple Endings, Driven by Choices: Every decision shapes your story, leading to a variety of endings influenced by relationships, moral dilemmas, and your chosen path. Each ending is unique to your hero and their final party. Who will you become by the end of your journey? 

Note: Endings are not limited to romance, but relationships do influence them.

🎨 A passionate team: In Ashes is created by a small, but extremely talented team of a single character artist, one background artist, and one developer. Each one giving their all!

Characters 

Coming Soon.

Credits

Studio Ephua: Direction, Writing, Programming, & GUI

Betto: Character art

Vui Huynh: Background art

Mari Ma: Chinese translation

Leon Auros: French translation

facuseghezzo: Spanish translation

About the Developer

Ephua is a micro-studio dedicated to creating immersive, thought-provoking tales.

We believe stories are a universal truth, and humans are at the heart of them.

details.name: Goblin's Gamble 24
details.detailed_description:
GOBLIN'S GAMBLE 24 – NO ONE IS SAFE!

Goblin's Gamble 24 is a survival game where bluffing, courage, and sudden betrayals reign. There is only one revolver on the table – but no one knows what will come out of its barrel. Every round is a surprise, and every trigger pull turns a new page of fate.

THERE'S NO ROOM FOR COWARDS IN THIS GAME!

In each round, a player is randomly chosen as the Challok (the Challenger) and faces off against a rival. The other player becomes the Defok (the Defender), and both reveal their cards. Whoever has the higher hand gets control of the revolver.

If the Challok wins, they can only shoot the Defok.

If the Defok wins, they can target any player on the table.

But beware – sometimes the barrel is empty. And sometimes... it’s the end.

How to Play

Goblin's Gamble 24 is an exciting card game that blends strategy and luck, playable online with up to 4 players. Players challenge each other each round, making high-stakes decisions to eliminate their opponents. Here are the basic rules of the game:

Starting the Game

  • Each player is dealt 2 cards. There are two decks in play: Diamond Deck and Crown Deck (numbered 1 through 12).

  • Every player starts with 200 health.

Turn Flow

  • Challok Selection: A random player is chosen as the "Challok" (Challenger) each round.

  • Card Draw: All players, except the Challok, have 20 seconds in turn to draw a card (optional, maximum 1 card) and must reveal one card onto the table.

  • Challenge: The Challok selects an opponent, making them the "Defok" (Defender).

  • Reveal Hands: Both the Challok and the Defok reveal their hands. The player with the higher total card value wins.

  • Punishment: The punishment is completely random, determined by the revolver's bullets:

    • Yellow Potato: -20 Health

    • Green Tennis Ball: -40 Health

    • Blue Marble: -60 Health

    • Red Firework: -80 Health

    • Empty: No effect.

    • Black Cannonball: Instant Execution, the player is eliminated from the game.

Busted Condition

  • If a player's total hand value exceeds 24, they are "Busted" and their hand value becomes 0.

  • If the Challok is busted, the player with the highest hand value gets to shoot the Challok.

  • If all players are busted, the round ends with no winner, and the game proceeds to the next round.

Bluffing and Strategy

  • You can bluff and play your cards strategically to mislead your opponents. Timing and strategy are key to securing victory!

Game End

  • When a player’s health reaches 0, they are eliminated.

  • The last remaining player wins the game!

THERE'S NO ROOM FOR COWARDS IN THIS GAME!

In each round, a player is randomly chosen as the Challok (the Challenger) and faces off against a rival. The other player becomes the Defok (the Defender), and both reveal their cards. Whoever has the higher hand gets control of the revolver.

If the Challok wins, they can only shoot the Defok.

If the Defok wins, they can target any player on the table.

But beware – sometimes the barrel is empty. And sometimes... it’s the end.

How to Play

Goblin's Gamble 24 is an exciting card game that blends strategy and luck, playable online with up to 4 players. Players challenge each other each round, making high-stakes decisions to eliminate their opponents. Here are the basic rules of the game:

Starting the Game

  • Each player is dealt 2 cards. There are two decks in play: Diamond Deck and Crown Deck (numbered 1 through 12).

  • Every player starts with 200 health.

Turn Flow

  • Challok Selection: A random player is chosen as the "Challok" (Challenger) each round.

  • Card Draw: All players, except the Challok, have 20 seconds in turn to draw a card (optional, maximum 1 card) and must reveal one card onto the table.

  • Challenge: The Challok selects an opponent, making them the "Defok" (Defender).

  • Reveal Hands: Both the Challok and the Defok reveal their hands. The player with the higher total card value wins.

  • Punishment: The punishment is completely random, determined by the revolver's bullets:

    • Yellow Potato: -20 Health

    • Green Tennis Ball: -40 Health

    • Blue Marble: -60 Health

    • Red Firework: -80 Health

    • Empty: No effect.

    • Black Cannonball: Instant Execution, the player is eliminated from the game.

Busted Condition

  • If a player's total hand value exceeds 24, they are "Busted" and their hand value becomes 0.

  • If the Challok is busted, the player with the highest hand value gets to shoot the Challok.

  • If all players are busted, the round ends with no winner, and the game proceeds to the next round.

Bluffing and Strategy

  • You can bluff and play your cards strategically to mislead your opponents. Timing and strategy are key to securing victory!

Game End

  • When a player’s health reaches 0, they are eliminated.

  • The last remaining player wins the game!
details.short_description: An online multiplayer survival card game filled with bluffing, courage, and strategy! There's only one revolver on the table, and you never know what will come out of its barrel. Challenge your opponents, make strategic decisions, and be the last one standing!

details.name: Welcome Home
details.detailed_description:
Welcome Home is a psychological horror game that immerses you in the unsettling life of a secluded village preparing for its annual festival. Experience a chilling tale of tradition, trust, and terror, narrated through your journey of uncovering dark secrets and making choices that determine your fate.

  • PSX Style

  • 12 NPCs

  • Stealth & Survival

  • Multiple Endings

The game is around 30 - 60 minutes long depending on your skills and playstyle.

Warning: This game contains themes of religious rituals, unsettling imagery, blood, violence, and psychological distress.

details.name: ShowMeSpeed Demo

Welcome to ShowMeSpeed!

This is a small demo of a very hard 2D platform game. It’s all about fast moves, perfect timing, and beating tough levels.

What’s in the demo?

  • Challenging Levels: Can you finish them all? It won’t be easy!

  • Simple but Cool Graphics: Classic arcade-style visuals.

  • We Need Your Feedback: This demo is here to see what you think and if we should make the full game.

Try it out, have fun (or rage), and tell me what you think!
Every comment counts in decision if I will move forward with the full game, which I would really do even if I have a single fan who enjoys it :)

details.name: Suki Suki Love
details.detailed_description:
WHAT IS SUKI SUKI LOVE?

SUKI SUKI LOVE IS A PSYCHOLOGICAL HORROR REALITY SHOW, WHERE DISCOVERING THE SECRETS AND SINS OF ITS PARTICIPANTS WILL LEAD YOU TO A DARK AND INEVITABLE ENDING.

WILL YOU BE ABLE TO KNOW THE TRUTH THAT HIDES BEHIND THIS WORLD?

IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR YOU!!

WELCOME, CURIOUS SOULS, TO MY WONDERFUL REALITY SHOW! I AM ARTEMESIA, YOUR LOVELY HOST AND CREATOR OF THIS LITTLE PARADISE CALLED SUKI SUKI LOVE。

HERE, EVERYTHING STARTS LIKE A SWEET DREAM: A NORMAL DAY, ADORABLE GIRLS TO MEET AND A WORLD THAT SEEMS DESIGNED JUST FOR YOU.

BUT DON'T BE MISTAKEN... THIS PLACE HAS RULES, AND EVERY SMILE, EVERY LOOK, HAS A PRICE. YOUR MISSION WILL BE SIMPLE: GET TO KNOW THEM, DISCOVER THEIR SECRETS AND DECIDE HOW TO MOVE FORWARD.

YOU DON'T NEED TO KNOW EVERYTHING FROM THE BEGINNING, I'LL BE HERE TO GUIDE YOU... AT LEAST, AS FAR AS NECESSARY. DON'T WORRY, IT'S NOT THAT HARD... IT JUST REQUIRES A LITTLE INTUITION, SOME CHARM AND MAYBE... A TOUCH OF CRUELTY?

DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO PLAY MY GAME?

HERE, SMILES ARE MASKS, LOVE AN ILLUSION AND THE PRICE OF TRUTH CAN BE HIGHER THAN YOU IMAGINE. BUT DON'T WORRY, I'LL BE WITH YOU EVERY STEP OF THE WAY, WATCHING YOU. SO, ARE YOU READY TO JOIN? I'LL BE WAITING FOR YOU.

Features:

  • Featuring jaw-dropping animations!

  • Unique melodies for each character and situation!

  • Memorable characters.

  • All scenes and characters in Full HD (1080p).

This game contains disturbing content and is therefore not suitable for children or sensitive or impressionable people.

reviews.review:
This game has a unique premise which leaves me wanting more. However I imagine it is set up for future installments yet I still feel I wanted more from this one as it seems to end quite abruptly. 

The characters I think are made using Koikatsu Party but that isn't a bad thing as combined with the colour palette and trippy visuals it makes for a fun and unique visual style.

From what I can see the game has four possible endings depending on your choices which seems ok for the price point however as I said before it ends just as it reaches a high point which left me slightly disappointed and wanting more.

I assume this is the devs first game and for a horror themed VN it is a good start. Not sure why this doesn't have more reviews so here is mine.

One final note, I had no issue with the English translation like another review said.

This game has a lot of charm and a lot of potential, but is very confusing especially for an american audience. The premise of it is hard to grasp at first but when things start coming together the first act is very interesting for puzzle solving. This game is definitely worth it IF the future chapters for the game are paid for by buying this game. If you speak spanish I believe you will likely understand this game a lot better, but otherwise the first act seems to act like a tutorial. I hope translation and story direction gets better with future installments, but it is hard to say if I will purchase another game for the steep price point. Hopefully the second installment will be included in this game. I will likely be dropping a youtube video on this soon. yt: cringe is key.

details.name: The Sixth Sorrow
details.detailed_description:
“And a sword will pierce your own soul also.”

Things haven't felt right since the accident. Your mother's passive aggression, your father's refusal to speak, and strange things around the house... Are they unable to move on, or is something even more sinister lurking beneath the surface?

Dark Secrets

  • Be a part of a character-driven narrative as you unravel a mystery engulfed in grief, sorrow, and maternal love. 

Unsettling Atmosphere

  • Be immersed as you explore creepy environments that each feature their own eerie sound design and captivating retro aesthetics.

Choices Matter with Multiple Endings

  • Engage in interactive dialogue that shapes your relationships and how the story unfolds. With multiple endings and hidden secrets, more than one playthrough is encouraged.

Interactive Mechanics

  • Gameplay extends beyond simple key collection, featuring minigames and puzzles that engage players and advance the narrative.

details.name: Billy's Tower
details.detailed_description: This is Billy's Tower, a game about climbing. This is our first game we've made, along with being our first published. In Billy's Tower, your goal is to climb to the moon. You will have to jump from many passing platforms. Along your way you might encounter some obstacles. First, you will see "Evil Billy". His goal is to either knock you off, or kill you. Next, you'll see a blimp. This blimp will go back and forth hoping to knock you off. After a long time of climbing, you'll reach the end. Do you think you could do it?

details.name: Delta Z. INC
details.detailed_description:
Welcome to Delta Z Incorporated!

We are the pioneers of reanimant technology. Thanks to our company, even the dead do not sleep, and businesses nationwide have seen a dramatic rise in productivity. Delta Z utilizes ethically-sourced bodies and, through its patented preservation and repurposing process, revitalizes them into specialized workers, known as reanimants. These reanimants can be customized and fitted with modules to suit any job.

As our new reanimant repurposing technician, it is your job to prepare reanimants to suit the requirements of our clients. Every shift, you will receive a list of requests from our most esteemed clients. Use the terminal provided in your office to implement the provided modules into a reanimant to meet the client’s specifications and ship it to one of our many fulfillment facilities. While Delta Z Incorporated strives to provide only the best for our clients, employees are reminded that they have a budget quota to maintain. Please be considerate of providing for the needs of our clients while keeping costs as low as possible.

Your job as a reanimant repurposing technician:

  • Repurpose

You will be provided with a reanimant and a collection of company-issued modules at your disposal. Find the best combination of modules to turn the blank canvas that is your reanimant into a custom-made work of art. Keep a close eye on the client’s requirements to provide them with the perfect reanimant for the job!

  • Repair

While you will be working with some factory-fresh reanimants, it is common for our older models to be returned to one of our many advanced facilities, either when their rental period has expired or when the reanimant in question has accrued too much wear to perform their job effectively. These old and damaged models can be brought back to full function with your help! Delta Z’s technology ensures that all reanimants are highly modular and can be fitted with new parts just as easily as the first day of their manufacture. Simply remove old and damaged parts and replace them with new ones to send them walking to their new purpose, good as new!

  • Recycle

Got old, damaged, and unnecessary modules taking up space in your queue? While such used parts may provide just as much function as their newer counterparts at a reduced cost, Delta Z’s brand new recycling initiative allows employees to send unwanted modules in for scrapping in return for a useful bonus to their budget. Do your part to keep Delta Z green* and running at full efficiency!

*Delta Z invests into green initiatives and does not take part in their own programs.

details.name: Misterios Ocultos
details.detailed_description:
Misterios Ocultos is a first-person horror video game that immerses you in an intense and mysterious experience.

Jason, the host of the TV show "Misterios Ocultos," is forced to venture into an abandoned hospital known as Rasto to rescue Mike, his missing reporter. What seemed like a simple rescue mission turns into a nightmare when he discovers that experiments with creatures and paranormal phenomena were being conducted in the facility, led by a mysterious doctor.

Explore dark hallways, collect key items, solve clues, and navigate oppressive environments filled with tension. You'll need to keep your composure to uncover the truth hidden in the corners of Rasto... and survive whatever lurks in the shadows.

Key Features:

  • A horror story with elements of mystery and suspense.

  • First-person gameplay focused on exploration and interaction.

  • Terrifying environments and an oppressive atmosphere.

  • Medium-length gameplay, ideal for a complete experience without being overly long.

details.name: Jump & Hook Demo
details.detailed_description:
Jump & Hook Demo has a simple concept, use your hook to climb up.
use your momentum and swing upwards, use the environment to twist your rope, there are endless ways to climb higher. 

Gameplay

Jump & Hook Demo is a precision platformer 2d singleplayer game, in which you control a tiny robot with a grappling hook, use your grappling hook to latch into the objects and swing by bouncing off the environment or by moving side to side and sling yourself upwards!

consider adding the game to your wishlist!

but you must be mindful as you decide when to release the hook - if you fail to get where you want to be, you'll fall down, there are no check points but if you are fast you can save yourself by hooking into objects on the way down.

Goal

your objective is to get to the top, the demo features 6 different screens that you need to pass through to prove that you've truly mastered the art of the grappling hook, each screen introduces new problems that you need to solve to progress, such as using objects to wrap the rope around, latching only from the top and more!

Freedom

the game offers the freedom to decide how to get upwards, find the optimal path and keep improving your high score!

Good luck!

details.name: Mining Company
details.detailed_description:
Your mining company has taken out a loan on a new spaceship. To pay it off, you must fly to nearby asteroids and mine through caves to collect and sell gems. The cash you earn can also be used to travel to new asteroids with higher risks and rewards--or you can buy upgrades to your tools and your spaceship. Explore the asteroids, watching for all sorts of enemies along the way, especially those that come out at night...

The monsters and robots on the asteroids prey on the vulnerable and singled-out, so the help of your friends is invaluable. Coordinate your mining and survival plans easily with in-game proximity voice chat and walkie-talkies.

The minerals market updates every second, so always keep one eye on the gem prices. After all, the only thing more frightening than the vast emptiness of space is an empty wallet. Sell your gems at the right market moment, and it can make or break your expedition. The store has many goods for delivery, including torch packs, pickaxe upgrades, fuel expansion tanks, exosuit movement upgrades, stamina upgrades, and more.

The day on the asteroid goes fast. Communicate with your crew to get back to the ship and out of the mines, and have fuel ready for take off. Don't let the monsters sneak aboard your ship! How long can your crew stay in business? 

No microtransactions, and AI was not used in the making of this game.

details.name: A Happy Place
details.detailed_description:
THE FULL VERSION IS CURRENTLY AVAILABLE!!!

v0.4.3 FINAL VERSION (12/18/2024):

  • Game content is complete

  • More major and minor bug fixes

  • Rebalanced Level-Unlock requirements (made them stricter)

  • Rebalanced Pit Mechanics (added a "guarantee mechanic" to make the rng less relevant early game)

If you play the Demo, the Full Version of the game starts wherever you left off.

BEFORE YOU BUY:

A Happy Place does not support keyboard controls, a controller of some kind is required! I would suggest trying out the demo before buying to ensure that A Happy Place works on your system and with your chosen controllers. Keyboard-and-Mouse may be possible to use with Steam Input.

A Happy Place's full version has roughly 6 to 8 hours of gameplay.

A Happy Place has been a great experience for many players, and I hope you'll enjoy playing.

Have Fun!

OVERVIEW:

A revival of the late 1990's 3D platformer collectathons with 3D, 64-bit graphics! Inspired by the convention and design of the golden era of video games while also keeping things fresh with new ideas and more things to do! meet characters, jump on enemies, leap through levels with style, find secrets, collect everything, and save the land!

Explore the fantastic world of Kittland as Bee and Are to liberate it from the evil and lazy King Kitt, Replay the collectathon experience!

Look if any one reads this, ignore any of my other reviews PLAYS THIS MASTER PEICE. Quick thing i don't care if you like mario horror games, i don't care if you like jumps cares, AND I DON"T CARE THAT YOU LIKE BUBSY. This game is nothing like (there are like 2 jumpscares) please support the game 20/10

Thanks Ziggity
Very good game! In case you don't know this is a horror game and not really meant for kids. It's really ass when you get a game over and have to do hell parkour but either way this game is good!
A Happy Place is a very fun game and Ziggity is an amazing creator! It has lots of content and some little secrets, 100% recommend, especially if you enjoy Nintendo 64 style games.

The game has a lot of potential. Unfortunately, framerate issues marred the potential for me. I will keep the thumbs up, because maybe its my own insufficient hardware, but I thought Steam Deck was supposed to be cream-of-the-crop, ya know?

I first played through this on GameJolt and knew I had to buy it here when I found out it was coming to Steam. The level design is great, the dev is really good at making each one feel unique. This game is 8+ hours long and I would certainly say the development time was well spent even if it is fairly janky. I apologize for the awkward phrasing, I struggle immensely with structuring my sentences normally.

10/10 with it's platforming, and love how each level is diverse in it's unique way. Everything has it's gimmick in every level, and doesn't feel super repetitive as well! Would recommend trying it out.
Pretty fun and charming game. A couple of technical issues and bugs here and there but nothing that would ruin the experience.

Really great game made by a developer who clearly put a lot of passion into it. Fans of classic 3D platformers will love the levels and game mechanics, and the game is very meaty for the price, as a first playthrough usually takes somewhere between 8 and 10 hours. AHP also has an additional hook to draw you in that I won't spoil too much here. The game's only real issue is that it is very buggy due to using the Blender game engine. Almost every playthrough of this game will encounter some kind of bug or technical issue at some point, so just be aware of that going in. The experience is well worth that little bit of friction.

details.name: Smokin Potions
details.detailed_description:
Chaos reigns as up to 4 friends battle in a magical, explosive local-multiplayer showdown. Create your wizard, choose your magical affinity, mix elements, and craft explosive potion bombs to dominate the arena. Even in defeat, haunt and sabotage rivals as a ghost, seizing a second chance at glory.

Take advantage of unique stages, power-ups, and sudden-death hazards that change the flow of battle, keeping each match dynamic and full of surprises.

Customize your wizard with a wide variety of robes, hairstyles, and hats, and unlock new cosmetic items to stand out in every battle.

Explosive Competition

  • Compete with up to 4 friends in chaotic local-multiplayer battles, using potions as devastating bombs to create explosive mayhem.

  • Use ghost mechanics to sabotage and reclaim victory after elimination.

  • Survive sudden-death stage events to outlast your foes.


Potion Bomb Combat

  • Choose from four magical affinities: Earth, Fire, Ice, and Arcane.

  • Experiment by mixing magical elements to create powerful effects

  • Pick up items for buffs, stage-wide effects, or unpredictable twists.


Multiplayer Mayhem

  • Invite friends over for local matches or play via Remote Play Together.

  • Engage in fast-paced matches perfect for casual and competitive players alike.

  • Each player can create a personalized profile to track and expand their unique collection of cosmetics.




Customization

  • Design your wizard with robe colors, hairstyles, and quirky hats.

  • Earn stars by winning matches and spend them to unlock new cosmetics.

  • Try your luck with the gacha machine for randomized cosmetic rewards.

FEATURE LIST

  • Arena Battles: Engage in local multiplayer matches for up to 4 players.

  • Magical Affinities: Experiment with Earth, Fire, Ice, and Arcane elements.

  • Element Mixing: Combine magical elements to craft devastating potions.

  • Scrolls of Chaos: Enhance your powers with buffs, summon hazards, or trigger game-changing arena events.

  • Ghost Comebacks: Sabotage rivals with their potions or through possession as a ghost and reclaim victory.

  • Customizable Wizards: Create unique wizards with hundreds of combinations of robe colors, hairstyles, and hats.

  • Gacha System: Win matches and collect stars to use in the gacha machine. Unlock randomized cosmetic rewards.

  • Dynamic Stages: Battle on multiple arenas with unique hazards and sudden-death mechanics.

  • Game Mode Customization: Adjust match settings to create unique battles, from subtle rule tweaks to chaotic arena modifiers.

  • Fast-Paced Fun: Quick, intense matches for casual and competitive players.

details.name: Pocket Lint
details.detailed_description:
A deceptively hard little game of deduction. I’ve emptied my pockets onto the table, and I’m now thinking of a specific combination of those items. Can you guess it in as few guesses as possible?

How it plays

Each guess you make, information will be revealed about what you got right. By combining divide-and-conquer, with process-of-elimination, you should be able to quickly figure out the answer. Each round, you'll get a new selection of items to play with and a new colour palette to keep things interesting.

Your journey

You’ll start in the campaign mode that will introduce you to all the basics at a steady pace, starting from 2 slots all the way up to 6. Once you’ve completed that, it will transition into the endless mode, where you can test yourself forever against procedurally generated levels.

details.name: Crown Insignis
details.detailed_description:
An easy-to-follow story with SRPG tactics made in SRPG studio. Minimal experience with SPRG's needed to play it! Follow the story of Innes in world that's on its last legs due to gods plan to rebuild the world. Even if it would save the world follow as Innes fights for humanity.

Synopsis

The world has been in ruin for too long so one of the Gods employs his disciples to gather the necessary artifacts to finally have the world reborn. Innes has hope still that there's chance for humanity to turn it around now it's on her hands to make that come true even if others may disagree...

Features

details.name: 咸鱼殿下 / My journey
details.detailed_description:
This is a story - interactive game set in ancient times. Players will experience beautiful love stories in an ancient - themed world and achieve perfect endings by making choices within the plot.

In the game, accompanied by various female characters and dozens of other characters, players will embark on a thrilling and eventful journey. You can make decisions about key plot actions, which will lead to different outcomes.

During the gameplay, you can also savor the joy of exploration and discovery.

There are numerous plot - decision points in the story, which will determine different fates for the male and female protagonists. With up to a hundred plot options, multiple storylines, and various endings, you can dig deep to uncover the secrets hidden behind the story.

The game was shot by a large - scale live - action team, and it is exquisitely produced. We hope you'll enjoy this story.

You can experience a life of luxury and dissipation!

You can pretend to be weak and then surprise others with your true strength!

You can save those around you...

There is the glamorous nightlife, as well as the simple life in the marketplace; there are acts of righting wrongs, as well as deeds of serving the country and the people; there is the pursuit of dreams, as well as the encounter with well - matched opponents...

This world is waiting for you to open it, waiting for you to explore it, and waiting for you to change it!

Welcome to join our Discord channel, the channel link is on the store page.
