details.name: 追曙
details.detailed_description:
Story

In the world of ZhuiShu, the fates of two seemingly unrelated individuals become intertwined by an unforeseen event.

Jiang Yufei, an ordinary teacher, leads a quiet and uneventful life. However, the mysterious death of one of her students uncovers a truth far darker than she could have imagined. A seemingly insignificant clue, a faint detail, pulls her into a harrowing secret buried deep within the shadows.

Yang Fan, a calm and determined detective, receives an eerie radio signal on a pitch-black night. The origin of the signal is unknown, and its cryptic message only adds to the mystery. But it leads him onto a path of long-buried secrets, concealed by the sands of time. As he delves deeper into the case, he begins to realize the truth is far more terrifying than expected. It seems an invisible force is orchestrating everything, and the source of it all is intricately tied to a past he has yet to confront.

In this labyrinth of enigmas, the threads of fate tighten with each passing moment, pulling the two closer to an inevitable collision. When Jiang Yufei and Yang Fan's paths finally converge, they must uncover the truth hidden in the darkness—a truth that could shatter everything they thought they knew.

Can you find a glimmer of hope amidst the chaos, or will you succumb to the relentless pull of fate? The choice is yours.

Gameplay

  • Classic Point-and-Click Adventure Gameplay
    Continuing the timeless Point-and-Click mechanics, explore meticulously crafted environments, collect clues and items, and solve puzzles to gradually uncover hidden truths.

ZhuiShu, meaning "Chasing Dawn" in Chinese, symbolizes the relentless pursuit of light and hope amidst overwhelming darkness. It embodies the journey of uncovering hidden truths, facing inner fears, and striving for clarity in a world shrouded in mystery.

Core Features

  • Unique Character Switching Experience
    Players will switch perspectives between the two main characters—Jiang Yufei and Yang Fan. Each character has their own independent storyline and unique investigative methods, intertwining to propel the plot forward.

  • Engaging and Complex Narrative
    The deep and evolving storyline blends suspense, horror, and emotional depth. Two seemingly unrelated lives are drawn together by fate, unraveling in unexpected ways.

  • Rich Puzzle Design
    Challenge your observational skills and logical thinking by solving intricately designed puzzles and mechanisms. Every solution brings you closer to uncovering the buried secrets.

  • Unique Cultural Atmosphere
    Integrating Eastern cultural elements, the game offers a distinct experience. Beneath its eerie surface, it delves into profound themes of fate, choice, and humanity.

details.name: Island Rescue: Tropic Survival
details.detailed_description:
Island Rescue: Tropic Survival takes players to a breathtaking tropical island where survival is the ultimate challenge. After a shipwreck, you are the sole survivor with limited resources. Begin your journey by exploring the lush jungles, scavenging for food, materials, and crafting essential tools. Build a shelter to protect yourself from unpredictable weather and lurking predators while managing your health and hydration.

As you advance, uncover the island's mysterious secrets—hidden caves, ancient artifacts, and clues pointing to a forgotten civilization. Can you unlock the island's mysteries and escape, or will you become part of its legend forever?

Scavenge for resources, build shelter, face wild animals and harsh weather while uncovering ancient secrets of a forgotten civilization, all while seeking a way to escape.

name: 推理小说的关键一定会出现两次

details.name: 推理小说的关键一定会出现两次
details.detailed_description:
■ 故事简介

今日的南北大学推理协会，风儿格外喧嚣。

沉迷推理小说的会长竟然遭到了书记的推理挑战。

他能在零零星星的线索中找到谜团的答案吗？

灵活利用”两个线索“之间的组合，发现反复出现的关键信息！

发现关联！指出矛盾！

而更多的故事，还将在之后展开——

■ 游戏概述

《推理小说的关键一定会出现两次》是一部以日常推理为核心的视觉小说。玩家将扮演南北大学推理协会的刘夕声。需要在场景中调查、交谈、思考获得线索，并通过“发现关联”或是“指出矛盾”对线索们进行组合，并选择合适的线索回答章节内的问题推进故事发展。

与大多数以刑事案件为推理对象的故事不同，我们致力以大学校园内外为舞台，发现那些“不解决也可以”的小小谜题，创造轻松有趣的体验。希望您能在享受推理过程的同时，也能体会到由形形色色人物交织而成的“日常”之魅力。

■ 游戏特色

  • 直白经典的组合玩法

    思考线索间的关系，发现它们的关联或是矛盾，以此创造新的线索。在逻辑链条的终点一定能找到谜题问题的答案！不必担心难度过大，或许小小的猫头鹰助手正在等待帮助你~（提示功能可关闭）

  • 清新明快的美术风格

    我们使用Live2D技术制作的人物立绘生动而富于表情。而在剧情中还有简单的小漫画格帮助理解故事。

  • 各具生命的多彩角色

    在数个小时的游戏时长中，角色们将轮番上场，快去发掘他们各自的可爱之处吧~

■ 部分角色介绍

  • 刘夕声

故事的主人公。南北大学推理协会会长，自认为遍览推理小说。实际上待人接物常有迟钝或古怪之处。偶尔的灵光一现既可以解决难题，也可以让人无语至极。

  • “书记”

由于某种缘由加入推理协会任职书记，因而被会长以及大家称为“书记”。十分爱读推理小说，而且似乎私底下有在偷偷创作。性格文静，有时却愿意和会长一起胡闹，大概是为了充当吐槽役。思考方式理性而实际，偶尔也有流露感情的一面。喜欢可爱的东西，比如兔子和熊。

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

※游戏仍在开发中，一切以实际发布内容为准

※正式版预计会有五个章节的内容

details.name: Laundering Simulator
details.detailed_description:
Laundering Simulator!

Run your own laundromat front for a forgery workshop in the back!

Believe it or not, but Eddie Wiser is a clever manager and a brilliant inventor.
Laundering Simulator revolves around him combining his talents to start a laundering operation... for both clothes and money. And you, the Player, get to help him with his little project.

Good, "Clean" Fun!

The setting of Laundering Simulator is something else!

Contend with crazy Karen customers, a criminal underworld, intrusive sponsors, government raids, and an aneurysm-inducing grandparent, just to name a few. Eddie's adventure quickly takes wild twists and turns for the pleasure of your challenge and the laughs we want it to bring you.

Business in the Front

Both sides of the game's simulation will take solid management skills.

As the laundromat owner, you have to deal with customers, set prices, supply the right washing machines and detergents, balance your costs, pay your bills. There's a lot to do in your efforts to grow your business and offer new services.

Party in the Back

And as the brillinat forger, you carefully operate Eddie's crazy contraptions. One wrong move and that perfect counterfeit bill is as good as toilet paper.

Produce all sorts of fakes, sell them to your fence friends, and of course use your front front to launder your illicit gains. Just make sure you don't draw too much attention. City Hall inspectors are one thing, you can hide your forgery equipment, but an FBI raid can make a mess of your backside.

Dear Old Nana

To make matters worse, Eddie's grandma is hanging around the place.

At her age, Nana Wiser needs some loving care from her favorite grandson. She just has a funny way of showing gratitude. She gets cold, she gets hungry, she gets bored and wants to watch cartoons. Make sure you see to her needs or she might just start scaring away your customers.

Clean cash? Clean clothes? Eddie picks both of those. And he seems to be going through all this trouble for a good reason. A money reason. Find out Eddie's story and help him get out of some serious trouble with the local underground and authorities in Laundering Simulator!

details.name: when disappear a light
details.detailed_description:
"A strategic RPG featuring three types of puzzle-like battle mechanics and a multi-ending story that changes based on the player's actions.

What kind of adventure will you embark on?
How will your journey come to an end?

The path you take will shape the outcome of the story.

What holds the key to these branching fates?
Only those who progress through the tale will uncover the truth.

With 15 different endings, there is always a reason to challenge the game again and again.

Only after witnessing every ending will the full story be revealed."

🔹 Game Features

  • Your Party Choices Shape the Battle Style
    The allies you choose will drastically alter your battle strategy.
    Will you engage in puzzle-based combat where clearing specific conditions is the key to victory, or will you face a unique turn-based battle system that demands tactical decision-making?
    Your choices determine the course of battle.

  • Three Unique Battle Systems
    Make your own three battle styles,each of which requires different puzzle-like thinking.Each time,a different mindset is required,so players' judgement is puto to the test.

details.name: Slingbot Survivors
details.detailed_description:
Slingbot Survivors is a survivor-like auto-shooter with physics-based platforming. Explore a hostile alien planet, use your grappling hook to zip around, and wield an arsenal of powerful weapons & gadgets to wipe out hordes of alien horrors!

Shoot, swing & pull!

Use your versatile grappling hook to outmaneuver your enemies, find resources scattered throughout the environment, and fly around in supersonic speeds.

Only the best can truly master the art of recklessly throwing yourself at your foes.

Build your own Sling-Bot

Wield a vast array of unique weapons, upgrade their stats to suit your build, and customize them with unique augments that change their behavior & playstyle!

Together with special gadgets that grant unique passive abilities, and a variety of different Sling-Bots to play with, each run you can devise new exciting ways to rain down fire upon your enemies!

Warning: Legs not included.

Survive a hostile alien planet

From masses of angry Biters to hulking, charging Swarm-Guards, each enemy the planet throws at you poses a unique challenge to overcome on your quest to pave out a new home for humanity.

And recently, our scanners reported massive tremors throughout the entire planet...

Join our Discord

If you want to report any bugs or share your feedback, be sure to check out our Discord channel! You can chat with the dev team, see what's going on behind the scenes, or just hang around with your fellow Intergalactic Bug-Squashers!

reviews.review: peak
Great game very fun can't wait for the full relase

A nice twist on the Survivor genre, implementing more skill based actions and input from the player.
The graphics are great, everything is smooth and the game handles well many enemies at once.

The game is in Early Access, and the amount of polish and content is very good relative to the price.
It's from the studio that created Grime, so the good quality is no surprise.

I play a lot of survivor-likes, and haven't found one that hooked me so hard in a while.  The slingbot mechanic is so much fun, I was compelled to send the dev a two page essay begging them to lean into it more.  I was assured that that's the plan going forward, and I am so stoked to see what this becomes.  It worth the money as is just for the fun of slinging around, but this really has the potential to be amazing and I hope it gets there.

Also, runs great on the deck.

Slingbot Survivors is a fun survivor-like game where you move using a grappling hook. It's all about swinging around, auto-shooting aliens, and picking up new weapons and upgrades.

The physics-based movement feels unique for this type of game and enjoyable.
You fight lots of enemies and try to survive on an alien planet. It's still in Early Access, so some features and content are missing.
Give it a shot if you want to experience a refresh take on the garlic-like genre.
Amazing game! I am having a great time just being able to vibe with music and swing around with my little dude killing bugs! Can't wait to see what comes next for this game!!

Game was pretty fun! 
needs a faster pace in my opinion, but as for early access the twist of SlingBot survivors has much potential for sure!
i love john slingbot
game's fun but it's in early access so there is still not a lot of content, but it's still fun nonetheless
She took the kids in the divorce :c

Ok, whoever came up with this is both a villainous mastermind and a sheer genius.  This is like that flappy bird game that came out way back in the early 2000's and captivated millions because it was so simple and yet so devilishly cruel.  

Honestly, this moves the needle in a whole new direction on survivor-like auto-shooters and what they can be.

This is so simple, is such a blast, and is so bloody difficult to master.  There's upgrades you can buy with credits you get from runs, there's bosses at the end of waves, and all kinds of mid run XP buffs.... everything is here.  The graphics are perfect for what the game is, and the music is on point!

FYI - I actually played this with a gamepad.  It work perfectly well with left stick and right trigger, which is really all the controls you need.  I'll try later this evening on my steam deck to see if it works out there.

Made me miss the birth of my second son.
No content though, So I have time to see the birth of my third son

TLDR- this game is really fun with lots of potential, go buy it ! 

Slingbot Survivors is a fresh and exhilarating take on the survivor-like auto-shooter formula. While it draws clear inspiration from Vampire Survivors, it quickly zips (literally) into its own territory with a unique physics-based platforming system that completely changes the flow of combat.

What sets this game apart is its grappling hook mechanic—swinging around an alien world while dodging enemies and unleashing chaotic firepower feels fantastic. It’s equal parts skillful movement and satisfying destruction. The blend of momentum-based traversal with a growing arsenal of weapons and gadgets makes every run feel dynamic and full of potential.

Even in its current state, the game already shows a lot of promise. With some polish and content updates, Slingbot Survivors could easily stand shoulder-to-shoulder with the best in the genre. Definitely keep your eyes on this one—it's fun, fast, and totally worth the ride.
Really fun game. controls feel great, fastpaced and super polished. nice work.
Cool game! Really unique mechanic. I wish the mouse cursor was a bit more visible, but other than that, it's a really fun ride. Recommended!
reviews.developer_response:
Hey! I'm so happy you like the game!
We know the cursor visibility is an issue, especially in higher levels where things get pretty crazy with all the enemies. We're working on it, so expect an update in the next week or two!

reviews.review:
I love how this game encourages fast speed movements while swinging around hordes of enemies. The momentum feels great!
I can't wait to see what other weapons and upgrades are added!

Imho, Unique game in the genre. Great movement that is easy to learn and I got used to it pretty fast. Don't be afraid of Early Access on this one. It is already worth its money and only thing that is left to develop here is content. Defenetly buy

Slingbot Survivors is not only a great Survivor game, but it is also a unique twist on the genre.
While most Survivors focus on risk-taking, upgrades and RNG, you can end up just standing still, killing everything that comes close.

Not in Slingbot!

Slingbot focuses on unique movement mechanics, and the game encourages you to explore, stay in motion and go as fast as possible. It is extremely satisfying to move using the grapple gun, and when you add "typical" Survivor mechanics on top of that...

In conclusion - you should definitely give it a try. It's totally worth the surprisingly low price.

So much fun! The main mechnic is cool, just want to continue slinging all day!
Tutorial was super efficent. Really awesome!

Very fun game!!
I can play it for hours without getting tired of it!
The price is so good for the product (I would even pay double)
I'll recommend this game to my friends!

P.S
can't wait to the full game!
Fun, fast-paced roguelike, highly recommended!
Nice survivors game with a very cool hook

details.name: Wreck Poly Survival
details.detailed_description:
Adventure and Survival

In Wreck Poly Survival, you live in a warm and peaceful low-poly world where survival is about living practically and efficiently. Explore a sprawling landscape made up of open fields, gentle hills, small woodlands and sparkling lakes. Here, nature offers everything you need, but it's up to you to know how to take advantage of the resources around you.

Collect rocks, wood and water to build and expand your base. Hunt small animals for food and keep your character healthy while exploring the environment. The game offers an easy-to-learn crafting system where you can create tools, simple weapons, and structures to house and protect your belongings.

Without dense forests or extreme challenges, the focus is on the calm and simplicity of life, with mechanics that allow you to grow at your own pace.

Main Features:

Minimalist low-poly: A clean, stylized look that creates a relaxing experience.

Resource collection: Gather wood, stones and water to build and survive.

Basic Survival: Keep your hunger and thirst in check by balancing work and rest.

Construction and crafting: Create essential tools and structures to improve your life.

Light Exploration: Discover little secrets hidden across the map, from lagoons to resource-rich areas.

Peaceful setting: A game that values ​​balance and tranquility over chaos

details.name: Victory's Grave: Outflank
details.detailed_description:
Victory’s Grave: Outflank is a team-based PvP shooter set in a post-apocalyptic, 1980s version of the Eastern European countryside.

Built by a team led by GWOT veterans with decades of experience in AAA game development, this shooter blends authenticity with intense, strategic gameplay. Set in a destructible environment where the battlefield evolves with the weather, Victory’s Grave: Outflank is easy to pick up but difficult to master.

PHASES OF COMBAT

Prepare for heart-pounding asymmetrical warfare. Attackers and defenders clash in unique, round-based matches where success hinges on strategy and teamwork.

Begin each round in a planning phase and construct defenses like foxholes, trenches, tripwires, and barricades. Time your attack to the shifting day and night cycles, variable weather, and changing seasons. Execute large-scale plans to achieve your objectives, but think fast and act quickly if you hope to survive this ever-changing combat zone.

TEAMWORK WINS BATTLES

Individual skill shines, but teamwork dominates. With no fixed roles or classes, every decision is yours. Set up overwatch with a sniper rifle or a machine gun and coordinate a flanking maneuver. Or, lead a strike team to hit the objective under cover of night or harsh weather. You must adapt and overcome as a unit to defeat your enemy.

PERSONALIZATION & REPLAYABILITY

Launch into Early Access with an arsenal of weapon packs, four unique uniform sets, and seven diverse battlefields. Each map demands a new approach to victory, while evolving combat mechanics keep your enemies guessing. Forge your team’s identity and outsmart opponents in battles that reward creativity and coordination.

Victory’s Grave: Outflank offers thrilling tactical gameplay where every decision matters. Are you ready to lead your team to victory?

details.name: ZHONG XING NEW VILLAGE
details.detailed_description:
ZHONGXING NEW VILLAGE

This is a multiplayer online game focused on regional revitalization.

(1) Basic Gameplay

  • Use WASD to move forward, backward, left, and right.

  • Q and E for close-range and long-range attacks.

  • 1, 2, 3, 4, Z, X, C are seven skills available for use.

  • All locations on the map have buttons to enter. In addition to viewing photos, players can solve puzzles to gain experience points and skill points.

  • Solving puzzles allows players to level up and helps strengthen the entire town.

(2) Game Features

  • Housing System

    • Players can choose the location of their house within Zhongxing New Village at the start of the game.

    • Houses can restore health and block enemy attacks.

    • Upgrading house types and skill levels allows for changes in appearance.

  • Action Points

    • Killing enemies does not grant experience points but rewards action points.

    • Action points have a limit, which increases with skill upgrades.

  • Browse Photos, Solve Puzzles, and Level Up

    • Clicking on area photos consumes action points.

    • Solving puzzles and pressing buttons at the right time grants significant experience and levels.

  • Explore Revitalization Areas to Gain Skills

    • Clicking on revitalization area photos may trigger questions.

    • Answering correctly grants upgrades to various skills, including both passive and active abilities.

  • Seven Major Skills

    • During multiplayer gameplay, the seven major skills can support teammates, making them stronger.

    • Skills include: Healing, Agility, Resilience, Weakness, Magic Attack, Lightning, and Vulnerability.

    • Multiplayer is recommended to maximize the synergy of skill support among teammates.

  • Skill Points and Professions

    • Each level-up grants additional skill points.

    • Every 50 levels, players can allocate profession points.

    • Different profession point bonuses can bring significant changes to gameplay.

details.name: Paper War
details.detailed_description:
Paper War is a thrilling rogue-lite adventure that combines creativity and chaos. You take on the role of "Little Blue," a character born from the dreams of a passionate artist. After countless trials, the artist creates the perfect sketch and finally rests, but as the night falls, his creations come to life.

Fueled by envy and resentment, the rejected sketches rise against "Little Blue," determined to destroy the masterpiece and reclaim the canvas for themselves. Amid the chaos, the living paper sheet becomes a battlefield where creativity clashes with destruction. And so, the Paper War begins, with "Little Blue" fighting to survive and prove their worth against relentless foes.

As "Little Blue," you must battle against an army of failed sketches determined to destroy you. Engage in dynamic combat on a living paper sheet where every battle is a test of skill and strategy. Upgrade your weapons, enhance your skills, and adapt your tactics to survive waves of relentless enemies.

Will you rise above the chaos and prove that "Little Blue" deserves to endure, or will the failed sketches reclaim the canvas? The Paper War has begun, and the fate of the artist's imagination rests in your hands.
details.about_the_game:
Paper War is a thrilling rogue-lite adventure that combines creativity and chaos. You take on the role of "Little Blue," a character born from the dreams of a passionate artist. After countless trials, the artist creates the perfect sketch and finally rests, but as the night falls, his creations come to life.

Fueled by envy and resentment, the rejected sketches rise against "Little Blue," determined to destroy the masterpiece and reclaim the canvas for themselves. Amid the chaos, the living paper sheet becomes a battlefield where creativity clashes with destruction. And so, the Paper War begins, with "Little Blue" fighting to survive and prove their worth against relentless foes.

As "Little Blue," you must battle against an army of failed sketches determined to destroy you. Engage in dynamic combat on a living paper sheet where every battle is a test of skill and strategy. Upgrade your weapons, enhance your skills, and adapt your tactics to survive waves of relentless enemies.

Will you rise above the chaos and prove that "Little Blue" deserves to endure, or will the failed sketches reclaim the canvas? The Paper War has begun, and the fate of the artist's imagination rests in your hands.
details.short_description: Paper War is a roguelite adventure where you play as "Little Blue," a character brought to life from an artist’s dreams. Battle failed sketches, upgrade skills, and weapons, and fight for survival on a living paper sheet filled with chaos and bombs.

details.name: Metascapes
details.detailed_description:
Build Your Own Digital World, Own Your Creations. MetaScapes offers four unique and immersive worlds - Sci-Fi, Cartoon, Fantasy, and Modern City. Choose your world and create your own universe. Your imagination is the limit.

Metascapes empowers users to design, build, and own unique virtual worlds without the need for coding skills. MetaScapes ensures that each creation is owned by the user, granting true digital ownership to its creators.

Within MetaScapes, users can choose from four distinct and immersive themes:

  • Sci-Fi World: Explore futuristic landscapes with advanced technology and interstellar vistas.

  • Cartoon World: Enter a vibrant and whimsical realm filled with fantastical creatures and zany architecture.

  • Fantasy World: Step into a magical universe featuring enchanted forests, mythical beings, and grand castles.

  • Modern World: Build a bustling urban metropolis with towering skyscrapers and sleek vehicles.

details.name: Cozy Forge: Blacksmith Simulator
details.detailed_description:
In Cozy Forge, blacksmithing is neither a tiring ordeal nor overly simplistic — it's just right. Melt your raw materials, pour them into molds, hammer them on the anvil, and polish them if needed. But don’t worry — you don’t have to be a master smith to enjoy it. You'll discover the art of blacksmithing naturally, without being overwhelmed. Cozy Forge combines a Cozy atmosphere with simple and intuitive interactions to create a pleasant experience.

Your workshop isn’t just for crafting sickles, horseshoes, or hammers for villagers. One day, a knight preparing for battle might ask for a sturdy sword. The next day, a king might honor your humble forge with a request for a royal accessory. Who you serve and the quality of your work is entirely up to you. In Cozy Forge, every task turns into a story shaped by your craftsmanship.

We blend the historical texture of medieval chronicles with modern Cozy design principles. Cozy Forge integrates medieval art with today’s cozy game spirit, aiming to deliver both visually and emotionally satisfying gameplay. From item designs to character illustrations, every detail is crafted with this vision in mind. We're sure you'll feel like you're truly living in a medieval town!

details.name: Math Monster Quest
details.detailed_description:
Say goodbye to boring math drills! Use your math skills to defeat monsters!

In this game, you take on the role of a hero and face off against monsters.

Answer math problems to unleash powerful attacks and take down your enemies one by one.

With simple controls, you can improve your accuracy and speed while having fun! Embark on your adventure now!

[Choose Your Game Mode]

This game offers two modes to suit your playstyle:

  • Training Mode: Practice as much as you want with no game over.

  • Adventure Mode: Test your accuracy as mistakes lead to damage from monsters in this thrilling mode.

[Customize Your Math Problems]

You can freely mix and match problems from the following categories:

  • Addition (Levels 1, 2, 3)

  • Subtraction (Levels 1, 2, 3)

  • Multiplication

  • Division

Choose the math operations you want to practice!

details.name: Mouldog
details.detailed_description:
- TRAVEL BETWEEN PLANETS

  • Travel between galaxy sectors containing unique planets.

  • Move from planet to planet to gather resources.

  • Travel to the next sector and repeat until you arrive at your missions goal.

- GATHER RESOURCES

  • Mine the planets precious ores.

  • Fight ferocious monster inhabiting the planets and gather their loot.

  • Planets are unstable so you'll have limited time to gather resources.

- UPGRADE YOUR ARSENAL

  • Sell your gathered resources in the shop.

  • Buy new tools, weapons, perks that will make you stronger and more versatile.

- SAVE THE GALAXY

  • Your galaxy has been infected by a dreadful poison destroying planets and making the whole galaxy unstable.

  • Your mission is to navigate to find the root of the poison and destroy it.

- PLAY WITH YOU FRIENDS

  • Save the galaxy with your friends!

details.name: Memory of Lust
details.detailed_description:
About the Game

Memory of Lust is an adult visual novel that immerses players in a world of mystery, romance, and captivating storytelling. Awakening in a beautiful yet enigmatic town with no memory of who you are or why you're there, you must unravel the secrets of your past. Your choices will ignite events that not only shape your fate but also impact the lives of the town's inhabitants in profound ways.

Story

Dive deep into the mysteries buried within this fascinating world. Uncover fragments of a forgotten past and realize your significance in this intricate web of relationships and secrets. The questions linger: Who are you, and how great is your role in this world?

The narrative is non-linear, blending a gripping main storyline with numerous side stories. This structure allows players to forge connections with a diverse cast of characters, delving into their unique lives. Through these interactions, you'll uncover mysteries, access romantic storylines, and experience unforgettable moments that deepen your ties to the world and its people.

Features

  • Rich storytelling: Embark on a journey through an interactive narrative brimming with intrigue and emotion.

  • Immersive atmosphere: Traverse vividly detailed locations, from mysterious churches to opulent vampire mansions.

  • Character-driven gameplay: Connect with a diverse array of characters, unlocking meaningful romantic and intimate encounters.

  • Mystery and discovery: Delve into the secrets of the town, uncovering layers of hidden truths.

  • Artistic excellence: Marvel at hundreds of finely crafted renders and environments designed to captivate.

Shape your own adventure in this unforgettable exploration of love, secrets, and destiny.

details.name: WarOS Demo
details.detailed_description:
Welcome to WarOS, a sci-fi interstellar war-themed real-time strategy game (RTS) from China's Qikuai Studio. As the spiritual sequel to the domestic RTS classic "Between Life and Death", we have poured 28 years of hard work and passion into it, and will lead players into an unprecedented post-Earth cosmic battlefield to experience unprecedented strategic depth and rich storylines.

【Game Background】

The story of "WarOS" is set in the post-Earth era, a world with highly developed technology but also ravaged by war. The conflict between humans and artificial intelligence finally ended in an unexpected way, and the surviving humans had to find a new home. You will play the role of a pioneer who is recruited to participate in the planet transformation plan. Under the vast starry sky, you will lead your team to face unknown challenges and moral choices.

【Featured Content】

Eight planetary battlefields : From Mercury to Neptune, each planetary orbit is a unique battle scene, with exclusive space fortresses, resource points and building facilities.

Five major resources : Quick Water, Earth Coin, APU, All-round Printing Materials and Tritium Tanks. These are the key elements to rebuild civilization. Players need to reasonably allocate and collect resources to ensure the smooth development of the star station.

40+ Hero Characters: Each hero has his or her own unique storyline and special skills. Choosing the right hero to join the team for different situations can give you an advantage in the battle.

Nearly 20 functional buildings : There are nearly 20 different building modules in the game, which are responsible for the security defense, mobility, production efficiency and auxiliary support of the star station. Proper planning and construction of these facilities are crucial to ensuring the stable operation of the satellite station.

Diversified equipment system : A variety of weapons and equipment including tanks, drones, mechas and warships, each with its own unique uses and performance characteristics. Tanks are the main ground units, drones carry out air-to-ground attacks, mechas are good at street fighting and indoor combat, and battleships dominate the space battlefield.  

【Core Gameplay】

As a star station captain, you need to plan and build an efficient space base and command combat troops to fight for strategic locations. Ensure your advantage in the interstellar war by collecting rare resources, hiring elite crew members, customizing and strengthening your equipment, and even calling in reinforcements at critical moments.

【Game Objective】

 Follow the development of the plot and gradually grow into a true interstellar leader. Develop your strategy, assemble a powerful team, lead the battle, and complete a series of missions to defeat your enemies. Every victory will unlock new technology and equipment to help you cope with more severe challenges.

The starry sea is vast and boundless, and unknown risks and challenges lurk within it. Are you ready for this adventure across the sea of stars? Join "WarOS" and experience unprecedented Star Wars passion!

details.name: Stellar Cardworks
details.detailed_description:
Community Feedback


About the Game

Welcome to Stellar Cardworks!

As a robotic agent of the prestigious Interstellar Construction Bureau, your mission is simple: take on contracts to terraform planets into habitable colonies. Each world brings unique challenges—limited resources, unexpected obstacles, and strategic decisions to make your colony thrive.

  • Card-Based Gameplay: Use various card types, including resources, tools, characters, and technology, to manage your planet's development effectively.

  • Strategic Decision-Making: Balance resource gathering, scientific advancements, and political tasks to meet project goals and optimize profits.

  • Immersive Sci-Fi Setting: Dive into a galaxy full of diverse planets, each with its own environmental conditions and secrets.

  • Dynamic Progression: Complete tasks, improve planetary conditions, and unlock advanced cards to master the art of terraforming.

  • Replayability & Freedom: Each game offers fresh challenges with randomized events and numerous strategic paths to success.

As an agent of the Interstellar Construction Bureau, you’ll face the ultimate test of efficiency and creativity. Start by selecting a planet, review its unique requirements, and use your arsenal of tools and cards to transform it into a vibrant, habitable world. Each project pushes you to balance between time, resources, and profits.

Are you ready to turn barren worlds into flourishing colonies and climb the ranks of the Interstellar Construction Bureau?

As a robotic agent of the prestigious Interstellar Construction Bureau, your mission is simple: take on contracts to terraform planets into habitable colonies. Each world brings unique challenges—limited resources, unexpected obstacles, and strategic decisions to make your colony thrive.

  • Card-Based Gameplay: Use various card types, including resources, tools, characters, and technology, to manage your planet's development effectively.

  • Strategic Decision-Making: Balance resource gathering, scientific advancements, and political tasks to meet project goals and optimize profits.

  • Immersive Sci-Fi Setting: Dive into a galaxy full of diverse planets, each with its own environmental conditions and secrets.

  • Dynamic Progression: Complete tasks, improve planetary conditions, and unlock advanced cards to master the art of terraforming.

  • Replayability & Freedom: Each game offers fresh challenges with randomized events and numerous strategic paths to success.

As an agent of the Interstellar Construction Bureau, you’ll face the ultimate test of efficiency and creativity. Start by selecting a planet, review its unique requirements, and use your arsenal of tools and cards to transform it into a vibrant, habitable world. Each project pushes you to balance between time, resources, and profits.

Are you ready to turn barren worlds into flourishing colonies and climb the ranks of the Interstellar Construction Bureau?
details.short_description: Step into the role of Orion, a robotic employee of the Interstellar Construction Bureau. Explore and transform distant planets into habitable worlds, tackling unique challenges and maximizing profits in this card-based survival strategy game.

details.name: 江湖黄老六 Lord of mythical beast
details.detailed_description:
Lord of Mythical Beasts is a Roguelite side-scrolling action game set in an alternate Chinese mythology world, blending martial arts, mythical beasts, and mechanical elements. Players will take on the role of a disciple of Huang Laoliu, the leader of the Beastmaster Sect, as they venture into mysterious realms to capture mythical beasts and gradually restore the sect’s reputation. By collecting mythical beasts, strengthening the sect’s power, and challenging powerful enemies, the ultimate goal is to rebuild the Beastmaster Sect’s glory and become the strongest sect in the martial world.


Story Background: In the vast martial world, there once existed a prestigious sect known as the "Beastmaster Sect." Centuries ago, the Beastmaster Sect was one of the most powerful sects, with many disciples and legendary heroes. The sect’s unique skill in controlling mythical beasts made it renowned, and these legendary beasts were not only the symbol of the sect but also the source of its immense power. During that era, the Beastmaster Sect could command all mighty creatures, with even mythical beasts becoming part of its force.

However, as time passed, the sect gradually declined. The death of the last mythical beast several centuries ago marked the loss of the sect's true power and its symbol. With the demise of the mythical beasts, the disciples dispersed, and the sect’s teachings became increasingly fragmented. Even though ancient texts speak of these beasts, many now question whether they ever truly existed.

Gameplay:

  • Capture Mythical Beasts: Explore mysterious realms to capture mythical beasts and bring them back to the sect to increase its reputation. Reputation unlocks powerful talents and the ability to summon mythical beasts for combat.

  • Diverse Combat Styles: Choose from different disciples, each with a unique fighting style—swordsmanship, firearms, martial arts, and more. Experience various combat approaches tailored to your playstyle.

  • Blessing Combinations: Strengthen your combat power with blessing combinations, creating unique battle strategies. Different blessings grant powerful buffs.

  • Skills and Enchantment System: Each disciple has unique skills that can be further enhanced through enchantments, allowing you to create powerful and personalized combat styles.

details.name: Toy Fight
details.detailed_description:
Follow Us


About the Game

Welcome to the world of toys, where you will be provided with a stage for free battle! Use your fists or randomly dropped weapons to start a crazy melee! The only rule in this "performance" is: don't take it too seriously, as happiness is the only goal.

Do as you please and fight wildly

Supports multiple players battling on the same stage, with no complicated rules or the need for precise calculations. Your only goal is to defeat your opponents or knock them off the stage.

Diverse maps and varied scenes

Switch randomly between a variety of maps, while randomly distributed dangerous traps and unpredictable meteorites pose threats. Please be careful to dodge them.

Playful skins, relaxed battles

Bananas? Spacesuits? Hot dogs? Hmm...

A wide range of quirky skins awaits your discovery, inspired by your daily life or internet memes.

Multiple weapons, one-click use

Pick up randomly dropped weapons and fire bullets into the sky! Or, at your opponents~ Various melee and ranged weapons will be randomly scattered across the map, waiting for you to use them.

details.name: CRAZLIPSE
details.detailed_description:
CRAZLIPSE is a game set in a seemingly ordinary city. Everything changes when Stefan Vincenzo, one of the police officers investigating zombie cases, is called for the gigantic "Starry Sky Tree", an iconic landmark of the city. There, he talks to Matheus, a scientist and his boss, about the zombie apocalypse known as CRAZLIPSE. After the dialogue, Stefan is teleported to a place infested with undead, where your mission is to survive and eliminate them!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Programmer: Yan Massoni Game Studio

Art: Yan Massoni Game Studio

Music: Yan Massoni Game Studio / MagmaPocket!

Level Design: Yan Massoni Game Studio / MagmaPocket!

Characters and Animations:

3D Arrow Model: Alihan - "Direction Arrow" , Licensed under CC Attribution 4.0)

Tree, Fire Effect, Gun and Bullet Models: Epic Games

Matheus Voice: My Dad (I love you, best father in the world ❤)

Apartment Model: Elizabeth Dada - "Low Poly Apartment Building" , Licensed under CC Attribution 4.0)

Gun Sound: سلاحكم - "WM-AR4"

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- The CRAZLIPSE Game is a simple zombie game, as it was made for the final project of my course, the game offers:

Game Features:

Zombie Combat:

  • Face over 100 zombies scattered across the map, each with simple movements ready to challenge you.

  • Use basic weapons to defeat enemies and survive as long as possible.

Simple and Straightforward Map:

  • A unique and functional scenario focused on action and strategic movement.

  • Map elements include open areas and closed spaces to vary combat.

Easy-to-Learn Gameplay:

  • Intuitive controls that allow any player to get started quickly.

  • Simple and fluid mechanics, ideal for short gaming sessions.

Focus on Challenge and Survival:

  • Survive increasingly intense waves of zombies.

  • Find the best strategy to last as long as possible.

details.name: Xi
details.detailed_description:
Perhaps we have never escaped our fate.

"Xi" is a horror puzzle game set in the context of modern Chinese folklore.

The story takes place in a long-abandoned mountain mansion. This immersive escape room experience feels a bit too real, with eerie and strange elements everywhere—an empty banquet, an endless corridor, and you, who have accidentally stumbled into this haunted house. Can you really escape? Fortunately, there are others in the mansion; unfortunately, they don't seem to be human... Who is telling the truth? I can't tell, I really can't tell...

Characters

Game Features

       A purchased girl is betrothed to a ghost? Is this another story of feudal remnants persecuting young girls? No, no, no, the truth this time might be simpler than you think. A neo-Chinese pixel art style recreates the eerie mansion of a wealthy family in the early Republic of China era. As a staunch materialist, I don't believe in any supernatural beings. I have strength and strength... uh... and occasionally some wisdom. No matter what, can you really calm the resentment of the ghost bride, save her soul, and make it out alive? But... who is the one that really needs saving?

A unique adventure of "Jing Xi"

Piece together the vanished past and discover a story that belongs to you.

A classic pixel-style RPG game.

No cliché jump scares, just pure Eastern mysticism. Feel the mysterious power of the East!!

Four endings in total, with one being the official true ending.

Intricate ancient-style ensemble.

Each character in the game has their own agenda. Uncover the secrets behind the characters—there might be a chance to break through.

You can't rest yet; there are monster girls wandering outside (♪Legend of Chaos♪ plays here).

About other game content.

Working on it, working on it.

                                                          

I heard that if you slack off, a mysterious force might take you away.

                                               

                                                                   Follow us.

                                                          Please, we beg you.

做那么好卖那么便宜看不起我？

details.name: Top Check
details.detailed_description:
Collect cards, build decks, and battle fierce opponents in Top Check, a chess inspired rogue-like deck builder and online collectable card game.  Demonstrate your deck building prowess in the rogue-like Challenge Run game mode.  Or clash with adversaries online using your favorite constructed deck.  With a plethora of new pieces and unique abilities, only the best strategists will emerge victorious. Do you have what it takes to reach the top?

Features

  • Rich tactical combat

  • Constructed deckbuilding

  • A tutorial to guide you as a new player

  • A 1v1 AI Battle mode to test new decks

  • A dedicated rogue-like game mode with deckbuilding

  • Online PvP with MMR-based matchmaking

  • Tons of new pieces and unique abilities

  • Cosmetic options to personalize your in-game experience

details.name: Hell Gangs
details.detailed_description:
(All the visuals and game mechanics you see are incomplete and in their initial stage)


Hell Gangs is a multiplayer physics-based adventure game where you and your gang must escape a massive underground prison controlled by a ruthless AI. Chained together, you’ll rely on teamwork to climb, solve chaotic puzzles, and survive dynamic challenges as the AI manipulates the environment to stop you.

Work together to solve puzzles, navigate collapsing structures, and face unexpected dangers as the AI manipulates the environment in real time to crush your escape. Whether solo or in co-op, every choice matters. Trust your team, outwit the AI, and discover the secrets of the prison’s sinister purpose.

Whether you’re climbing crumbling walls, swinging over deadly gaps, or outsmarting traps, every move is a test of skill and coordination. Play solo or with friends, and see if your gang has what it takes to outwit the AI and escape its twisted experiments.

details.name: Numinous
details.detailed_description:
Step into a forgotten world steeped in Southeast Asian folklore, where every shadow hides a secret and every whisper hints at danger. As a lone investigator, you’re drawn to an abandoned village shrouded in legend. Locals speak of a ghostly figure in white, her mournful cries echoing through the night.

Investigate the Mystery:

Explore hauntingly atmospheric locations, uncover lost relics, and piece together fragments of a tragic past. Search abandoned houses, decipher cryptic notes, and follow chilling clues left behind by the missing content creator.

Survive the Pontianak:

An unseen terror stalks your every move. Is it a restless spirit, or something far more sinister? Your choices will determine whether you uncover the truth—or become trapped in her cursed domain forever.

Key Features:

  • First-Person Horror Investigation – Search for evidence, uncover hidden messages, and navigate an immersive, interactive environment.

  • Supernatural Encounters – Beware the White Lady. Stay quiet, hide, and use your surroundings to avoid her wrath.

  • Rich Southeast Asian Folklore – Experience an original horror story inspired by regional myths and legends.

  • Eerie Atmosphere & Tense Sound Design – Dark environments, dynamic lighting, and spine-chilling audio make every moment unnerving.

  • Choice-Driven Narrative – Your decisions shape the outcome. Will you escape, uncover the truth, or become another lost soul?

The answers lie in the dark. But will you survive long enough to find them?

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains mature content, including intense horror themes, supernatural violence, and disturbing imagery. Players may encounter unsettling visual and auditory effects designed to create a tense and immersive atmosphere. The game features moments of terror, including ghostly encounters, blood, and eerie depictions of death. While there are no explicit depictions of sexual acts or assault, themes of loss, grief, and psychological terror are central to the story. We advise discretion for players sensitive to disturbing or intense content, including dark folklore, supernatural horror, and the portrayal of a dangerous, vengeful spirit.

details.name: Humility
details.detailed_description:
Annotation

Humanity lives under the despotic rule of an ancient giant. To ward off the wrath of the colossus, people make bloody sacrifices.

The beloved of young Elma is chosen as a new offering. The girl puts her own life on the line to save her lover.

The will of fate

The dice will pave the way where words and blades fail. The sworn enemy will obey if fate shows you favor in the ritual game. Are you sure that luck is on your side?

The non-linear narrative is complemented by mini-games based on modifications of classic dice games. Weigh the risks wisely to increase your chances of winning.

In "Humility" you will find...

  • A fascinating plot inspired by the stories of Lovecraft.

  • Disturbing, oppressive atmosphere.

  • Unique mini-games.

  • Noir-style graphics.

details.name: Monmusu Girls: Autobattler
details.detailed_description:
FOLLOW US

Follow us for the latest info:

Twitter: @Monmusu_Girls

Discord: monmusugirls homeland


About the Game

In a fantasy world of magic, the power of the Demon King is awakening, and the fates of the monmusu girls are beginning to intertwine.

As the leader of an adventuring party, you’ll recruit a diverse group of monmusu girls, each with their own special abilities, to create a powerful team. Venture into uncharted lands, unlock hidden stories, and uncover the dark secrets behind the rise of the Demon King.

 

Key Features

  • Strategic Team Composition, Easy to Play: With auto-battler mechanics, your success depends on how effectively you set up and combine your team.

  • Vast Character Collection, Infinite Possibilities: Collect a variety of monmusu girls, unlock their exclusive skills and bonds, and experiment with endless strategies.

  • Roguelike Elements, Making Every Adventure Unique: Encounter random events and rewards, ensuring each adventure presents a fresh and exciting challenge.

  • Idle Gameplay, Rewards While You Rest: Even when offline, earn rewards to strengthen your team and evolve your girls into formidable warriors.

  • Immersive Fantasy World: As the story unfolds, dive deep into the demon world, meet new allies, and enjoy an engaging, fun-filled adventure.

 

In a world filled with demons, can you lead the girls to victory, uncover hidden truths, and change the course of fate?

 

The adventure begins now!

Survey the Labyrinth – A living maze where escape is your only goal.

Step into Survey the Labyrinth, a dark and ever-changing maze where the walls shift and the exits vanish before your eyes. Every corridor holds secrets, every turn could lead to salvation—or doom. details.name: Slide to Solve
details.detailed_description:
Slide to Solve is a minimalist puzzle game inspired by the classic Sokoban, but with a fresh twist. In this game, you don’t move one block at a time—all the blocks slide simultaneously in any direction: up, down, left, or right. A simple press of the arrow keys is all it takes to set the puzzle in motion.

Each block has a unique shape and color, adding a dynamic visual flair to the puzzles. With dozens of handcrafted levels, every challenge is designed to test your problem-solving skills—intuitive yet progressively harder, always challenging but never frustrating.

Slide to Solve is the exciting follow-up to my highly praised first game, Unitied, and promises to deliver even more of the strategic thinking you loved in the original, with a fresh and engaging twist. Ready to slide into the solution?

reviews.review: Cute little sliding game. Has some funky levels, requires some thought but can often just be fidgeted with.

Three for three!  This is developer Peter Hijma's third sliding puzzle game, and all are absolute quality.  They might only take an hour or two, but they all strike the perfect balance of difficulty and fun.  Another easy recommend.
Very good for OCD :)

details.name: Haunted Dorm
details.detailed_description:
You enter a dormitory, and this dormitory is haunted.

But don't worry, I've got some help for you.

Maybe you are curious about what this is? This is an escape strategy casual game.

Do you want to challenge yourself? Want to blow off some steam? Whatever you want, I can help you get it, as long as you lie down on this bed.

Back to the topic, this is a horror-style escape strategy casual game.

In the game, players need to avoid the pursuit of fierce ghosts and find a dormitory suitable for them.

Develop the economy to build forts to defend against the monsters.

In the game, players can only build on the empty floor in the room. After the empty floor is clicked, the construction menu will pop up.

In the game, players need to selectively build buildings according to their own economic status and expand their advantages step by step.

If the player defeats the ghost, the game is won; if the player is eliminated by the ghost, the game is lost.

details.name: Phantomware 0
details.detailed_description:
Phantomware is an episodic psychological horror game where overtime shifts turn into something far more unsettling.

More episodes coming soon.

PHANTOMWARE: 0

You’re working late, testing a mysterious game for a shady client, but as glitches appear and messages grow unsettling, you start to question what’s real. The game’s eerie presence spreads beyond the screen, with the mysterious virus connecting the digital and physical worlds. Cryptic clues and strange occurrences lead you deeper into a chilling mystery, where the boundary between reality and the game starts to collapse. You soon start realizing that there might be no escape.

KEY FEATURES

  • Photo-realistic visuals with an eerie atmosphere

  • VHS aesthetic for a retro horror feel

  • Text messaging receive and reply messages

  • Pixel OS a fully interactive mini operating system

  • Mini-games but not all are safe to play

details.name: New Perspective Demo
details.detailed_description:
This Demo encompasses the first 1/6 of New Perspective. The main focus is on Lilian, but the other characters are also getting introduced.

--------
While the newbies are desperately trying to get used to their relaxed life at university, our MC is already at a point in his studying career where he is thinking about topics for his bachelor thesis. He has been studying for two years straight, and by now, there is little that can throw him off. Each new day is more or less the same.

His simple situation suddenly changes when the people around him start acting weird. He has a hard time explaining their actions, but just because MC didn’t see these changes coming doesn’t mean they are bad.

Right around the beginning of his third year, our MC experiences a week full of opportunities.

name: ぼくの葬式にようこそ -happy rebirthday-

details.name: ぼくの葬式にようこそ -happy rebirthday-
details.detailed_description:
あらすじ

「ある春の夜、ぼくは死んだ。今日はぼくの葬式の日だ。」
死んだはずの"ぼく"が迷いこんだのは、白黒の世界。
自分は何者なのか、そして何故死んだのか。
失った記憶を取り戻すため、「虹のかけら」を集めよう。
忘れたい、悲しい現実。忘れたくない、優しい思い出。
――全てを知ったとき、はじめて"ぼく"は"ぼく"になる。


ゲームについて

主人公の葬式から始まる、ひとりの少年の成長を描いたノベルゲームです。
プレイ時間は1周約1時間。
選択肢によるルート分岐あり。
エンディング全3種。
全エンディングを回収した後に読めるおまけシナリオあり。

details.about_the_game:
あらすじ

「ある春の夜、ぼくは死んだ。今日はぼくの葬式の日だ。」
死んだはずの"ぼく"が迷いこんだのは、白黒の世界。
自分は何者なのか、そして何故死んだのか。
失った記憶を取り戻すため、「虹のかけら」を集めよう。
忘れたい、悲しい現実。忘れたくない、優しい思い出。
――全てを知ったとき、はじめて"ぼく"は"ぼく"になる。

details.name: The Hearts of Immortality
details.detailed_description:
*This game is not yet available in English, but there are plans to develop it.

Introduction:

Welcome to the Sacred Soufragon Kingdom,
A land that claims the name of the Dragon's Breath,
A land that is neither sacred, nor blessed by dragon's breath, nor ruled by a king.

A land where Devils and Demons wage an eternal war,
Where mortals survive only because these beings are too busy fighting each other to bother with them.

The once-free nation is no more. The values of the Devils have corrupted this land, while the Demons see its people as nothing more than snacks.

Your journey begins with the intervention of a mischievous god.
This deity has chained you to the cruel game of life and death, forcing you to become a piece on this treacherous chessboard.

Fortunately, even though your fate has been altered by the God of Chaos, you still possess free will.
In this turbulent land, you have the power to rewrite your destiny and change the future of this kingdom.

Companions:

Meet the companions of this tale:

  • A count renowned for his debauchery, a member of the royal family, and a sorcerer gifted with immense magical power.

  • A paladin from a distant land, possessing a strong sense of justice and a good sense of humor.

  • A halfling slave who escaped from an expansionist nation.

  • An elf ascetic with a penchant for self-destruction and a mysterious origin.

  • An orc cleric from a theocratic and authoritarian regime.

  • A former noble assassin who has fallen from grace and become a gang killer.

  • A half-elf bard who once served as a spy.

  • A terrorist who also happens to be a skilled healer and an elven oracle.

  • A simple wizard girl from a faraway land, seeking to uncover the mystery of her origins.

Game Features:

This game is independently developed by a passionate CRPG enthusiast.
It draws inspiration from classic titles such as:
Dragon Age: Origins, Baldur's Gate 1 & 2, Neverwinter Nights, Solasta: Crown of the Magister, and Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous, Pillars of Eternity, Fallout : New Vegas.

While this game does not feature grid-based combat due to technical constraints, the combat system is designed to be deadly and decisive. It emphasizes both team synergy and strategic elements.

The game offers a highly immersive role-playing experience, allowing players to:

  • Create their own protagonist: Choose your background, race, beliefs, and moral alignment.

  • Diverse character progression: Four main archetypes with a total of eleven classes, seven race options, and eight schools of magic to master.

On this fantastical planet called "Tihws",
You can choose to be a paladin of justice,
A freed slave fighting for liberation, or a noble of high status.

Play as a human, elf, half-elf, orc, dwarf, halfling,
Or even a Mongrel born with demon blood.

Forge your unique path with deep character customization: shape your hero’s (or villain's) race, background, beliefs, and moral compass. Whether you choose to walk the path of righteousness or embrace the shadows, your decisions will shape the future of the kingdom and its people.

content_descriptors.notes:
Sexual Content and Mature Themes: Contains implied sexual themes, with scenes fading to black or indirectly referenced.
No explicit descriptions or visual depictions are included.Player discretion is advised.

Violence: Includes fantasy violence with blood effects but no extreme gore.

Profanity: Occasional use of strong language and profanity, limited to certain character dialogues for narrative purposes.

Political and Religious Themes: The game explores themes of morality, faith, and power structures, based on fictional metaphors and symbolism. While some elements may resemble real-world political and religious events, they do not directly reference specific real-world events or individuals.

Other Notes: Mature content supports story realism and character development but may not suit all audiences.

details.name: Sphere Up
details.detailed_description:
In this unique multiplayer physics puzzler, team up with another player to navigate challenging levels using an arsenal of specialized weapons. But there's a twist – these aren't your ordinary guns. Instead of dealing damage, each weapon manipulates the environment and affects a mysterious sphere in different ways.

Work together with your partner to solve intricate physics-based puzzles. Combine your weapons' effects in creative ways – maybe use an air blast to launch the ball while your teammate creates a bouncy landing zone, or manipulate gravity to create the perfect arc through a tricky obstacle.

Every level presents a new challenge that will test both your reflexes and problem-solving skills. Success requires perfect timing, precise aim, and most importantly, seamless coordination with your teammate.

Can you and your partner master the laws of physics and guide the sphere to victory? Jump in and find out!

details.name: Supreme Heroes
details.detailed_description:
In the fantastical, modern metropolis of Some City, California, Jacob discovers his powers at age fifteen with the help of five immortals known as "The Select Few". 

Having fought in almost all of Earth's historic wars, saving and protecting mankind, the aging Select Few now command Jacob to team up with his four best friends, and together, they become "The Elect Few". But convincing them to embrace their untapped supernatural power, stay united, and accept the mantle of saving the world is all but easy. Perilous events bring Jacob to battle a recurring villain in order to save his friends and together become Supreme Heroes.

A twist on Roguelike Action RPGs, being set in Modern-Day and involving Gunplay in combat, as well as Magic Projectiles in the form of Short Spells, Medium Spells, and Long Spells. It all depends on what Empyrean weapon you currently have equipped.

Each Empyrean weapon comes with a vast array of stats, from swing styles, combos, and stances, to magic casting and defensive abilities. From unique names and histories, to their tremendous enchantment of your armor, allowing you to don a new suit with every new weapon and channel the spirits of the blades' previous wielders on the fly, enabling you to chain together nearly unstoppable combos against your enemies!

Find or craft your arsenal and become a Supreme Hero!

Crafting helps you forge your weapons after you obtain the proper minerals. You can also buy and sell goods to help you craft the Empyrean swords, hammer, spears, axes, or daggers you're looking for!

The ways you can access your arsenal are designed for every style of player:

  • At the appropriate level, you can Quick Swap between 5 default weapons, but as you gain more experience, you gain access to 8 more uniquely enchanted weapons you can Quick Swap through. 

  • The Inventory, once unlocked, shows you all the weapons in the world of Supreme Heroes you can eventually have. Once you find them, they'll be ready for your viewing and selection. The Inventory lets you preview your new set of armor with each new blade you equip. You can also see that weapon's power level and a brief description of its stats.

  • The Hot Bar method lets you have a more persistent and customizable menu where you can move or replace crafted weapons straight from your collection menu to your Hot Bar slots however you want. 

Explore the fantastical modern metropolis via your Cytron Motorcycle until you can level up and Fly across rooftops or Wall-Run up skyscrapers, finding loot for crafting and lurking enemies. Picked up documents will populate your Help database with lore and info about items and enemies. With your Map, you can Fast Travel between discovered landmarks or place markers for taking the scenic route with your trusty Cytron.

Learn the way of the Heroes by retrieving and retaining Orbs (your primary source of strength).

Orbs are everything! Use them to unlock new Advances (Skills). Always be mindful of your Orb Gauge (Mana) and Orb Vitality (Health). Should your opponent ever manage to deal damage to you, you'll lose Orbs, robbing you of your very essence!

Retrieve lost Orbs and dropped Orblettes to maintain vitality and, more importantly, to maintain your only method of unlocking new skills. Each hit drains from both your Orb Vitality and your Orb Gauge, making Magic use much more difficult. You may also gain or lose Orbs depending on the public's perception of you.

Between your arsenal, your crafting, and your abilities, you should be well-equipped for the world of battle that lies ahead...

details.name: AHAPIKA – Heroic Agency
details.detailed_description:
What would make a great hero like Achilles harvest olives for an ordinary market woman? What would drive the great Greek heroes to become ordinary couriers? The desire for fame and adventure, of course!

Ahapika is the most heroic agency in Greece, and only the most valorous and glorious are accepted. Follow the path of its origin from the very beginning! You will have to fulfill the requests and orders of both ordinary mortals and the great Olympian gods. But be careful - sometimes an innocent request to deliver a package can lead to fatal consequences. Fight with beasts and monsters, argue with gods and titans, gather the best heroes to help.

An exciting story:

In your adventures, you will immerse yourself in the multifaceted world of intrigues and mysteries of Ancient Greece. When carrying out the orders of the gods, be careful: the proud inhabitants of Olympus do not forgive mistakes and may hold a grudge against you for a long time. You will have to understand what a new mysterious prophecy means to the world, and, of course, fight in the great final battle. It depends only on your actions which side you will be on, and who will come to the rescue at this hour.

Classic bullet heaven battles:

Many different heroes, various weapons, hordes of enemies, powerful amulets and Divine Gifts! More than 50 unique story tasks! Fight and unlock new heroes. Be prepared for the fact that powerful forces may intervene in the battle, both to help you and to counteract. Hone your skills on the arena in endless mode.

Welcome to "AHAPIKA - Heroic Agency"!

details.name: Free Solitaire - Art
details.detailed_description:
110 card sets for Free Solitaire made from public domain digital scans/photos of the 14-19th century European art. Also, 65 landscapes by J.M.W. Turner that work nice as low-detail backgrounds.

Included art styles:
  • Renaissance (early, high, late, Northern)
  • Baroque, Rococo
  • Neoclassicism, Romanticism, Realism

NOT included: Impressionism and any later styles, the Medieval or earlier art, other cultures/continents.

Some images are flipped horizontally to let the picture fit into the card's frame and not let an important detail (e.g. face of the character) get covered by the rank/suit signs. Many of the images are cropped to fit into the card's proportions. Cards are small, so I prioritized filling the whole card's area and zooming in on the composition center.

The DLC covers only the most prominent artists of the selected period, which are mostly from Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, France, the UK and Germany. If you are into art or are an artist yourself, I encourage you to make a card set with digital scans/photos of your favorite artists with the in-built card set editor in the game. Or maybe just post your request in Discussions.

Thanks for your support!
details.about_the_game:
110 card sets for Free Solitaire made from public domain digital scans/photos of the 14-19th century European art. Also, 65 landscapes by J.M.W. Turner that work nice as low-detail backgrounds.

Included art styles:
  • Renaissance (early, high, late, Northern)
  • Baroque, Rococo
  • Neoclassicism, Romanticism, Realism

NOT included: Impressionism and any later styles, the Medieval or earlier art, other cultures/continents.

Some images are flipped horizontally to let the picture fit into the card's frame and not let an important detail (e.g. face of the character) get covered by the rank/suit signs. Many of the images are cropped to fit into the card's proportions. Cards are small, so I prioritized filling the whole card's area and zooming in on the composition center.

The DLC covers only the most prominent artists of the selected period, which are mostly from Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, France, the UK and Germany. If you are into art or are an artist yourself, I encourage you to make a card set with digital scans/photos of your favorite artists with the in-built card set editor in the game. Or maybe just post your request in Discussions.

Thanks for your support!
details.short_description: 110 card sets made from digital scans/photos of the 14-19th century European art. 65 landscape backgrounds.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains digital photos/scans of public domain European art works from the 14-19th centuries. Features frequent nudity (including female and male genitalia), erotic settings and suggestive poses, scenes of non-consensual sex / rape, violence, torture, bodily mutilation, dismemberment, death, beheading / crucifixion, suicide, military engagements and other mature themes and topics. Content of this DLC reflects positions and beliefs of the authors of the original works (mentioned in the filenames of the card sets) and NOT of the developer of this application. It's intended for educational / artistic purposes only. I selected works and authors purely based on their estimated significance in the history of art, without any agenda and without having any specific age rating in mind.

reviews.review:
I'm not here to dissect the specifics of the 'Art' DLC necessarily, but rather to convey my deep appreciation for the developer's excellent work with the base game and business model.

'Free Solitaire', the base game, stands as an monument to the exemplary capabilities of indie developers. It provides an extensive selection of solitaire variations, all thoughtfully designed and highly customizable. What's most impressive is that this rich experience comes at no cost, free from any annoying ads or exploitative microtransactions that multi-trillion dollar companies like Microsoft often throws at your face shamelessly.

I'm proud to say I've now uninstalled Microsoft's Solitaire from my PC for once and for all, thanks to WMGames and 'Free Solitaire'. 

By buying this DLC, I'm not just adding to my collection of game content; I'm also directly supporting a developer like WMGames financially who has shown an unyielding dedication to enhancing our desktop solitaire gaming experience. This purchase is my small way of acknowledging his hard work and creative drive. I pray and hope he continues to release products like this in future.

As for the artworks in this DLC, I can confirm they are superb. If you are a fan or student of ancient history and art, you'll fall in love with it right away. My most favourite is the Last Supper painting, as well as all artworks from Northern Renaissance painter Rogier van der Weyden.

I strongly urge all solitaire lovers to support WMGames, whether by purchasing the DLC or simply by spreading the word about this outstanding game.

details.name: Car Factory Empire
details.detailed_description:
Car Factory Empire is a game where you create and manage a car company. You have to lead it to market success, participate in races, develop and create cars, study new technologies, fight for the market, capture and buy new factories and production facilities.

  • The events of the game take place at the beginning of the 20th century, at the dawn of the automobile era. You have to create a car company from scratch. Learn how to produce and sell the first cars, regularly improve and refine them in order to compete in the market with other manufacturers. You have to manage all the production processes of your factory, regulate production, find buyers, manage research and design cars. More than 100 automotive technologies and over 10 different bodies will make the process of creating a car exciting and multifaceted. You also have to extract resources for production, capture raw materials factories and keep them under control, fight for market share with other manufacturers, participate in races on the cars you created, take part in various competitions. This game features elements of a production simulator, global strategy and dynamic racing. All this will give you the opportunity to feel like a real car tycoon! Produce expensive and fast cars or cheap and mass-produced ones? The choice is yours!

  • In Car Factory Empire, the player creates his own car company. The player will have to choose a name for his company, decide what cars he wants to produce. The choice will be available: luxury, budget, sports models. Only the player can decide what kind of car factory and its cars will be. The produced cars will be quoted according to a special rating, which consists of such characteristics as: quality, reliability, speed and price. Based on these characteristics, during the game you will look for buyers for your cars, but the main thing is to start producing and selling cars! The first cars will be slightly primitive, but by making a profit from sales, the player will be able to develop and implement new technologies in the design of cars, making them better. In the scientific building, the player can research new bodies and units for cars, improve production buildings at his factory. In the administrative building, the player will be able to manage the staff of his factory and control production processes.

  • To produce and study new machines, the player will need resources and raw materials that must be earned and accumulated by capturing resource mines and buildings with his representatives on the global map. Computer opponents will fight with the player for control of these buildings. The goal of the game: to take a key share in the car market, taking the largest cities on the map under your influence and control. To illustrate the work done to produce cars, the player will be able to personally manage them and evaluate the created cars in racing races against AI. All technologies introduced by the player into the design of cars will affect the control of the car, speed, braking, power reserve and much more!

  • In Car Factory Empire, the player can also lose if his company goes bankrupt or produces bad cars that do not have a target audience. But what kind of car factory will be and how it will come to victory is up to the player to decide! You can make your cars popular and mass-produced or, on the contrary, achieve success by producing luxury and prestigious models in small editions, earning glory in racing! The choice is yours!

details.name: Emergent Fates re:developed Demo
details.detailed_description:
Emergent Fates is a Japanese inspired Role Playing Game about finding identity and purpose in a world where your fate has already been decided. A mobile version was originally released in July 2020 and is now being reimagined as Emergent Fates Re:Developed for PC.

Personable characters, rich world history and a fully realized storyline are combined with beautiful water-coloured 2d graphics for an artistic and narrative experience, while multi-class levelling, and turn-based battles allow for the customization and immersion which are staples of roleplaying.

Emergent Fates is akin to being dropped into a hand-animated movie or illustrated storybook, with an autonomous twist.

Demo

This demo is an early version of Emergent Fates Re:Developed for you to experience the beginning of the game. Emergent Fates Re:Developed is still being actively developed and your support will help contribute to its success. Please consider leaving a review with your feedback to indicate what can be improved. Thank you for checking out the demo!

Story

A young student graduates into his homeland's Knight's Academy and is suddenly privy to political issues in unexpected ways... An enigmatic woman travels the world hunting powerful spectral beings for reasons known only to herself.... A scientist with few scruples examines the coexistence of parallel dimensions and their lifeforms...

One story is only a compilation of many. Through the eyes of a few people, uncover the grander underlying stories of an entire world.

World

Three kingdoms manage a tense coexistence which as of late grows shakier and shakier. Outside city walls, wild creatures and races roam, caring little for the allegiances and grievances of humankind.

Battle

A turn based battle system which requires strategic use of class abilities and coordination between the specific strengths and skillsets of each party member. Some require more ability points (AP) than others, but you regenerate a little each turn, and recover them after battle.

Customization

Over the course of the game each character gains access to 4 unique classes, each with their own distinct abilities. The player can then customize which classes to use in battle affecting the abilities they have access to. These abilities range from augmenting basic attacks, spending resources for enhanced damage, or mitigating damage from incoming attacks.

Characters may also equip Augments to further enhance certain abilities, unlocking new strategies and synergies between character.

details.name: Office Lady: Vore Game
details.detailed_description:
You got a new job in the office.

In general, you are satisfied with everything here.

Good salary, flexible work schedule, no overtime.

But there are no ideal conditions, and you still have one big problem...

And that problem is Katie, your manager.

She is so hungry that she can swallow a person whole!

Be careful and don't make her angry.

Also, don't try to be friends with her. All relationships ends in her stomach.

Choose your words and phrases carefully in every dialogue.

You must balance between love and hate, to stay in the neutral zone and survive.

With each passing day, the topics for dialogue may become more frank.

Try to hold out at this job at least until payday.

Get the good ending and stay alive XD

The visual novel contains:

  • Three endings (1 good, 2 bad)

  • Soft vore

  • Same size vore

  • Belly growth

  • Female pred

  • Male prey

details.name: Lords of the Void
details.detailed_description:
Lords of the Void is a turn-based strategy game set in a fantasy world on the brink of extinction, shattered by a devastating magical Calamity. Lead your people to victory through tough battles, uncovering unique stories behind each faction.

New take on a turn-based strategy

Made by a true enthusiast of turn-based strategy games, Lords of the Void, brings a twist to the genre. The goal was to create something different, with fresh ideas, easy to learn but hard to master.

Four asymmetric factions

Take command of the last remnants of humanity, mistical magicians, wild demons inspired by Slavic mythology, or steam-powered lizards. Each faction offers a different gameplay experience, with diverse units, heroes, and unique abilities that defines tactical aspects of the game.

Campaings and story

Dive into the immersive story of the world's end. Lead the heroes of the four captivating campaigns, each dedicated for each faction. Every mission, from the campaigns, is crafted to deliver a different gameplay experience, with distinct challenges.

Hotseat (local multiplayer)

Just like in the classic games of this genre, you play together with friends using local multiplayer. Up to 8 players can face off in free for all matches, team-based skirmishes, or against AI opponents.
In the near future, online multiplayer will be added as a free update.

Early access

The game will be released in Early Access. Why is that a good thing? Because it gives you, dear Player, the opportunity to shape the game itself. Join our Discord, share your thoughts, and maybe your ideas might just become a part of the final version!

Our roadmap:

2025

  • early access release, with all planned game mechanics and features

  • online multiplayer

  • map editor with dedicated triggers system

2026

  • final version release

  • new game mode

  • ?
