details.name: Dreamwalker Demo
details.detailed_description:
Dreamwalker is a top-down story RPG game with deckbuilding combat. 

Embark on a journey through dreams and nightmares in Dreamwalker, a 2D top-down RPG set in a mesmerizing pixel art world. You are a wandering traveler, drawn to a small village shrouded in mystery and cursed by an ancient evil.

🃏 Deckbuilding Combat

  • Choose your starter deck and forge your own playstyle as you collect, upgrade, and craft a unique deck tailored to your strategy.

  • Visit merchants to buy, sell, upgrade, and trade up cards to refine your deck.

  • 200+ unique cards across 4 rarities (Common, Rare, Epic, Legendary), featuring upgradable and combinable effects.

  • Turn-based combat with animated enemies. Face different elemental foes with special Moves: Stuns, poison, burn, deck disruption, and more - forcing you to adapt as you progress.

💤 Enter a World of Living Dreams

  • Each villager’s mind is its own world—a haunted castle, a shifting marketplace, or a forest of glowing memories.

  • Each dream holds secrets, challenges, and unexpected allies waiting to be discovered.

  • Complete quests, solve intricate puzzles, and shape the story with your decisions.

    Earn powerful new cards and Dreamtokens to strengthen your deck.

details.name: JOI Lab PC
details.detailed_description:
STORY

In joiLAB, your friend Kiyomi controls the avatar Kimi, who is aware that you both are in an online game, despite being physically distant. Kimi frequently breaks the fourth wall, giving you a truly unique and interactive JOI (jerk-off instructions). Kimi is waiting, so don't keep her waiting too long!

The controls have been adapted to provide an experience similar to the virtual reality version. You can respond YES or NO to Kimi's questions and eventually develop a romantic connection with her. If you don’t wish to interact with her... you can practice your aim in some minigames.

  • Full voice lip-sync

  • Sexual positions

  • Customization

  • Story mode and free mode

  • Mini-games for aiming practice (which nobody cares about 😢)

details.name: [Southern Fjords] Veil of Pestilence
details.detailed_description:
You are a young herbalist arriving in a village devastated by the plague, carrying the knowledge passed down by your late mentor. Driven by the desire to help and honor their legacy, you encounter a community marked by fear, disappearances, and suspicion. Amid this chaos, the villagers speak of a masked doctor who arrived before you, whose practices raise more questions than answers.

As you try to save lives and uncover the mysteries, you’ll face sinister rituals, supernatural horrors, and moral decisions that will test your sanity. The line between human and monstrous blurs in a world where every corner hides danger, and every secret might be the last one you uncover.

Features

  • Eerie Atmosphere: A historically inspired world that captures the desolation and terror of the Middle Ages.

  • Deep Narrative: A story filled with twists, complex characters, and moral choices with consequences.

  • Exploration: Investigate every corner of the village, uncover its secrets, and use your skills to survive.

  • Psychological Horror: An experience based on atmosphere, fear of the unknown, and constant tension rather than cheap scares.

  • Adjusted Length: A compact 60-minute narrative ensuring an intense and memorable experience.

details.name: Sympathy for the Wicked: Hindsight
details.detailed_description:
What is it?

Hindsight is a horror Visual Novel, that follows three people at separate points in time. The player must help them to survive, and only after playing through each of their routes, will the player truly understand the story before them.

The Routes

Penny

The first route follows Penelope, a withdrawn young woman who has taken to isolating herself following a vaguely recalled injury. Cutting herself off from the world, Penny slaves away on her computer for her job, with her cousin, who lives across the country, as her closest confidant. She resents her mom for destroying their family, and doesn't know how to bond with her young stepsister. However, Penny's life changes when she meets the handsome detective, Ethan Steel, and feels instant chemistry with the man—only, she's rather hesitant to take the leap and risk hurting her heart. But distracted as she is, Penny is blind to the sinister presence lurking in her apartment, until it's far too late.

Penny's Route Offers:

  • A heart-breaking insight into how childhood trauma can affect people well into adulthood

  • A complicated, yet loving, mother-daughter relationship

  • A blooming love story

    • (Or two)

  • A struggle to survive

  • Bad art

Finn

Next, we join Finn on his journey. At thirteen, he longs for a dashing adventure! To be a hero—travel the world, slay monsters, lead the Freemen—just like his mom! But he's denied the chance at every opportunity, as the adults around him refuse to let Finn join their hunts. How can he be a monster slayer if they never let him meet a real monster?! But his chance comes when Finn meets a girl his age—a girl being held in the devilish clutches of a nasty vampire! Finn knows what a hero would do, so he sets out to save his new friend. Only, the further he travels into danger, it becomes increasingly clearer why his mother always warned him of wandering into the woods at night. Can Finn survive the vampire, and save his new friend, or has he bit off more than he can chew?

Finn's Route Offers:

  • A frustratingly adventurous teenager

  • Annoying and strange adults (who should really get a better hobby)

  • Dangerous and deadly creatures

  • Loneliness

  • Optimism!

  • Bad art

Will

Finally, we follow a young man, Will Tanning. Fresh out of high school, he's not ready to be a dad—he's no family man, that's for sure. Recruited by a mysterious organisation of monster hunters, Will feels he's finally found the place where he belongs. He rises quickly in the ranks, makes fast friends, and is even given the opportunity for revenge against the man who killed his parents. But while the Freemen have pulled out all the stops to make him feel welcome, he can't help but notice the strange ongoings of this commune in the woods, and he soon begins to suspect that there's more to this little group than he once believed. Armed with only hushed whispers, Will must decide whether he'd sooner stay settled in this new world of his, or if the truth matters more to him than the promises of a false family.

Will's Route Offers:

  • Accountability (or lack thereof)

  • A sense of belonging

  • Dead monsters (this is a good thing!)

  • A family (you wouldn't tell on family, would you?)

  • A lovely home in the woods (far from civilization, just how we like it.)

  • Bad art

details.name: Past Face
details.detailed_description:
In Past Face, you will step into the mind of a man trapped in his own memories. The game features four unique maps, each one reflects a specific chapter in the troubled past. Those locations are filled with meaning, telling a part of the man’s story.

  • Trapped in the Past

    The first-person perspective pulls you into a man’s world, making you feel trapped. Every discovery you make adds to the mystery of his past, while the world around you becomes more twisted and unpredictable. With its focus on atmosphere and psychological horror, Past Face challenges you to understand the man’s fractured mind while navigating a reality that’s slipping away.

  • Memory or Nightmare?

    The deeper you go, the more the line between memory and nightmare blurs. People he once knew, traumatic events he tried to forget, and terrifying visions from his past now come alive, reshaping the world around him. As he drifts deeper into mental illness, his dreams become something much darker: they are no longer just nightmares, they are now memories of horrific events…

details.name: Planetary Siege
details.detailed_description:
Welcome to Planetary Siege, a thrilling 3D tower defense game set on randomly generated planets! You have to defend in all directions in this tower defense game like no other! Survival depends on strategy, precision, and quick thinking as you build and defend mining operations against relentless meteor storms. Build turrets, defend your mining post, and extract resources in an intense launch at the end of each mission. 

Key Features:

🌍 Defend Unique Planets

  • Every mission takes place on a new planet, with black holes around it that spawn in meteors

  • Adapt to varying layouts and challenges, making each playthrough a fresh experience.

🛡️ Strategic Tower Placement

  • Deploy powerful towers to protect your miners and storage depots from devastating meteor strikes.

  • Each tower has unique abilities, allowing for countless defensive strategies.

🌌 Resource Management Meets Defense

  • Balance spending on defense and miners - get as many resources as you can but don't go too far without extracting or you'll lose everything!

  • Extract resources and launch them into space during the intense Final Rush, a chaotic last stand against overwhelming meteor waves.

🚀 Infinite Replayability

  • Procedurally generated planets ensure no two games are the same.

  • Strategize around resource node placement and evolving meteor waves to perfect your runs.

Can you survive the hostile planets, extract their resources, and escape with your haul? Or will the meteors wipe out everything you’ve built?!

Wishlist now and prepare for a planetary tower defense experience like no other!

details.name: Office Rivals
details.detailed_description:
Synopsis

You and your co-worker Nanako have always had a bitter rivalry. Finally, on the order of your boss, you two have to cooperate for once. What bottled up feelings will this predicament reveal? Where did it all go wrong between you and her? And how will she eventually help you to reconnect what you've lost in touch with: that there is more to life than just being a productive workaholic?

A Visual Novel for the Heart

Office Rivals is a slice-of-life indie visual novel inspired by wholesome doujin and webtoons; the kind of a feel good story to experience on a nice day with a warm cup of tea or coffee!

Features

  • Inspired by the wholesome genre in doujin and manhwa, for fans of the genre!

  • Various sexy scenes animated scenes, each drawn frame-by-frame.

  • Playtime for steady readers: approximately 5-6 hours.

Setting and Story

  • A flawed protagonist: the protagonist is not a perfect ladies' man. Despite being a talented and well-dressed company star, he is a workaholic with insecurities and trust issues.

  • Grounded side-characters with relatable personalities: not everyone has the perfect life! Overtime, commute issue, work confidence; they're all a part of our daily challenges!

  • An 'authentically Asian' setting: Heart City is a fictional city that's inspired by real-life places, settings and cultures.

Characters

Love interest:

Nanako Takagi, 29, is the protagonist's coworker and work rival. Talented and beautiful, she secretly has feelings for him. But what does she see in him? And how did their rivalry start?

Colleagues:

  • Seon: The boss who's strict but also caring.

  • Gee: Upbeat and easy-going, but nervous about meeting his girlfriend's parents!

  • Michelle: Composed and dedicated, with an underlying fear of coming out of her shell.

  • Other coworkers: Hanie, Liem, intern Mami, and Sayori.

Other characters:

  • Isamu: Someone from Nanako's past! Smug, rich and arrogant!

  • Yejin: The boss' wife who can help the protagonist with his workaholism.

  • Emi: Gee's girlfriend who likes to talk about scary rumours!

  • Mei and Min: The father-and-daughter duo who run the late night food stall the protagonist likes to visit.

And more characters in the latter chapters!

Spicy Moments

  • Erotic scenes such love-making after date, risky public encounters, and naughty talks during a company meeting...

  • Play with fire: early in their relationship, the lovers have protected sex, thus building up the protagonist's desire to creampie Nanako, and soon... maybe they'll play around with some risky kinks?!

  • Paizuri, oral sex, nipple play/rub/fuck, lactation, impregnation, exhibitionism, and others!

Will you reconcile with her to see if there's something more? Explore a brewing romance in this animated visual novel inspired by wholesome doujinshi and webtoons!
details.reviews:
“주인공도 평범하게 나이 먹었고 주변인물들도 다 평범하게 나이먹었음. 이런 사람들끼리 성인의 연애를 하는 스토리다. 모든 CG는 직접 그렸고 H씬에서 동화처럼 움직이는 장면 있음(한장한장 그린거) 분량이 아주 긴 편이고 선택지에서 뭐 고르냐에따라 엔딩/스토리가 갈림. 취향 맞으신분은 할인할 때 곰니해보세요.”
[KOR] Hong-Gil-Dong 19금 게임리뷰

“An outstanding AVN that explores the complexity of relationships! Superb plot. Excellent script. Amazing hand-drawn art style. Steamy h-scenes with great animation. Quality content. Buy it! [👑10/10]”
Royal +18 Adult Games

“是一款办公室恋爱题材的视觉小说，灵感来自纯爱同人志和网络漫画。故事讲述主人公与职场对手奈奈子从竞争到合作的转变，在一次加班夜引发的暧昧情愫中，两人重新审视彼此隐藏的感情。作为工作狂的主人公将在奈奈子的影响下，学会平衡生活与工作。游戏流程约5-6小时流程，部分CG动画是动态的，唯独可惜的是没有中文以及角色配音，优化画面感觉还不错，内含诸多选项，部分选项影响CG解锁。”
汉化语录

details.name: Slime Climb
details.detailed_description:
A Hungry Slime on a Mission

At the peak of a towering mountain lies irresistible tasty snacks. The journey won't be easy - one wrong move can send you plummeting down, forcing you to climb back up. But with practice and persistence, you'll master the art of jumping and finally taste those sweet rewards.

Key Features

  • Simple Controls, Tough Challenge: Hold to charge your jump, aim carefully, and let go to launch. That's all you need to know, but mastering it is a whole different story.

  • Every Jump Matters: There are no checkpoints here. Fall, and you'll have to climb back up. Each victory is earned through pure determination.

  • Unlock New Colors: Beat the game to unlock different slime colors. Show off your achievement with style!

  • Precise Physics: Tight, consistent controls mean every failure and success is in your hands. No random elements - just you and the mountain.

Are you ready to face the challenge? Can you conquer the mountain and claim those legendary snacks? Only one way to find out - start climbing!
details.about_the_game:
A Hungry Slime on a Mission

At the peak of a towering mountain lies irresistible tasty snacks. The journey won't be easy - one wrong move can send you plummeting down, forcing you to climb back up. But with practice and persistence, you'll master the art of jumping and finally taste those sweet rewards.

Key Features

  • Simple Controls, Tough Challenge: Hold to charge your jump, aim carefully, and let go to launch. That's all you need to know, but mastering it is a whole different story.

  • Every Jump Matters: There are no checkpoints here. Fall, and you'll have to climb back up. Each victory is earned through pure determination.

  • Unlock New Colors: Beat the game to unlock different slime colors. Show off your achievement with style!

  • Precise Physics: Tight, consistent controls mean every failure and success is in your hands. No random elements - just you and the mountain.

Are you ready to face the challenge? Can you conquer the mountain and claim those legendary snacks? Only one way to find out - start climbing!
details.short_description: A challenging precision platformer that will test your determination. Climb an unforgiving mountain filled with tricky platforms and treacherous gaps as you yearn for Tasty Snacks at the summit. Every fall hurts, but victory tastes sweet.

details.name: That's not my Neighbor
details.detailed_description:
The Department of Doppelganger Detection (D.D.D.) needs you!

Immerse yourself in the experience of working as a doorman in an apartment complex infested by beings that take on the appearance of your building's neighbors.

That's Not My Neighbor is a job simulator with science fiction elements and a slightly eerie aesthetic that will test your sense of observation and attention to detail.

Your job as a doorman is to allow or deny access to applicants seeking entry to your building. You will use tenants' documents and information to determine whether the applicant is truly human or not.

You will have the power to decide who enters the building and who is rejected or captured by the D.D.D. for extraction.

Include a variety of game modes: achieve different endings based on your performance in Campaign Mode, beat your score in Arcade Mode, test your skill in Nightmare Mode, and design your own tenants in Custom Mode.

details.short_description: It's 1955, and for unknown reasons, doppelgangers are more common than usual. Therefore, the Department of Doppelganger Detection (D.D.D.) has taken action. You are the doorman of an apartment complex, and you must decide whether to let in those who claim to be your neighbors.
details.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Arabic, Hindi

reviews.review: peak fnaf reference

A fun, relatively short game, but for a reasonable price. I watched play throughs before I played and it still had a bit of challenge to it before I got the hang of it (Nightmare mode could be harder, though). I do think once I complete all the achievements, I won't see the point of continuing playing, but its something I'd enjoy watching friends play too. I also was somewhat disheartened at the lack of some features I had seen before.

I've got a thing for quirky games and this ticks all the right boxes for me. Doppelgangers are trying to take over the world. Disguising themselves as humans, they will try to deceive you into letting them inside.
Playing as the doorman of an apartment building, you have to verify the identity of people trying to gain entry to the building and decide to let them in, turn them away or call the D.D.D to arrange for a "removal". 
If a doppelganger gets in, they will murder residents in the building. 
It's not always as simple as "Oh he's got an extra nose, doppelganger!" 
Sometimes the appearance is an exact match, the provided I.D card is perfect but maybe the seal on the entry request is off. You have to be very thorough if you want the residents to survive. I'm really enjoying this game and hope to see more from this developer.
like papers please but with william afton

It gets repetitive quite fast, the dialogue is always the same and even nightmare mode is not that much of a challenge after about 1-2 hours of playtime.

It's still a fun game, especially for like 3€ and it requires figuring out some kind of strategy to get to 100%. That was kind of an unnecessary and annoying grind but it was also fun to think of ways to up the chances of getting a certain poster.

Overall worth the price but more variation in the dialogue would make it more interesting :)

Good for the price but I don't see any replayability unless you're an achievement hunter. This is just a very easy, very repetitive beginner's introduction to Papers, Please.

Nightmare mode is highly disappointing in its lack of difficulty. Nightmare, it seems, only means in the monsters, not the difficulty. 

Likewise I'd hoped making your own neighbours would be engaging, but either RNG or the game itself made errors in your made neighbours impossible. All the errors were in the room numbers or the D.D.D. logo, like the game couldn't work out how to change the features or names of neighbours it didn't already have programmed in.

I can see why people left positive reviews, especially if they dislike the timed aspect of games like Papers, Please. But it just isn't engaging enough for me.

That's Not My Neighbour is an incredible feat for having been made by a single person! Like Papers, Please but with Horror elements, we play a Doorman who is tasked with differentiating between harmless neighbours and murderous Doppelgangers. Nightmare Mode genuinely made me jump, and some of the Achievements are hard to get, but otherwise a very fun and unique experience. Thanks, Jacksepticeye!

No low taper fade in the custom neighbor thingies, also it is quite hard to make a character in the custom mode due to the limited options, otherwise this game is pretty rizzy on skib. 

Achievements are very fulfilling and this game is a chill experience but can also be a bit frightening despite the charming nature of it. I dunno, something about this game makes me think about reality, maybe there are actual doppelgangers out there trying to take our places and then rule over this planet earth in which we call home. This game is a warning, a warning about the demons that lurk around us and try to prey upon the fear in which we feed them. I've noticed that everyone around me seems to subtly changing day by day, my neighbor Travis used to be very receptive to my hello's and goodbye's, we often talk when we saw each other in the neighborhood, lately I noticed he wears hoodies a lot more, like he's trying to hide his face. One time, his hood wasn't covering his face good enough and I saw what looked like a third eye between his two human ones. I talked to him about it and he snapped, his teeth I noticed were sharp and no longer like usual and eyes were like a beast. Be warned this game opens a portal to endless curses and tribulation, you will experience things unimaginable, your eyes will be opened to see true reality, to see the world and all of its sick creation for what it truly, most definitely is. My eyes have opened, my soul has been tainted, my brain has been etched with the cursed reality of what once was and always will be. I don't know what happened to the real Travis, I just hope I am not next. I worry, I fear, where did he go, what did that thing do to him, the others, the others act differently too, I must hide, I must cleanse them from the earth, I must exterminate them all before they rule the world as the game told me.

It feels a little petty to leave a review not recommending such a cheap indie game, so I'll just preface by saying it's really cheap and it does have enough in it to justify the price, technically.

I went for it despite not liking the style because I was really craving something similar to No, I'm not Human, which isn't out yet. But on top of the art being not to my preference, the gameplay is way too simple to the point of getting repetitive almost immediately. It's a glorified "spot the seven errors", when it's not literally just showing you a person with three eyes so you just call the monster cops on them and that's it. The errors are either pretty stupid or just subtle enough to not be interesting. Stuff like "the department logo on the ID has one extra letter" or "this person's eyebrows are very slightly higher than usual".

There is obviously no individual or overarching story on top of that, so honestly it doesn't feel very interesting to go through the 4 or 5 days or whatever doing the same thing over and over looking for a perfect score which can only be obtained by nonsense measures such as letting residents in even when they don't have the appropriate documents, just because they were actually residents. It's not internally coherent even though it's so simple.

There are other modes in the game but the issue is the gameplay loop itself is boring. I didn't feel like trying them out.

A fun game where you find inconsistencies. Similar to Papers Please but not at the same time -  the new entry request stamp reminds me a lot of it though.

The steam port is great, I prefer the more minimalistic design of the floor folders. I like the new card gamemode and custom gamemode but I don't play those modes much. The fact that the clown was removed from nightmare mode made it much easier and less of a challenge but I'm glad they kept the clown in nightmares the player has in the campaign mode. The mask ghost is interesting and keeps you on edge when you receive the note saying you're cursed and wondering when it will arive.

I dislike how the "endless" gamemode from the itch.io gamemode did not make it into the steam reboot. Despite liking the new folders, I think the more in-depth descriptions were useful for those wearing hats and was especially useful in nightmare mode.


Overall, I'd say this is a good remake of the original itch.io game but I feel like they could bring back some of the removed itch.io features and even add it as a configuration option if possible.

There also were a lot of character descriptions that really added to the 'spot the difference' aspect at least, to give you something to figure out, but this one is a mcuh more watered down version, and the charcter descriptions were gone. It would be so good if puzzles were hidden within the gameplay, codes that unlock minigames or something more. its just blander than before, which is mildly annoying as i bought this one for a more upgraded remake. i recommend the itch.io version, but if you enjoy collecting achievements youll like this for sure. 

to the dev, im super grateful that you made such a unique and fun game but this version feels like a downgrade in terms of engagement. maybe spruce it up, bring back features that people like and even up the price, hell i'd pay for it at $10+ if it was made more engaging with more tricks and turns and even different levels of the hotel-- aka a gym, pool, etc and the characters are different each time or something, just to add more variety and engagement. thank you for reading

Overall not a bad game. It starts off pretty fun, it can get a little boring and repetitive after a while though, so I hope more game modes get added in the future to add some novelty. When it comes to complaints I just have one small problem with the game, which is how slow it is sometimes. Characters walk at a snail's pace which can be pretty annoying, especially since the player can't do anything while they are moving. The pause before the window closes at the end of the shift is unnecessarily long too. Also in campaign mode the newspaper guy and Chester slow down the playthrough for no real reason, so I wish there was an option to turn them off. It seems to me the newspaper is almost always the same, so reading it more than once is pointless. So is answering Chester's questions after getting his achievement, I'm assuming nothing happens after beating the quiz more than once. Adding an option to get rid of them and increasing the walking speed of neighbors would make the experience better in my opinion. Plus the character creator in custom mode needs to be reworked because its mechanics are not great and options are limited, but that's less important.

I wanted to play this game because of the amount of videos i've seen of youtubers playing it and it seemed like it was very fun. Tbh it kinda is, but honestly, there are SO MANY BUGS IN THERE I CAN'T EVEN PLAY IT RIGHT. I'll start with the clow minigame. I just can not put my cards down or even buy cards from the deck. Moving on to the gameplay, frequently there will be "incorrect entry request seal" at the end of the day, but I check every single effin one of them, and there is NOTHING to tell them apart, unless you're talking about their angles. Also, I had an awkward experience where a girl came in, then suddenly moved out after she left her papers on my desk, and then another man came up (and his papers were wrong btw but not relevant) and i denyed his entry. When the day was over, i appearently had denyed an neighbour entry, but that's not true because i have literrally accepted everyone that day, unless there were some CLEAR mistakes, like, when I called their ap and the phone said "everyone's here" or "they forgot their documents at home" when they gave me everything or some bs like that. I'm just pissed and honestly wanted my money back but I forgot that SHIT open for too long and it got past the 2 hours.
Super fun for about 2 hours! But now I felt like I've played everything that there is to play. I hope we can get a more expansive story mode.

I wasn’t expecting to get totally hooked on this game, but "[i] That’s Not My Neighbor [/i]" is honestly such a cool and creepy little experience. You play as this doorman in a weird apartment building, and your job is to figure out who’s actually a real resident and who’s a creepy doppelgänger trying to sneak in.
It starts off kind of chill, but then you realize how intense it gets. You have to look really closely at people’s IDs, how they talk, how they look — sometimes it’s super obvious, but other times you’re second-guessing everything. It seriously messes with your head in the best way.
It’s short, but super replayable, especially when you start noticing all the little tricks the game throws at you.
If you like weird, unsettling games that keep you on your toes, definitely give it a shot. <3

I've always had this hatred for when games have arbitrary RNG bullshit and this game is loaded with it (in the achievements mostly). I think this game is fine if you want to just play it for the sake of playing it. But for someone like me who plays games for the collecting aspect of achievements this game has so much garbage to it. Like alright roll a god knows what chance every single day hoping to get a collectible you can do nothing but hope for and on top of that there's 32, and then you're like oh at least they must've used a bit of insight to infer that system would only work if there couldn't be repeats. BUT NO OF COURSE NOT, I could grind for actual hours (LIKE I HAVE) and nothing. Sorry the arbitrary numbers the game came up with keeps me in this sisyphean task. I get I don't have to 100% the game but that's the fun of it for me. I'll probably rip off the band-aid slowly and painfully but I can't stand the fact that I've spend 10 hours already in this extremely short game (finished in an hour) it forces me to do nothing but the grind. I'm fine with RNG in the context of oh overtime I'm bound to get it, like the 1/1000000 in cookie clicker you're spending so much time that it'd be incredibly unlikely that you don't get it at some point. But in a game like this it makes the game much less enjoyable. Without this achievement again I think the game is fine. It's kind of barebones and not the best of it's genre but it has some charm. I like the little backstories and the art style, I think this is a great example of a good idea but horrible execution. I feel bad leaving a review like this but I absolutely hate this in video games.

details.name: PongPong
details.detailed_description:
You are an ordinary office worker and family man living in the Korean city of "Dongran."

After less than a year of dating, you married your wife, Seowoo.

But something about Seowoo seems... off.

Seowoo often exchanges texts with someone else, smiling warmly,

while barely sparing you a glance.

She has insisted on a sexless relationship not only before but also after your marriage, avoiding intimacy altogether.

Then there are the mysterious credit cards issued without your knowledge,

receipts from extravagant shopping sprees,

and the faint scent of cigarette smoke lingering on her dress…

As the protagonist, you will step into the role of the husband,

investigating Seowoo's suspicious behavior.

But beware: making the wrong accusations could trigger Seowoo's counterattacks,

potentially leading to your downfall.

Every choice you make leads to new events, drawing you deeper into an intense psychological battle.

Seowoo will evade your suspicions with cunning, confront you head-on with confidence, or even manipulate and seduce you, leaving your mind in turmoil.

Can you uncover the truth about your wife and protect your family?

Or will you end up kneeling before her dominance?

Your choices shape your destiny.

Explore multiple endings and uncover the full range of outcomes.

Warning: This game features themes of female domination, findom, and NTR.

details.name: Misty Abyss
details.detailed_description:
You will play as an elf with amnesia, alone in a mysterious and dangerous foggy forest. In order to recover your lost memories, you must embark on this adventure full of unknowns. The only guide is the magic sword in your hand, but it may also lead you into the abyss. In the forest, you may face evil orcs. They are full of animality and do not covet money. Instead, they set their sights on the thin elves. You must collect magic sword fragments to gain more powerful skills or unlock paths. Defeat the powerful orcs! But if you are unfortunately captured by orcs, the consequences will be disastrous... As the adventure deepens, you will unlock more secrets about yourself and the magic sword. This fog is not only full of dangers, but also hides the mystery of the magic sword and your mysterious past.

Battle:

Defeating different powerful enemies or exploring the map will gain the lost power of the magic sword, and inject the fragments into the magic sword to gain new skills. You may encounter roadblocks in the forest that you cannot pass through, and you may need some other magic sword powers.

H animation:

During the battle, evil orcs may cast the skill of Thrasher, tear your clothes, and harass you in various ways.

At this time, you need to quickly attack left and right to break free, otherwise you will be defeated.

Dynamic CG ending:

I encountered a powerful orc in the abyss, but I couldn't defeat him despite my best efforts.

The elf was taken back to the orcs' lair, facing the same fate as countless other female adventurers.

details.name: somnus
details.detailed_description:
Thomas takes a job as a night guard, and his job seems simple: check that everything is in order. But his shift turns into an ordeal when he has to spend the night in an eerie, cold and narrow cave. The oppressive atmosphere, strange sounds and the feeling that someone is watching you. Each step in the darkness brings him closer to unraveling the mysteries that the cave hides.

Gameplay

In the role of a night guard, you will travel deep into the ominous cave to make sure everything stays under control. Every hour you descend into dark and cold tunnels, where the gloom holds mysteries and dangers. With each detour, the sense of unease increases as you begin to notice that not everything is easy in this place.

After each inspection, you'll need to fill out paperwork, recording your observations. But will you be able to concentrate when it seems that someone is watching you?

Game Features

Atmospheric graphics: Detailed tunnels, flickering lantern light and dense darkness create a fully immersive experience.

Realistic sound: Every rustle, echo of your footsteps and unknown sounds in the depths will make your nerves tense to the max.

Psychological tension: As time passes, the situation becomes more and more bizarre. You will be faced with unexpected events and decisions that will affect your perception of what is happening.

Interaction with the environment: Explore the cave, find clues and solve riddles to understand what lurks in the shadows.

Immerse yourself in a dark world and test yourself as the only person who depends on keeping the peace in this mysterious place. But remember, sometimes the darkness hides more than just secrets....

details.short_description: SOMNUS is a first-person indie game in the genre of adventure with elements of horror. The protagonist, a young boy, faces a difficult ordeal: his mother is seriously ill, and in order to pay for her treatment, he takes a job as a night guard.

somnus is a horror game that never lets you relax for a second. At first, it seems like you’re just a security guard doing routine work. But with each patrol, something changes. Without realizing it, you find yourself trapped in a place where reality crumbles, and fear becomes almost tangible.

If you’re looking for intense thrills, a tense atmosphere, and the feeling that someone is watching you—even in real life—this game is for you.

details.name: Duel & Trial
details.detailed_description:
Inspired by classic local multiplayer brawlers, Duel & Trial is a fast-paced party game that supports 2-4 players, packed with chaotic fun and unexpected twists.

Players battle it out in rooms filled with portals and traps, using a variety of items unlocked from treasure chests to outwit and defeat each other. The last player standing wins!

With simple yet challenging mechanics, mastering the game requires skill and practice. Want to pull off flashy moves? You’ll need to train your reflexes.

Perfect for friends to gather around and play together. Struggling in the game? Settle it in real life with a friendly push!

The game features both Duel and Trial modes, allowing players to choose how they want to challenge themselves.

Features:

  • A mysterious and immersive world setting

  • Fun and unique character designs

  • Various treasure chests and rewards

  • Multiple battle arenas

  • Creative items that can change the course of the game

details.name: Garrulous
details.detailed_description: This game is a jigsaw puzzle that tests the player's observational skills, offering five different difficulty levels to choose from. The game interface is clean and straightforward, with no complicated background music or voiceovers, allowing players to focus entirely on the puzzle. In the 10*10 difficulty setting, a complete image is divided into 100 smaller pieces and shuffled. Players use the left mouse button to move these pieces, reassembling them into the original picture. As the difficulty increases, not only does the number of pieces grow, but the complexity of the images also rises, demanding more from the player's observational skills and patience. This game is suitable not only for those who enjoy quiet contemplation but also for individuals looking to improve their observational abilities.

details.name: Juxtaposition
details.detailed_description: This game leads players into an ancient city brimming with mystery and historical charm, featuring a classically exquisite art style that exudes a rich sense of history through every brick and tile. Players assume the role of a brave explorer tasked with finding food necessary for survival within this ancient city. By using the ASDW keys to control the character's movements and the space bar for jumping, players must follow in-game prompts to overcome various obstacles and uncover hidden secrets. The background music is melodious and enigmatic, complemented by meticulously detailed sound effects, from footfalls to environmental noises, greatly enhancing the game's immersive quality. Whether you have a passion for history or enjoy adventure and puzzle-solving, this game promises an unforgettable journey.

details.name: Lastbane
details.detailed_description:
About Game

When the apocalypse strikes, the cunning and merciless creatures of Gog and Magog overrun the planet. Only a handful of survivors remain. You and your friends must scavenge scattered resources, craft an escape plan, and cling to hope. Stay silent—these creatures are hyper-sensitive to sound, and one wrong step can unleash a deadly chase.

  • Realistic Graphics & Atmosphere
    Experience a stunning 3D world rendered in breathtaking detail, from crumbling city streets to shadowy forests.

  • 3D Surround Sound
    Feel every footstep drawing nearer, every gust of wind, every distant scream. Silence is your greatest weapon—noise is your deadliest foe.

  • Intelligent AI Creatures
    No two encounters are the same. Hunters track you, ambushers lie in wait, packs coordinate to flush you out—forcing you to adapt your strategy on the fly.

  • Semi-Open World & Multiple Scenarios
    Explore diverse maps and objectives: an abandoned military base, a remote forest camp, flooded underground tunnels… each environment hides its own dangers and escape routes.

  • Cooperative Horror Experience
    Supports 1–4 players. Survive solo, or coordinate with friends—but beware: even voice chat can tip off the enemy.

Key Features

  • Real-Time Lighting & Shadow Effects amplify the tension at every turn.

  • Environmental Interaction: barricade doors, set up sound traps, force open obstacles.

  • Dynamic Weather: fog, rain, and wind can be both a cover and a hazard.

  • High Replayability: random events and varied escape strategies ensure each playthrough feels fresh.

details.name: Xoru: The Nightmare Wars Demo
details.detailed_description:
This demo providers 10 minutes of solid gameplay. It is a story-driven visual novel, an interactive fiction game with RPG mechanics. The story and characters blend seamlessly throughout puzzle and combat minigames. Your minigame outcomes affect the narrative branching and the trajectory your character takes though the story. 

The demo offers a vertical slice of the complete experience found in the full game.

The character begins in the Edifice Ruin, the Tomb of the current Dream-weaver, a guardian that protects the land of Xoru.

Your character descends into the Tomb, and you need to make a choice: Ascend the spiral staircase, or descend into the scary smoky exit?

Ascending the staircase leads into a combat minigame:

The demo concludes after many twists and turns with a showdown with a gang of wraiths in the Domed Room:

details.name: Astral Blaze
details.detailed_description:
ASTRAL BLAZE

    Explore the ruins of an old city where no human has entered for hundreds of years due to claims of dangers the place now holds. Guided by eternal flames and following the torn pages of an old mysterious diary, revealing facts about the journey someone endured before you; painting to mind a once more advanced civilization which left this place migrating to altered states of existence leaving the less fortunate behind.

    Or is this just an illusion? As your memory fails to connect to the past.. nor has you envision a future.. all you and your group of adventurers are left to care about is the tangible treasure mentioned in the diary, perhaps it may get across the otherwise mistaken stories.

FEATURES:

A half survivor and half roguelike type game with partly randomized dungeons.

12 dungeons that can be completed in nonlinear fashion

7 imposing bosses

7 playable characters each with 1 passive character only ability and initial stat setting

Character customization and empowerment by choosing random cards found in chests

giving element of choice

All hand drawn pixel graphics

Gameplay defining unique dash attack mechanic.

Optional brief storyline

details.name: Slow Roads
details.detailed_description:
Slow Roads is a casual driving game all about finding peace in a long, scenic journey, with no objective but to see what's around the next corner. Escape to endless, procedurally-generated landscapes with configurable roads, seasons, weathers, and vehicles. Generate a world, set the weather to suit your mood, and just drive.

Endless driving zen

Seek peace through active meditation - chase the horizon through rolling scenery that never ends

Organic roads without repetition

A novel procedural engine generates the landscapes and roads organically, meaning every road you generate is unique, and no two corners are alike. This generation is seeded, allowing you curate worlds and share your favourite roads with friends

Choose your vibe

Instantly switch between seasons, weathers, locations, road style, vehicles to suit your mood

Adjust your seat

Sim enthusiasts can enjoy a fully-configurable cockpit view and support for controller and wheel input*

Just drive

Free yourself from objectives and pressure; simply soak in the views at your own pace — or take a back seat and let the car drive for you

Steam-exclusive features

While the web-based version will remain freely accessible, by purchasing on Steam you help to support future development and gain the benefit of additional features:

  • Expanded vehicle configuration and customisation, including combustion engines

  • A scene editing tool which helps you to craft your ideal road

  • Profiles for saving your progress and worlds

  • Expanded gameplay and graphics settings, including post-processing effects

  • Added scenery details

  • High-definition assets

  • Achievements and optional challenges

The Steam version is also planned to receive the following exclusive updates in future:

  • Multiplayer game modes for shared drives or competitive gameplay

  • Access to extra locations

  • Access to a broader range of vehicles, including combustion engines

  • Enhanced graphics features such as post-processing effects and added environmental detail

Active independent development

Slow Roads is a living project with new features, locations, and vehicles in continuous development. The roadmap is long, but the upcoming priorities are:

  • New locations, featuring mountains, oceans, tunnels, and more

  • More vehicles, with improved physics

  • Improved graphics features for lighting, weather, and environmental detail

* Force feedback support is targeted for release but remains in experimental development, so cannot be guaranteed at this time

A novel procedural engine generates the landscapes and roads organically, meaning every road you generate is unique, and no two corners are alike. This generation is seeded, allowing you curate worlds and share your favourite roads with friends

Choose your vibe

Instantly switch between seasons, weathers, locations, road style, vehicles to suit your mood

Adjust your seat

Sim enthusiasts can enjoy a fully-configurable cockpit view and support for controller and wheel input*

Just drive

Free yourself from objectives and pressure; simply soak in the views at your own pace — or take a back seat and let the car drive for you

Steam-exclusive features

While the web-based version will remain freely accessible, by purchasing on Steam you help to support future development and gain the benefit of additional features:

  • Expanded vehicle configuration and customisation, including combustion engines

  • A scene editing tool which helps you to craft your ideal road

  • Profiles for saving your progress and worlds

  • Expanded gameplay and graphics settings, including post-processing effects

  • Added scenery details

  • High-definition assets

  • Achievements and optional challenges

The Steam version is also planned to receive the following exclusive updates in future:

  • Multiplayer game modes for shared drives or competitive gameplay

  • Access to extra locations

  • Access to a broader range of vehicles, including combustion engines

  • Enhanced graphics features such as post-processing effects and added environmental detail

Active independent development

Slow Roads is a living project with new features, locations, and vehicles in continuous development. The roadmap is long, but the upcoming priorities are:

  • New locations, featuring mountains, oceans, tunnels, and more

  • More vehicles, with improved physics

  • Improved graphics features for lighting, weather, and environmental detail

* Force feedback support is targeted for release but remains in experimental development, so cannot be guaranteed at this time
details.short_description: Escape on a peaceful journey through endless scenic landscapes. Generate a unique world, set the weather to suit your mood, and just drive.

details.name: Call of Ponchy : Mahjong Warfare
details.detailed_description:
Mahjong TPS. It's a mahjong game with unusual rules that use guns and bats.

Become a substitute player at high-stakes apartment mahjong.

Run around the table to collect tiles and defeat your rivals.

■What are the rules?

It's mahjong.

You win if you collect more points than your opponent by the last round,

or if you defeat all your opponents.

■Safe?

At the Mahjong Table - Battlefield, your mahjong power is tripled, and otherwise it is 1/3.

It's safe.

■Game of luck?

You can make a difference by stacking your hand or stacking your deck.

The game starts before you draw.

■Goblin?

Throwing away tiles is a basic mahjong action called 'dahai',

but you are summoned as a result.

■Ikeda from the Home Mahjong Club?

She is the main character.

She challenges high-stakes apartment mahjong to solve the injustice of society with money.

details.name: Dark Genesis
details.detailed_description:
Game Introduction:
Dark Genesis is a realistic and immersive first-person single-player shooting game created using Unreal Engine 5. Developed by a solo developer, this title offers players a unique sense of fear and tension through bodycam camera perspective and realistic graphics. With a short playtime of 30–60 minutes, it delivers an intense and memorable experience.

Story Background:
The protagonist, while on patrol, receives an urgent call from a remote rural village and heads to the scene. However, the villagers exhibit strange behavior, and as the investigation progresses, the protagonist uncovers the truth about dark experiments conducted at the newly established "Necrogen Hospital." A fierce battle for survival unfolds as secrets are revealed.

Key Features:

  • Realistic Bodycam Perspective: A unique perspective immersing players in the protagonist's view, offering a vivid sense of realism.

  • Unreal Engine 5 Graphics: Cutting-edge technology delivers high-quality graphics for an enhanced visual experience.

  • Intense Horror Elements: Narrow, dark environments create a sense of fear and urgency, with survival and combat at the forefront.

  • Short but Powerful Gameplay: A 30- to 60-minute compact story and gameplay experience that keeps players engaged.

Developer's Note:
Dark Genesis is the first project by a developer who self-taught Unreal Engine. While there may be some shortcomings, the game represents a passionate effort and dedication to creation. We hope you enjoy this unique experience.

Adult Content Warning:
This game may not be suitable for all ages and includes the following adult content:

  • Frequent violence and graphic depictions of blood.

  • Intense visual elements that may induce fear.

Please be aware of these elements before playing.

name: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel - Digital Artbook

details.name: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel - Digital Artbook
details.detailed_description:
The official artbook of Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel showcases the artistry behind the game. Explore the creation of its mythical world with a collection of concept art, character designs, and vivid environments that bring the Nordic realms to life.

To locate the artbook after purchase, follow these steps:

  • Open your Steam library.

  • Right-click on the installed game and select "Properties".

  • Navigate to the "Installed Files" tab, then click "Browse".

  • In the opened folder, you should find a PDF titled "Jotunnslayer Hordes of Hel - Digital Artbook"

details.name: Sound Blocks
details.detailed_description:
Sound Blocks is a groundbreaking music composition app for Mac, Windows and Linux. You simply place blocks of sound anywhere on the grid, connect them together and play!

It's a beautifully animated experience that really brings out the visual character of sounds — (kind of like synesthesia).

You can add 'Control Blocks' to your sequence that act as modifiers for speed, time, randomization and more. Using these tools, you can create intricate musical machines that loop in interesting ways.

Who is it for? Can I use it if I'm not a musician?

Sound Blocks is for anyone who wants to dive into music production, whether you're a child, non-musician, gamer or a professional music producer — it has something for everyone. The workflow is super intuitive and playful — no prior music experience needed.

details.name: Gaunts Gambit | Multiplayer FPS
details.detailed_description:
DESCRIPTION:

Gaunts Gambit is a multiplayer first person shooter game. Set in an abandoned school left empty because of a rampant virus, former students sneak back in fighting over control of the grounds and buildings. They fashion makeshift weapons from whatever they can find.

GAMEMODES:

(Subject to Change)

  • 6v6 Deathmatch

  • Battle Royale

  • Zombies

  • FFA

6V6 DEATHMATCH:

Players are divided into two teams of six, where they battle and capture land to earn points for their team. The team with the most points wins the match!

BATTLE ROYALE:

Players fight on a shrinking map, scavenging gear and eliminating others. The last player standing wins!

ZOMBIES:

Players face waves of zombies, barricading entrances to slow them down. Survive as long as possible against the increasing difficulty!

FFA:

Players compete solo in a battle for the highest kill count before the timer runs out. The top scorer wins!

details.name: Bomb Vehicle Idle Clicker Demo
details.detailed_description:
Bomb Vehicle Demo is an idle-loot-rpg game that blends elements of post-apocalyptic survival, biohazard crisis, vehicle customization, and explosive action. In this game, players drive their meticulously crafted battle vehicles across the wasteland, exploring unknown territories and eliminating hordes of zombies.

The game is set in a world thrown into chaos due to an outbreak of a mysterious virus, where most humans have turned into ferocious zombies, societal structures have collapsed, and resources are extremely scarce. To survive in this new world, players must gather resources, build and upgrade their vehicles and weapons, and use them to explore the world and eliminate zombie swarms.

In Bomb Vehicle Demo, players can:

  • Collect Vehicles: A certain number of bomb vehicles are available in the game (perhaps 9 or 12), which can be purchased using collected bottle caps. These are impressive supercars that stand out.

  • Customize Vehicles: Craft your unique bomb vehicle, equipping it with different engines, chips, armor, and special abilities. You can even outfit your vehicle with various turrets, from conventional machine guns to high-tech energy cannons.

  • Reinforce Vehicles: Gather materials to reinforce your vehicle. This includes enhancing attack power, health points, recovery capabilities.

  • Loot and Grow: Obtain basic equipment and materials by defeating enemies and completing quests, boosting the power of your bomb vehicle.

  • Reinfoce Weapons: Open and unlock the fusion of Grade 1 weapons into Grade 2 weapons, and corresponding weapon enhancement functions.

  • Explore the World: Traverse desolate city ruins, forests, and other perilous areas. Each region is filled with challenges and opportunities awaiting brave adventurers to uncover.

  • Combat and Survival: Confront hordes of zombies and other adversaries, using your wisdom and tactical advantages to win battles. Properly configure your vehicle setup to ensure combat readiness under any circumstances.

details.name: Exo Exploits
details.detailed_description:
Welcome to Exo Exploits

As an Operator of the Galactic Trade Federation (GTF), you are sent to distant planets to expand your corporate empire. Your mission is simple: build factories, exploit resources, and turn profits. But in a galaxy driven by greed,how far will you go to meet the Federation’s demands?

  • Build and Expand Your Industrial Empire

Design and manage a futuristic factory complex to maximize efficiency and profit. Balance resource extraction, production, and logistics as you grow your off-planet empire.

  • Create and Command Space Fleets

Craft specialized spaceships for trade, research, and defense. Assemble fleets to secure lucrative trade routes, fend off competitors, and unlock new opportunities across the galaxy.

  • Complete Contracts and Influence the Federation

Take on contracts from the GTF, ranging from resource gathering to fleet building. Every decision impacts your standing with the Federation’s ruthless officials. Success brings rewards; failure has consequences.

  • Master a Neon-Fused, Retro-Futuristic Aesthetic

Immerse yourself in the vibrant, synthwave-inspired visuals of Exo Exploits. From glowing factory floors to pulsating space vistas, the retro-futuristic atmosphere makes every moment unforgettable.

details.name: Wild Script: Nature Demo
details.detailed_description:
Demo version it is pre-early access for free, but it is will be closed after planned release. Demo limitations are blocking progress after a certain point.

Your feedback and attention is our goal for demo!

You wake up in a primeval forest where chaos reigns.

Strange shining talk with you and give its order. All around you is wild nature and a threat with every step. Are you alone, or were you lucky enough to find allies? Your fate hangs in the balance, and the decisions you make may be the key to survival... or death.

The world is going crazy.

Nature goes berserk under the influence of unknown forces, strange anomalies fill the world. Hungry predators are already on your trail! But the world is full of equally lost and frightened individuals, and it's only up to you to decide whether you'll make a friend or a new enemy. Tame animals, make gifts, trade, and engage in dialogue with the inhabitants, or attack everyone and everything, your choice will change your carma!

Fight, explore, create!

Explore the world and use invaluable artifacts that alter genetic structure. How much will you have to change, and will you still be able to call yourself human? Seek resources, build, and create useful tools. Only a comprehensive approach will allow you to survive and unravel the mystery of what's happening around. But the wild nature is cruel and uncompromising, so try to be careful and not get into trouble, because you only have one life. Be responsible for your actions and learn to accept defeat! Harsh reality with no option to reboot events!

Are you up for the challenge?

Developer words:

The world of «Wild Script: Nature» is just a seedling, waiting for your touch to flourish. This isn't just a game, it's a shared canvas, a journey we embark on together.

As a solo developer, my passion fuels this project, but I know the true magic lies in community. Every voice matters. What monsters do you imagine lurking in the shadows? What secrets should be unearthed? Share your ideas, your hopes, your fears with me at support email.

Let's build something extraordinary, step by step. Join the adventure, and let's craft a game that's truly ours.

Because in the end, we're all just players in the same game, united by the power of imagination.

Friendly community is our goal!

Demo features is more simple mechanics and count of content:

  • Entering the main quest

  • 7 natural biomes

  • 57 different items

  • 8 artifacts

  • 5 interactive quest books

  • 5 anomalies

  • 6 buildings

  • 4 random events

  • Blocked inventory slots: medallion, shoulder pads, leggings, belt.

  • Health, biography and crafting systems are blocked.

Nature goes berserk under the influence of unknown forces, strange anomalies fill the world. Hungry predators are already on your trail! But the world is full of equally lost and frightened individuals, and it's only up to you to decide whether you'll make a friend or a new enemy. Tame animals, make gifts, trade, and engage in dialogue with the inhabitants, or attack everyone and everything, your choice will change your carma!

Fight, explore, create!

Explore the world and use invaluable artifacts that alter genetic structure. How much will you have to change, and will you still be able to call yourself human? Seek resources, build, and create useful tools. Only a comprehensive approach will allow you to survive and unravel the mystery of what's happening around. But the wild nature is cruel and uncompromising, so try to be careful and not get into trouble, because you only have one life. Be responsible for your actions and learn to accept defeat! Harsh reality with no option to reboot events!

Are you up for the challenge?

Developer words:

The world of «Wild Script: Nature» is just a seedling, waiting for your touch to flourish. This isn't just a game, it's a shared canvas, a journey we embark on together.

As a solo developer, my passion fuels this project, but I know the true magic lies in community. Every voice matters. What monsters do you imagine lurking in the shadows? What secrets should be unearthed? Share your ideas, your hopes, your fears with me at support email.

Let's build something extraordinary, step by step. Join the adventure, and let's craft a game that's truly ours.

Because in the end, we're all just players in the same game, united by the power of imagination.

Friendly community is our goal!

Demo features is more simple mechanics and count of content:

  • Entering the main quest

  • 7 natural biomes

  • 57 different items

  • 8 artifacts

  • 5 interactive quest books

  • 5 anomalies

  • 6 buildings

  • 4 random events

  • Blocked inventory slots: medallion, shoulder pads, leggings, belt.

  • Health, biography and crafting systems are blocked.
details.short_description: Incredible combination of roguelike, RPG and group strategy. Immerse yourself in the wild nature of a mysterious world, make enemies or friends, build settlements or go in search of inexplicable artifacts... From solo developer! Give your feedback.

reviews.review: This game is the BEST GAME I have EVER PLAYED! ULTRA REALISTIC GRAPHICS! COULDN'T EVEN TELL IT FROM REALITY! I THOUGHT I WAS REALLY FIGHTING A TREE!

Stickman adventures is a very hard game to beat. This game challenges you to play it and its so fun. It has so many little hidden gems and such deep lore, so pay attention closely as you play through the game. The art style is so cute and the music is very catchy. I love every aspect of this game and Derp Industries is such a great creator!
Update: I just watched a YouTube video of theirs and apparently the concepts of this game was made by third graders? Very creative kids!

details.name: Survive till 100 years old
details.detailed_description:
"Survive till 100 years old" - A Unique Survival Game Blending Match-3 Gameplay and Strategic Challenges

Embark on a journey of humor and crisis as you experience the struggle to "live to 100 years old" in this exciting game that combines classic match-3 mechanics with survival strategy.

Core Gameplay

Players must utilize classic match-3 gameplay to gather essential resources to maintain nutrition, stay healthy, and acquire skills. These resources will aid you in overcoming various challenges as you progress through life, ensuring you can "survive" for as long as possible in the game.

Random Events and Increasing Difficulty

As your character ages, the game’s difficulty gradually escalates. From initial illnesses and accidents to mounting pressures and temptations, you’ll face an array of obstacles that test your strategy and decision-making skills. These challenges may disrupt your plans, requiring meticulous planning at every step, as one wrong move could lead to a complete failure!

A Duel of Strategy and Luck

The game demands sharp planning abilities while introducing an element of unpredictable luck. Successfully surviving to the age of 100 is not only a testament to your wisdom but also a stroke of good fortune.

Game Features

  • A Perfect Blend of Match-3 and Survival Simulation

  • Random Event System: Enhances replayability and adds challenging unpredictability, with a variety of achievements waiting for you to unlock.

  • Aging Mechanism: Realistically mirrors life’s challenges as you grow older.

  • Life Elements Collection: Gather 17 unique elements, 40+ events, to complete your growth chart.

  • Beautiful Graphics and a Relaxed Gameplay Style

Developer Tips:

• Be sure to check the encyclopedia regularly to understand the role and impact of each element on life activities.

• In the early stages of life, ensuring proper nutrition is the most important, and when element variety is limited, try to complete 4-matches or 5-matches whenever possible.

• Some important growth events only occur when you make a wish on your birthday.

• Not all growth events have a positive impact.

Are you ready for the ultimate test of wit, strategy, and luck? In "Survive till 100 years old", every game is a brand-new adventure!

reviews.review: best antivaxxer childhood sim ever
reviews.developer_response: Thank you for trying out this game, and I appreciate your humorous feedback. As you can see, viruses and accidents do pose a significant threat in the early stages of life. Additionally, due to the game's mechanics incorporating a certain degree of randomness, this threat is somewhat exaggerated.However, I believe that with a few more attempts, you will surely be able to overcome this challenge. Thanks again!

details.name: Fecal Freighter
details.detailed_description:
After a sudden invasion of space aliens hunting for human biological waste, the job of a sewage truck operator has become a perilous craft. Join the elite of the elite and become a transporter of the brown gold — the very substance without which the world wouldn’t be quite so... picturesque. But beware: dark alleys hide sinister surprises, and no matter how hard you try, you’ll never be fully prepared for what lurks there. It’s not just aliens after you — sludge demons spawned from the filth and the fanatical followers of the Brown Cult, whose ominous leader is rumored to have ties to a shadowy global government, are on your tail too.

  • Drive and upgrade your ZIL truck.

  • Survive in the stench-filled atmosphere of terror.

  • Complete tasks for the district administrator and the sewage treatment plant director.

  • Explore every corner of the open world, no matter how foul it smells.

  • Help locals dispose of hazardous waste and reduce environmental pollution.

  • Uncover the mystery of the aliens and expose the conspiracy of the secret global government.

💩 Welcome to the ride of your life — and what a smelly one it will be!

UNDER CONSTRUCTION

This game is a work in progress

Combine Elements to Make Unique Spells

In Fusion Mage, swap to a variety of spells on the fly by channeling elements. Acquire more elements for a deep well of strategic magic.

Choose the Right Spells for the Battle

Customize Your Strategy

Powerful equipment is available at the shop, if you've got the gems. These items assist general and specific strategies alike. Trinkets give big upgrades, while potions can be used in a pinch.

details.name: Girls Kitchen Dinner Demo
details.detailed_description:
Girls' Kitchen Diner

Girls' Kitchen Diner is a vibrant cooking game full of personality, where a group of skilled women runs a restaurant their way. Among scattered ingredients, stoves catching fire, and demanding customers, the characters face daily challenges while balancing work, friendship, and unexpected romantic moments. With an engaging mix of comedy and chaos, the restaurant becomes the perfect stage to show that talent, care, and a pinch of madness are the main ingredients for success – and maybe even for love. 🍔🍟🍕🌭

  • OLIVIA 🍏

  • BIANCA 🍋

  • CAROL 🍑

  • LIZ 🍇

  • THE CRITIC 🍒

The playable characters in Girls' Kitchen Diner are talented and charismatic women, each with unique cooking skills and striking personalities. The datable characters bring an extra dose of charm and fun to the story, with relationships developing unexpectedly, adding romance and many twists to the culinary chaos. 🥪🌮🌯🥙

details.name: Escape the Tower
details.detailed_description:
Escape the Tower is a horror game where you must escape from a 600-meter-high radio tower within 10 minutes.

Story

The protagonist wakes up to find themselves on a 600-meter-high radio tower. The time limit is 10 minutes. Use your wits to escape the tower!

Gameplay

Utilize the items left in the tower and think strategically to make your escape.

Ending

・3 Normal Endings

・1 Hidden Ending

Playtime

You can experience all endings in about 50 minutes.

Developer's Note

This game was developed by a 15-year-old solo developer.

Video Posting Guidelines

Both individuals and organizations can post and stream videos without prior permission.

However, please adhere to the following guidelines:

  • Include the game's name in the video title.

  • While optional, we would appreciate it if you could include a link to the Steam page in the video description.

  • RAYBIS GAMES is not responsible for any damages caused by posting or streaming gameplay videos.

    These guidelines are subject to change without notice.

reviews.review: This does a phenomenal job emulating the retro arcade feel, right down to the music and sound effects! However, the mid-air control feels lacking. Not sure if that was also part of the retro arcade days, but it made precision jumping tedious work, especially when the large moving spikes are involved. Would it make a difference if controllers are compatible in this game?
Straightforward, fair arcade platformer. Game has a good difficulty progression.

Simple and tight gameplay paired with excellent level design and a perfect difficulty scale.
Steeplejack feels like a professional arcade game that was lost.

details.name: Frosty Enterprise Demo
details.detailed_description:
• Frosty Enterprise Demo is the demo version of Frosty Enterprise.

  • Frosty Enterprise is a game in which you can start your ice cream truck business. You start your journey in a floating town. Your objective is to make ice creams, milkshakes, sundaes and floats for the town's residents and to grow your business!

  • Welcome to the Frosty Enterprise Demo! This is a small part of the game that awaits you!

  • This demo includes all the parts of the game to show players what they can expect more about the full game!

  • Starting their business journey in their ice cream truck, players will have all access to the stores that will improve their cute ice cream business.

  • Limited number of flavors are waiting for players to explore!

  • Stores are offering small portion of their inventory for players to have and improve their business.

  • And finally, Recipes! With new flavors and goods you will be able to creates real recipes for your customers!

  • Players will have enough experience and content to love spending time in Frosty Enterprise Demo and expect the full game!

details.name: Slap Street
details.detailed_description:
Slap Street is a hero-based beat 'em up for 1-8 players. Slapporo City has been overrun by an elite gang, leaving it to heroes of no renown to eliminate the threat. As you punch, kick and blast your way across town, you'll unlock distinct heroes, wield an assortment of weapons, and unleash an arsenal of combos, throws, and special attacks.

UNLOCK AND DISCOVER EACH HEROES PLAYSTYLE

Make your way through five stages of mayhem in classic beat 'em up action and save Slapporo City! Unlock new heroes and play Arcade mode again and again, every hero has a unique experience to offer!

FIGHT WITH YOUR FRIENDS

Flex on your friends in Versus to see who is the ultimate hero!

RELAX WITH PARTY MODE

Enjoy a casual experience in Party mode and unleash havoc in a number of mini games!

KEY FEATURES:

● Beat 'em up action with up to 8 players!

● Intuitive combo and magic system

● Beautiful full-color retro graphics

● Five dynamic city regions

● A growing roster of unlockable heroes

● Story mode

● Versus mode

● Endless mode

● Party mode

As you punch, kick and blast your way across town, you'll unlock distinct heroes, wield an assortment of weapons, and unleash an arsenal of combos, throws, and special attacks.

UNLOCK AND DISCOVER EACH HEROES PLAYSTYLE

Make your way through five stages of mayhem in classic beat 'em up action and save Slapporo City! Unlock new heroes and play Arcade mode again and again, every hero has a unique experience to offer!

FIGHT WITH YOUR FRIENDS

Flex on your friends in Versus to see who is the ultimate hero!

RELAX WITH PARTY MODE

Enjoy a casual experience in Party mode and unleash havoc in a number of mini games!

KEY FEATURES:

● Beat 'em up action with up to 8 players!

● Intuitive combo and magic system

● Beautiful full-color retro graphics

● Five dynamic city regions

● A growing roster of unlockable heroes

● Story mode

● Versus mode

● Endless mode

● Party mode
details.short_description: It's up to heroes of no renown to take back Slapporo City. Punch, kick and blast your way across town with an assortment of unique playstyles in this beautifully realized beat-em up. Local co-op story mode and versus with up to 8 players!

details.name: Chinese Chess - Xiangqi
details.detailed_description:
Chinese Chess: Unleash the Grandmaster Within!

Discover the age-old art of strategy with Chinese Chess, your gateway to the elegant world of Xiangqi (象棋), an esteemed gem in the treasure trove of Chinese and Vietnamese culture. With an interface designed for modern kings and queens of strategy, this app is your portal to the majesty of this ancient two-player board game.

Engage in Timeless Battles

A symphony of intelligence, strategy, and skill, Chinese Chess unfurls a battlefield where two armies clash with the ambition of capturing the adversary’s general. In this dance of minds, experience a game that has enchanted millions over the centuries, drawing players into a world where every move is a stroke of genius.

AI Opponents to Hone Your Skills

Whether you’re a budding strategist or a seasoned grandmaster, challenge yourself against AI opponents meticulously crafted to test your mettle. Five levels of difficulties promise to elevate your game; can you outwit the master AI and claim victory?

Tailored Gaming Experience

With Chinese Chess, every match is a personalized experience. The board editor allows for custom creations, an assortment of board and piece sets caters to diverse tastes, and various themes, avatars, and sounds ensure every game is uniquely yours. Delight in the visual spectacle as you plot your next master move.

Feature Highlights:

Undo: Rewind time, reassess and perfect your strategy.

Save/Load: Your battlefield awaits, anytime, anywhere.

AI Challenges: Face off against AI, from novice to grandmaster levels.

Board Editor: Design your personalized field of conquest.

Customizable Aesthetics: A plethora of boards, pieces, themes, and sounds to make every game a masterpiece.

Timer-Based Matches: Where precision meets urgency.

Elevate Every Move

Accumulate experience points and rise through the ranks with each victory. Every triumph against the AI not only feeds your prestige but enriches your mastery of this timeless game.

Join Us in the World of Chinese Chess

Download Chinese Chess today and step into a world where ancient tradition meets contemporary mastery. Every game is a journey, every move a story, and every victory a chapter in the illustrious book of your ascendancy to a grandmaster. Your throne awaits!
