reviews.review:
A Chinese board game that combines strategy and tactics. The gameplay is for two players, where each player controls an army made up of different pieces, each with unique abilities and moves. The main goal of the game is to capture the opponent's “general”, which is in line with the concept of chess, but with its own unique rules and mechanics. The game takes place on a rectangular board divided into 9 vertical and 10 horizontal lines, and the playing field has unique areas such as a “river” that restricts the movement of some pieces.
If you love chess or are just looking for a new strategy game, Xiangqi is a great choice for you!
A real masterpiece! It combines a rich history and a deep strategy, great for both beginners and masters.
In the beginning, it may seem difficult and confusing, but with time, you will begin to understand and eventually win.

A brilliant digital adaptation of the ancient strategy game! The AI opponents offer perfect challenges for all skill levels, while customizable boards and pieces add personal flair. The undo/save features make it ideal for honing your skills. A must-play for chess enthusiasts!
Amazing strategic depth! Elegant interface makes learning traditional Xiangqi enjoyable. Perfect brain challenge for all skill levels.
Well, at first this chess is not clear, and is different from the usual, without knowledge of the language it is difficult, but it is just as interesting chess as the usual, if you learn to play
The game is certainly interesting, but I still don't understand how to play it
Interesting chess, for lovers of board games and chess is just super! you can comfortably play in a dovo!
Learn Eastern wisdom - learn to play Chinese chess. You will comprehend the secrets of existence... if your nerves can stand it. =)
I've wanted to play Chinese chess for a long time, and I liked this game, there are few similar games, I hope the developers will continue to improve this game.

name: Sky Is Arrows - Ebonhare Visage Item Chest

details.name: Sky Is Arrows - Ebonhare Visage Item Chest
details.detailed_description:
The Sky Is Arrows Ebonhare Visage - Item Chest has arrived!

Step into the Shadows with the Ebonhare Visage Item Chest DLC for Sky Is Arrows! Uncover the secrets of the elusive Black Warren with this thrilling new DLC, introducing 6 intricately crafted items designed to transform your journey. From stealthy escapes to devastating strikes, the Ebonhare Visage Item Chest empowers you to outwit your foes and master the battlefield with cunning and precision.

Whether you're stalking your prey in the shadows or leading a daring charge, these unique treasures offer unparalleled versatility and power to suit any playstyle. Open the chest, embrace the warren’s mysteries, and let the enigmatic magic of the Black Rabbit guide your hero to victory!

The Ebonhare Visage Item Chest is currently available for Windows.

Here are the new items in this exciting release:

                                             

Ebonhare Visage

Provides +2 Defence and grants your hero's attacks a chance to deal additional damage and cause fear, reducing accuracy and preventing enemies from benefiting from high Morale.

One look into the abyss, and even the bravest hearts quail.

                                             

Burrower's Lantern

Boosts your hero's health regeneration temporarily after battle and reduces damage taken from traps.

The light of the Warren reveals all, sparing none from its watchful gaze.

                                            

Hopper's Warhammer

Provides +2 Attack and grants your hero's attacks a chance to stun enemies.

With a swing, the battlefield trembles and foes scatter like leaves in a storm.

                                             

Mirrorblade

Provides +1 Luck and grants your hero a chance to reflect damage back to attackers.

Strike at your own peril, for the blade remembers every wound.

                                            

Shadowpaw Dagger

The Shadowpaw Dagger provides +1 Morale and +1 Attack.

Forged in the moonlit depths of the Warren, this blade strikes unseen and fades like a shadow.

                                             

Void Hopper's Belt

Provides +2 Spell Power and reduces spell cooldown time.

Crafted from void-touched leather, its magic aids both preparation and execution.

Within the Black Rabbit Item Chest, a trove of enigmatic power awaits. Purchasing this DLC unlocks 6 extraordinary items, each infused with the cunning and mystery of the Black Warren. From the awe-inspiring Ebonhare Visage, striking fear into the hearts of enemies with a mere gaze, to the arcane Void Hopper Belt, the possibilities are boundless.

Wield the crushing might of the Hopper’s Warhammer, scattering foes with thunderous blows, or cut through the shadows with the relentless Shadowpaw Dagger. Remand the damage from traps with the watchful Burrower’s Lantern, and reflect the power of your adversaries with the brilliance of the Mirrorblade. Many of the items focus on your hero getting a greater chance of proccing item effects rather than your entire forces.

With each artifact, you uncover more of the Black Warren’s secrets. Harness the strength of void-touched relics, and dominate with fearsome weapons. The Black Rabbit Item Chest DLC empowers you to embody the warren’s elusive magic, striking the perfect balance between stealth, strategy, and unrelenting power.

details.name: Samurai Conqueror
details.detailed_description:
“Samurai Conqueror” is an epic historical strategy game where you aim to unify Japan across time — from the ancient Kofun period to the transformative Meiji era.

Set against the sweeping backdrop of Japan’s full historical timeline, you’ll choose one legendary figure to lead your faction and strive to bring all of Japan under your rule.

Develop your domain through commerce, agriculture, technology, and military might.

Wage war against rival factions, expand your realm, and reshape the course of Japanese history.

Will you be the one to unify the ages?

  • Choose one historical figure from Japanese history and start the game.

  • Strengthen your faction’s commerce, agriculture, technology, and military power with development commands.

  • Invade other factions and expand your territory. Aim to unify Japanese history!

details.name: Roadside Egg Stand
details.detailed_description:
Roadside Egg Stand is a cozy and relaxing idle game. Build and manage your own adorable roadside stands, offering fresh eggs and spreading joy across scenic small-town roads.

Imagine pulling over on a quiet country road to find a little wooden stand filled with colorful eggs, homemade treats, and a handwritten sign saying, “Fresh Eggs!” That warm, wholesome feeling is the heart of this game.

Raise Happy Chickens:

Nurture your flock, discover rare breeds, and collect eggs from speckled to golden!

Customize Your Stand:

Add flower baskets, lanterns, flowers … and hand-painted signs to make your stands extra charming.

Explore New Locations:

Expand to scenic spots like countryside lanes, forest trails, and lively village markets.

Fresh Eggs, Fresh Profits:

Serve your customers, set fair prices, and handle special requests to earn money, ensuring your chickens stay well-fed and happy!

Employee of the week: 

Celebrate your best chickens with fun titles and perks they’re part of the family!

Chill Vibes, Endless Fun:

No rush, no stress, just the cozy joy of growing your egg empire.

Maximize Idle: Automatic Egg Collection Anytime

With this idle feature, your chickens will keep laying eggs even when you're not online, without any manual care needed.

As your business grows, expand to new scenic spots, decorate your stands with cute, rustic touches, and serve happy villagers. 

Create your very own collection of unique chicken breeds, take ownership of every egg stand around the village, and decorate them in your signature style!

name: The Lost Desert aka Cube Game 9x

details.name: The Lost Desert aka Cube Game 9x
details.detailed_description:
The Lost Desert is a open-world shooter. Main thing about is a game that works on very old PC hardware and windows version but it works on modern hardware and windows version too so it's very cross play compatible. Better to play with friends as it is multiplayer game.

We are a team of two but we are committed to the development.

Maps:

  • Spawn map: It's the most finished at this point. Has 4 main buildings and a watch tower. There are lot of trees and there is a river. There is a grass in form of sprites. All of the graphics are based on settings.

  • Small desert map: It's more like a small wasteland with rusted barrels ruins old rusted fences and big rocks. This map is not very complex and it's used for a battle royal game mode.

  • Big forest map: This map is not very finished, it has 4 watch towers lot of concrete buildings. This map as the spawn map has lot of trees the same grass and lot of lakes. It's the biggest one in the game and will have way more buildings and features in the future.

  • Big desert map: This map isn't finished at all has just a few monuments and a big hill but other then that it's just a big desert.

Sub maps.

  • 3D platforming map: This is a big map with platforms and its finished.

  • A old mine map: This map is a old mine with crystals and support beams.

  • Lobby map: It's a lobby.

Current Features:

  • 4 main maps and 3 sub maps so there is a lot to explore.

  • Raccoons.

  • 2 weapons: pistol and machine gun.

  • Ammo system. Ammo boxes that fill the players ammo supply, they re-spawn on the maps randomly.

  • Day and Night cycle.

  • CRTs with animations.

  • Old buildings.

  • Simple and complex terrain. With trees, 3d or 2d water (based on settings).

  • Complex start settings menu.

  • 3D platforming map with jumping platforms.

Planned Stuff:

  • More NPCs.

  • Expansion of the big forest and big desert maps.

  • New interesting buildings in all maps.

Controls:

WSAD movement

Space Jump

Mouse camera movement or arrow keys

R to open/close doors

Esc main menu arrow keys to move in menu

Tab to show scores

V to activate gametype 2 needs at least 3 player to be useful 

F1 debug menu

F2 third person F3 first person

Ctrl Build, Alt Shoot

1 or 2 to change weapons

Main maps:

F4 is the spawn map

F5 is the small desert

F6 is the big forest

F10 is big desert

Sub maps:

F7 is the map with the platforming

F8 is cave/mine map

F9 is indoors map

F9 is indoors map

details.name: Terrestrial planet
details.detailed_description:
You can choose different storylines to interpret various stories from scratch, from slash and burn farming to cutting-edge technology on a distant planet similar to Earth. You can choose different biological communities and geographical locations as birthplaces, take care of the emotions of the characters to meet their various needs, gradually develop and grow, recruit soldiers to resist foreign enemies or capture other regions or countries.

The existing main mechanisms include construction, building, underground excavation, random terrain, biological communities, recruitment, siege, planting, cooking, medicine, mining, military, production, hunting, personalized villagers and their performances, resource management, power system, temperature system,aerospace system, physical health system surgery, etc.

Partial mechanism demonstration is as follows:Construction System: With a flexible construction system, you can unleash your imagination to build high-rise castles or dig underground to become a caveman.Power system: generate electricity, store electricity, consume electricity, and use electricity units reasonably to maintain normal electricity demand for residents.Defense system: Various turrets need to be arranged reasonably with the building, and the defense effect of different formations will vary greatly.

Space system: Launch rockets, send various types of satellites into orbit, achieve different functions, or build space stations to send residents up. Space stations can synthesize unique resources.Military system: It can recruit soldiers and form different branches according to their attributes, which require the production of different weapons.This is a randomly generated world with infinite possibilities. Use your intelligence to continuously expand your population and unify the entire planet.

details.name: Running Through Backrooms
details.detailed_description:
Master dynamic parkour mechanics like sprinting, sliding, and wall-running to outmaneuver dangers and navigate the treacherous terrain.

Navigate through a vast network of terrifying levels, each more twisted and unsettling than the last, as you uncover the dark secrets hidden within.

Experience the thrill of waterslides, gliding through twisting paths to explore new areas. It’s a fast-paced, exhilarating way to navigate the Backrooms !

LEVELS

  • Level 0: The starting point of your nightmare. Navigate through the dimly lit, yellow-tinted hallways filled with old, musty carpets and flickering fluorescent lights.

  • Level 0.2: A darker, more treacherous variation of Level 0. The paths are narrower, and the environment is even more disorienting.

  • Level 1: Transition to a slightly more industrial setting with concrete walls and parking.

  • Level 2: A sprawling maze of dark, damp tunnels and echoing footsteps. The claustrophobic environment tests your endurance as you navigate through pipes and avoid hazardous obstacles.

  • Level 3: A chaotic blend of industrial and organic elements, with machinery intertwined with strange, pulsating growths.

  • Level 4: An expansive, decrepit office space filled with endless rows of cubicles and malfunctioning electronics.

  • Level 0?: A surreal, overgrown version of Level 0, where vegetation has taken over the familiar hallways.

  • Level 5: The Abandoned Hotel. An eerie, deserted hotel with shifting, dimly lit corridors and ghostly apparitions.

  • Level 37 (Poolrooms) : An expansive complex of interconnected rooms and corridors slightly submerged in undulating, lukewarm water.

  • Level 10 : The Infinite Fields. An endless expanse of overgrown wheat fields under a perpetually overcast sky.

  • Ocean Poolrooms : A submerged island of interconnected, flooded rooms.

  • Level 389 : The Gaming Hall, It resides under the complete control of The G̵̷̶̢͕̖̝̼͍͉̫̮͔̜̣̟̩̠̼̙̱̟̦̾̂̈̂ͭ͐̽͐̐͊̈̍͘̚͠͞a̱͎̤̋̔̈̈m̛̳̰͇͂ͬ̍ͩ̋̍ę͕̝̰̹ͬͤ̑͝ͅ M̶̨̧̮̻͇̮̼̠̹̝͍̒ͮ́̈͆ͪͧͭa̷͙͓̣̓͒ͫ͆͗̕͜s̖̪͔̫̼̪̾̆t̸̨̮̪̤̣̝̾͋̋̈͑̔̊̚̕͡è̶̴̛͖̼̝̪̤̖͔͓̼̻̏ͮͭ̈͒ͯͨ͆ͭ̄̍͋͛̈ͬ̚̚͟r̴̴̵̛̝̺̣̖͈͎͚̻̻̖̦͖̖̩̺̩̬ͨ̊̓̽̂̀̾̃ͧ͌̅̆̏͘͞ͅ.

  • Level 148 : An infinite, serene garden bathed in soft sunlight, with neatly trimmed hedges and vibrant flowers

  • Level Fun : Colorful rooms resembling a child’s birthday party, filled with balloons and eerie laughter. The grinning Partygoers are always watching. Don’t join the fun.

  • Level 404 : A broken space where reality corrupts, filled with distorted walls, floating textures, and endless visual errors.

  • Neon Poolrooms : A surreal network of pools illuminated by fluorescent neon lights, where the water shimmers with an eerie glow and shadows seem to dance to the rhythm of an inaudible melody.

  • Level Old Memories: A world frozen in pixelated nostalgia, where strangely familiar landscapes stretch endlessly.

Survive the Unseen: The Backrooms are home to unknown entities and phenomena. Stay alert, stay quiet, and most importantly, stay alive.

Navigate through 17 unique levels filled with haunting environments, challenging parkour, and lurking entities. Immerse yourself in the chilling atmosphere as you fight to escape the horrors of the Backrooms

reviews.review: buenisimo

A standart problem. The game has a) beautiful visuals (level 148 almost made me cry, one of the best audio/image among many backrooms games that I had played before), b) amazing sound design both atmospheric ambience and monsters. At the same time models of the monsters are terrible and their animations are messy too. But it would've been a great pleasure just to wander (the last three levels were close to perfection) if I didn't have to meet INFINITE scripts with poorly made monsters. 
As I say, it is definitely worth a try but I can't recommend the gameplay itself.

game got fixed literally the next day after the dev seen my review, replayed the game and it has a huge potential. Looking forward into retrying it in a year maybe with all the new content and fixes !
reviews.developer_response:
-Added a sensitivity slider
-Fixed achievment
-Working on new levels

I would love you to change your review !

reviews.review:
This is a bite sized 'Escape the Backrooms' So many famous fun levels packed inside this short game. It is said that dev would add more updates! At the moment of this review, I feel the price should be 4.99. Entity models could use more work to be more scarier. Some entities can see through walls which I think is a bug. There's also a bug in the poolrooms where the float gets stuck midway. 
Overall I enjoyed the game.
I got video proof in my playthrough here.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sf9lWVZ_npA

Interesting Backrooms game.

Some enemy mechanics can cause frustration at some times, especially when you don't know where to go.

Best thing is you can go down the waterslides!!!
Amazing game! It needs some polishing, but I believe in this game so much! I recommend it, it’s truly an amazing experience for only 8 bucks lol!!

For the developer, the game is pretty solid over all, and its fun but increase the duration of the flashlight battery and decrease the darkness because i cant actually play and beat the level 0 because i LITERALLY CAN'T SEE NOTHING EVEN MY STEPS!!!
PLEASE FIX IT I WANT TO PLAY!!!!
reviews.developer_response:
Hello,
We just fixed the battery problem. 
It now last 5 times more, in addition red flashlight use 50% less battery, making it last much longer.

Hope you will retry now and reconsider the review.

See you in the backrooms :)

reviews.review: Just completed the game. Its one magnificent realistic backrooms experience, around like 15 large levels with entitites, superb graphics and amazingly fun gameplay. Very amazing game

The game is faithful to the history of the backrooms. We feel that the developer wanted to push the concept, but it remains basic overall. No multiplayer unfortunately. The maincharacter speaks but to say naive things.- 

 The negative things: Not enough battery, a lot of batteries that you can't grabs  because they're buggy and they don't last long enough. I found myself in the pool level with no light, I went through the walls by double jumping, impossible to find any recoverable battery, I stopped at the pool level, it was too much for me. We cannot modify the sensitivity, the sound, the graphic level at a minimum. The indications for getting out of it are weak but we understand. 

Positive things: The graphics quality is good thanks to Unreal Engine 5. The slide mechanics are good but not very useful. like jumping on walls but it's fun to use. The double jump doesn't find its use yet or I missed it but still fun. The atmosphere is in keeping with the concept of the backrooms. It's a good game that needs improvement overall. I wouldn't recommend it until all the little flaws are fixed.  I like to parkour maybe not in the backrooms ? or it need maybe more freedom to use it

details.name: The Variant Void
details.detailed_description:
Dive into The Variant Void, an arcade-inspired roguelike bullet hell where precision, reflexes, and strategy are your keys to survival. Designed for fans of strategic, fast-paced gameplay, The Variant Void offers randomized challenges, tons of upgrades and endless replayability.

A Dynamic Arcade Experience

In The Variant Void, you’ll face an unyielding storm of bullets and enemies based on your progression, and your choices, ensuring every run feels fresh and challenging. As you progress, unlock abilities that adapts to your chosen powers, upgrade your ship, and apply powerful augmentations to make your build solid. But beware: every choice comes with trade-offs, and survival hinges on balancing risk and reward.

Key Features

  • Arcade-Inspired Combat: Feel the nostalgia of classic arcade shooters paired with modern roguelike mechanics.

  • Endless Replayability: Each run is unique, with randomized waves of enemies, upgrades and augmentations.

  • Powerful Augmentations: Enhance your abilities with major and minor augments, from increased firepower to healing buffs, each with strategic pros and cons.

  • Dynamic Bullet Hell Action: Test your reflexes in an ever-escalating swarm of bullets, projectiles, and enemy patterns.

  • Roguelike Progression: Unlock permanent upgrades with each successful (or failed) run.

  • Pursue Challenges: Want an extra challenge? Look for the achievements.

  • Boss Battles: Face off against formidable foes, each with distinct attack patterns and mechanics.

Are You Ready?

Whether you’re a fan of retro bullethells or a newcomer to the roguelike genre, The Variant Void is designed to challenge and thrill players of all skill levels. Dodge, shoot, and strategize your way through waves of enemies and emerge victorious—or dive back in to try again.

Test your mettle and embrace the chaos. Can you make it to the end of the galaxy?

details.name: Shovelware
details.detailed_description:
Welcome to Shovelware, an engaging classical Arcade game where you have to reach the bottom of the level. Dig stable tunnels, avoid falling blocks, explosives and many other traps and contraptions. One hundred levels in a multitude of leagues, many trophies and countless cosmetics await you - wishlist Shovelware now!"

Beware of falling blocks...

In Shovelwares classic style gameplay, Blocks will fall when a space has been opened up underneath them. But they also cling to other blocks of the same colour so plan your route and build stable mineshafts through the level. 

Other obstacles exist to avoid...

Spikes, TNT, Explosive blocks, Metal Blocks and many other things exist for you to avoid in the many levels of Shovelware.

Cosmetics...

There are many cosmetics for you to purchase with the Gems you find scattered around the level, Other cosmetics can be unlocked by completing tasks in certain levels.

Cosmetics come as Body, Eyes, Head gear and Shovels. They do not affect the gameplay in any way but let you add your own flair to the in game character.

Over 100 Cosmetics exist, can you find and unlock them all?
